That my trials come to only make me strong

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Through it all, through it all, I’ve learned to trust in Jesus, learned to trust in God

Through it all, through it all, I’ve learned to depend upon His word

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I’ve been a lot of places and I’ve seen a lot of faces

There’s been times I’ve felt so all alone

But in my lonely hours, those precious lonely hours

Jesus lets me know I was His own

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I thank God for the mountains and I thank Him for the valleys

I thank Him for all the storms He brought me through

For if I never had a problem, I wouldn’t know that He could solve them

And I wouldn’t know what my faith in God can do, through it all

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: My stubborn will at last hath yielded;I would be Thine, and Thine alone;And this the prayer my lips are bringing,Lord, let in me Thy will be done.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Sweet will of God, still fold me closer,Till I am wholly lost in Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I’m tired of sin, footsore and weary,The darksome path hath dreary grown;But now a light has ris’n to cheer me;I find in Thee my Star, my Sun.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Thy precious will, O conqu’ring Savior,Doth now embrace and compass me;All discords hushed, my peace a river,My soul, a prisoned bird set free.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Shut in with Thee, O Lord, forever,My wayward feet no more to roam;What pow’r from Thee my soul can sever?The center of God’s will my home.

englishTitle: CLEANSE ME/ SEARCH ME OH GOD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Search me, O God, and know my heart today;Try me, O Savior, know my thoughts, I pray.See if there be some wicked way in me;Cleanse me from ev'ry sin and set me free.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I praise thee, Lord, for cleansing me from sin;Fulfill thy Word, and make me pure within.Fill me with fire where once I burned with shame;Grant my desire to magnify thy name.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Lord, take my life and make it wholly thine;Fill my poor heart with thy great love divine.Take all my will, my passion, self, and pride;I now surrender; Lord, in me abide.

number: 225: CLEANSE ME/ SEARCH ME OH GOD

englishTitle: HAVE YOU ANY ROOM FOR JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Have you any room for Jesus,He who bore your load of sin?As He knocks and asks admission,Sinner, will you let Him in?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Room for Jesus, King of Glory!Hasten now, His Word obey.Swing the heart’s door widely open;Bid Him enter while you may.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Room for pleasure, room for business;But for Christ, the Crucified,Not a place that He can enter,In the heart for which He died?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Room and time now give to Jesus;Soon will pass God’s Day of grace -Soon your heart left cold and silent,And your Savior’s pleading cease.

number: 226: HAVE YOU ANY ROOM FOR JESUS

englishTitle: JESUS IS ALL THE WORLD TO ME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus is all the world to me,My life, my joy, my all;He is my strength from day to day,Without him I would fall:When I am sad, to him I go,No other one can cheer me so;When I am sad, he makes me glad,He's my friend.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Jesus is all the world to me,My friend in trials sore;I go to him for blessings, andHe gives them o'er and o'er:He sends the sunshine and the rain,He sends the harvest's golden grain;Sunshine and rain, harvest of grain,He's my friend.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jesus is all the world to me,And true to him I'll be;Oh, how could I this friend deny,When he's so true to me?Following him I know I'm right,He watches o'er me day and night;Following him by day and night,He's my friend.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Jesus is all the world to me,I want no better friend;I trust him now, I'll trust him whenLife's fleeting days shall end:Beautiful life with such a friend,Beautiful life that has no end;Eternal life, eternal joy,He's my friend.

number: 227: JESUS IS ALL THE WORLD TO ME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Praise the Lord I've been invitedTo a meeting in the airJubilee, Jubilee.All the saints of all the agesIn their glory will be thereOh I'm going to that happy Jubilee!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Great Jubilee! Grand Jubilee!Oh, I am going to that happy Jubilee!Great Jubilee! Grand Jubilee!Oh, I'm going to that happy Jubilee!Verse 2:

With that glorious assemblyDressed in garments pure and whiteJubilee, Jubilee.You will find me for I'm watchingAnd my lamp is trimmed and brightOh I'm going to that happy Jubilee!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Prayer changes things

Prayer really changes things

Prayer changes things

Said I know that I know it does, yes it does

In the middle of the night when I can't fall asleep

Wondering if there're angels really watching over me

When your heart feels like it's breaking because of what you've been going through

Then there is something I wanna recommend to you

Get on your knees and say a prayer

Oh, go to God and leave it there

Because He hears you when you cry

He'll wipe every tear from your eye

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh, prayer

Prayer changes things

I know prayer changes things

I know that I know it does

Let it change things in your life

When it feels like hope is gone

And you can't keep holding on

Prayer changes things

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Now tell me, what's the use of crying

What's the point of your despair

Cause all of life's broken pieces

God is the one who really cares

And when your load gets too heavy

Oh, go behind and close the doors

And lay it all before the master

And you'll come out lighter than before

If you ask and believe in that name you shall receive

Just call Jesus if you would

You're going find Him working it out for your good

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When you can't see the light of day

Always remember, He's never too far away

he's right there

Even when you feel all hope is gone

Be strong, keep holding on

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: More like the Master I would ever be,More of His meekness, more humility;More zeal to labor, more courage to be true,More consecration for work He bids me do.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Take Thou my heart, I would be Thine alone;Take Thou my heart and make it all Thine own.Purge me from sin, O Lord, I now implore,Wash me and keep me Thine forevermore.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: More like the Master is my daily prayer;More strength to carry crosses I must bear;More earnest effort to bring His kingdom in,More of His Spirit, the wanderer to win.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: More like the Master I would live and grow;More of His love to others I would show;More self-denial, like His in Galilee,More like the Master I long to ever be.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: In grace the holy GodDid full salvation plan,Electing in His sov'reign graceTo save rebellious man.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: By grace are ye saved thru faith,Thru faith, thru faith,Thru faith, and that not of yourselves;Thru faith, and that not of yourselves;Not of works, Not of works,Not of works, Not of works,Not of works, lest any man should boast;It is the gift of God;Not of works, lest any man should boast;It is the gift of God, It is the gift of God,It is the gift of God, It is the gift of God,The gift of God.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: This grace of God appearsIn Jesus Christ His Son;He lifted on the cross of shame,The grace of God makes known.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: To all who do believeIn God, thru Christ revealedBy grace, they full salvation have,And "Sons of God" are sealed.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There's a royal banner given for displayTo the soldiers of the King;As an ensign fair we lift it up today,While as ransomed ones we sing.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Marching on, marching on,For Christ count ev'rything but loss!And to crown Him King,toil and sing 'Neath the banner of the cross!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Though the foe may rage and gather as the flood,Let the standard be displayed;And beneath its folds, as soldiers of the Lord,For the truth be not dismayed!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Over land and sea, wherever man may dwell,Make the glorious tidings known;Of the crimson banner now the story tell,While the Lord shall claim His own!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When the glory dawns 'tis drawing very nearIt is hast'ning day by day;Then before our King the foe shall disappear,And the cross the world shall sway!

englishTitle: FOR THE BEAUTY OF THE EARTH

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: For the beauty of the earth,for the glory of the skies,for the love which from our birthover and around us lies.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Christ, our Lord, to you we raisethis, our hymn of grateful praise.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: For the wonder of each hourof the day and of the night,hill and vale and tree and flower,sun and moon and stars of light,

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: For the joy of human love,brother, sister, parent, child,friends on earth, and friends above,for all gentle thoughts and mild.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: For yourself, best gift divine,to the world so freely given,agent of God's grand design:peace on earth and joy in heaven.

number: 233. FOR THE BEAUTY OF THE EARTH

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I am trav’lingtow'rd life’s sunset gate,I’m a pilgrim going home;For the glow of eventide I wait,I’m a pilgrim going home.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Evening bells I seem to hearAs the sunset gate draws near!Evening bells I seem to hearAs the sunset gate draws near.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There is tranquil rest when day is done,I shall lay me down in peace;When the end is reached at set of sun,I shall lay me down in peace.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: By the side of those most near and dear,I shall drop life’s toil and care;When the Master’s tender voice I hear,I shall drop life’s toil and care.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: I shall rise again at morning dawn,I shall put on glory then;With the shadowy veil of death undrawn,I shall put on glory then.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Are you coming Home, ye wand’rers,Whom Jesus died to win,All footsore, lame and weary,Your garments stained with sin?Will you seek the blood of JesusTo wash your garments white?Will you trust His precious promise,Are you coming Home tonight?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Are you coming Home tonight?Are you coming Home tonight?Are you coming Home to Jesus,Out of darkness into light?Are you coming Home tonight?Are you coming Home tonight?To your loving, heav’nly Father,Are you coming Home tonight?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Are you coming Home, ye lost ones?Behold your Lord doth wait;Come, then no longer linger,Come ere it be too late;Will you come and let Him save you?Oh! trust His love and might;Will you come while He is calling,Are you coming Home tonight?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Are you coming home, ye guilty,Who bear the load of sin?Outside you’ve long been standing,Come now and venture in;Will you heed the Savior’s promise,And dare to trust Him quite?"Come unto Me," saith Jesus,Are you coming Home tonight?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Are you coming Home, ye weary,Who long for rest and peace?Your burden has been heavy,And long you've sought release;Will you now accept of Jesus,In Him your heart delight?Will you fully yield up to Him,Are you coming Home tonight?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Onward, Christian soldiers,marching as to war,With the cross of Jesusgoing on before!Christ, the royal Master,leads against the foe;Forward into battle,see his banner go!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Onward, Christian soldiers,marching as to war,With the cross of Jesusgoing on before!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: At the sign of triumphSatan's host doth flee;On, then, Christian soldiers,on to victory!Hell's foundations quiverat the shout of praise;Brothers, lift your voices,loud your anthems raise!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Like a mighty armymoves the church of God;Brothers, we are treadingwhere the saints have trod;We are not dividedall one body we,One in hope and doctrine,one in charity.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Onward, then, ye people,join our happy throng,Blend with ours your voicesin the triumph song;Glory, laud, and honor,unto Christ the King;This thro' countless agesmen and angels sing.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Some glad morning we shall see, Jesus in the air

Coming after you and me, joy is ours to share

What rejoicing there will be, when the saints shall rise

Headed for that jubilee, yonder in the skies

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh what singing, oh what shouting

On that happy morning when we all shall rise

Oh what glory, Hallelujah

When we meet our blessed Savior in the skies

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Seems that now I almost see, all the sainted dead

Rising for that jubilee, that is just ahead

In the twinkling of an eye, changed with them to be

All the living saints to fly, to that jubilee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When with all that heavenly host, we begin to sing

Singing in the Holy Ghost, how the heavens will ring

Millions there will join the song, with them we shall be

Praising Christ through ages long, heaven's jubilee.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O listen to our wondrous story,Counted once among the lost;Yet One came down from heaven's glory,Saving us at awful cost

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Who saved us from eternal loss?What did He do? Where is He now?In heaven interceding!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: No angel could His place have taken,Highest of the high tho' he;The loved One on the cross forsakenWas One of the Godhead three!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Will you surrender to this Savior?To His scepter humbly bow;You, too, shall come to know His favor,He will save you, save you now.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Has God forgotten me, have I prayed in vain?

Does He remember still, those nights of pain?

Has God forgotten me? Why the lomg delay?

This broken heart of mine, needs His balm today

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
for 1&2

No GodGod remembers still and He always will

Though stars may vanish or fade

He may delay but hear Him say

I’ll keep each promise I’ve made

So keep your trust in Him, He will be true

Whatever’s best I know, He will send to you

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
for 3

No God remembers still and He always will

Though stars may vanish or fade

He may delay but hear Him say

I’ll keep each promise I’ve made

I’ll keep my trust in Him, Jesus will be true

Whatever comes my way, He will see me through

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Has God forgotten me? Oh the road is long

Does He remember still, I need a song

Has God forgotten me? And the load I bear?

This weary heart of mine, needs His tender care

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Has God forgotten me? This pain is real

Does He remember still, the way I feel?

Has God forgotten me? I am weak and sore

This fevered frame of mine, needs His touch once more

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Shackled by a heavy burden

'Neath a load of guilt and shame

Then the hand of Jesus touched me

And now I am no longer the same

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
He touched me, oh, He touched me

And oh, the joy that floods my soul

Something happened, and now I know

He touched me, and made me whole

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Since I've met this blessed Savior

Since He's cleansed and made me whole

I will never cease to praise Him (to praise Him)

I'll shout it while eternity roll

englishTitle: WHAT SHALL IT PROFIT A MAN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Not all earth’s gold and silverCan make a sinner whole;What shall it profit thee, O man,If thou should’st lose thy soul?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: What shall it profit a man,What shall it profit a man,If He gain the whole world,And lose his own soul?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The heaping up of richesTo many seems life’s goal;But in the eager rush for wealth,Forgotten is the soul.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: This solemn question answer:Is worldly gain thy goal?Can fleeting riches be comparedTo an immortal soul?

number: 245. WHAT SHALL IT PROFIT A MAN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Come, ye sinners, lost and hopeless

Jesus' blood can make you free

For He saved the worst among you

When He saved a wretch like me

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
And I know, yes, I know

Jesus' blood can make the vilest sinner clean

And I know, yes, I know

Jesus' blood can make the vilest sinner clean

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
To the faint He giveth power

Through the mountains makes a way

Findeth water in the desert

Turns the night to golden day

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
In temptation He is near thee

Holds the pow'rs of hell at bay

Guides you to the path of safety

Gives you grace for ev'ry day

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
He will keep thee while the

Ages Roll throughout eternity

Though earth hinders and hell rages

All must work for good to thee

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I've been reading my bible

I've been listening tooTo some beautiful stories

That I know are true

Of a beautiful country

And a city foursquare

Yes I've heard about heaven

And I want to go there.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I have heard about heaven

And I want to go there

Where the beautiful flowers

Bloom so wondrously fair

I have heard about mansion far beyond compare

Yes have heard about heaven

And I want to go there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I am walking with Jesus

Oh how happy I'm I

For I own a bright mansion

Far beyond the sky

Tis a glorious mansion

It's has beauty to spare

Yes I've heard about heaven

And I want to go there.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When my journey is over

I'll be ready to go

To that city eternal

Where pure waters flows

There will be no more dying

There will be no more care

Yes, I've heard about Heaven

And I want to go there

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: In shady, green pastures, so rich and so sweet,God leads His dear children along;Where the water’s cool flow bathes the weary one’s feet,God leads His dear children along.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Some through the waters, some through the flood,Some through the fire, but all through the blood;Some through great sorrow, but God gives a song,In the night season and all the day long.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Sometimes on the mount where the sun shines so bright,God leads His dear children along;Sometimes in the valley, in darkest of night,God leads His dear children along.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Though sorrows befall us and evils oppose,God leads His dear children along;Through grace we can conquer, defeat all our foes,God leads His dear children along.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Away from the mire, and away from the clay,God leads His dear children along;Away up in glory, eternity’s day,God leads His dear children along.

englishTitle: I AM HIS HE IS MINE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Loved with everlasting love,drawn by grace that love to know,Spirit sent from Christ above,thou dost witness it is so.O this full and precious peacefrom his presence all divine;in a love that cannot cease,I am his and he is mine.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Heav'n above is deeper blue,earth around is sweeter green,that which glows in ev'ry hueChristless eyes have never seen.Birds in song his glories show,flow'rs with richer beauties shinesince I know, as now I know,I am his and he is mine.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Taste the goodness of the Lord:welcomed home to his embrace,all his love, as blood outpoured,seals the pardon of his grace.Can I doubt his love for me,when I trace that love's design?By the cross of CalvaryI am his and he is mine.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: His forever, only his--who the Lord and me shall part?Ah, with what a rest of blissChrist can fill the loving heart.Heav'n and earth may fade and flee,firstborn light in gloom decline,but while God and I shall be,I am his and he is mine.

number: 249: I AM HIS HE IS MINE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus! what a Friend for sinners!Jesus! Lover of my soul;friends may fail me, foes assail me;He, my Savior, makes me whole.Hallelujah! what a Savior!Hallelujah! what a Friend!Saving, helping, keeping, loving,He is with me to the end.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Jesus! what a Strength in weakness!Let me hide myself in Him;tempted, tried, and sometimes failing,He, my Strength, my vict'ry wins.Hallelujah! what a Savior!Hallelujah! what a Friend!Saving, helping, keeping, loving;He is with me to the end.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jesus! what a Help in sorrow!While the billows o'er me roll,even when my heart is breaking,He, my Comfort, helps my soul.Hallelujah! what a Savior!Hallelujah! what a Friend!Saving, helping, keeping, loving;He is with me to the end.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Jesus! what a Guide and Keeper!While the tempest still is high,storms about me, night o'ertakes me,He, my Pilot, hears my cry.Hallelujah! what a Savior!Hallelujah! what a Friend!Saving, helping, keeping, loving;He is with me to the end.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Jesus! I do now receive Him,more than all in Him I find;He hath granted me forgiveness;I am His, and He is mine!Hallelujah! what a Savior!Hallelujah! what a Friend!Saving, helping, keeping, loving;He is with me to the end.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The cross, it standeth fast,

Hallelujah, hallelujah!

Defying ev’ry blast,

Hallelujah, hallelujah!

The winds of hell have blown,

The world its hate hath shown,

Yet it is not overthrown,

Hallelujah for the cross!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Hallelujah, hallelujah,

Hallelujah for the cross;

Hallelujah, hallelujah,

It shall never suffer loss!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
It is the old cross still,

Hallelujah, hallelujah!

Its triumph let us tell,

Hallelujah, hallelujah!

The grace of God here shone,

Through Christ, the blessed Son,

Who did for sin atone,

Hallelujah for the cross!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
’Twas here the debt was paid,

Hallelujah, hallelujah!

Our sins on Jesus laid,

Hallelujah, hallelujah!

So round the cross we sing,

Of Christ, our offering,

Of Christ, our living King,

Hallelujah for the cross!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I've got a home in glory land, that outshines the sun

I've got a home in glory land, that outshines the sun

I've got a home in glory land, that outshines the sun

Look away beyond the blue.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Do Lord, oh, do Lord, oh, do remember me,

Do Lord, oh, do Lord, oh, do remember me,

Do Lord, oh, do Lord, oh, do remember me,

Look away beyond the blue.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I took Jesus as my Savior, you take Him too,

I took Jesus as my Savior, you take Him too,

I took Jesus as my Savior, you take Him too,

Look away beyond the blue.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I read about it in the book of revelation, you read it, too

I read about it in the book of revelation, you read it, too

I read about it in the book of revelation, you read it, too

Look away beyond the blue.

englishTitle: LOOK TO THE LAMB OF GOD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: If you from sin are longing to be free,Look to the Lamb of God;He, to redeem you, died on Calvary,Look to the Lamb of God.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Look to the Lamb of God,Look to the Lamb of God,For He alone is able to save you--Look to the Lamb of God.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When Satan tempts and doubts and fears assail,Look to the Lamb of God;You in His strength shall over all prevail,Look to the Lamb of God.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Are you aweary, does the way seem long?Look to the Lamb of God;His love will cheer and fill your heart with song,Look to the Lamb of God.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Fear not when shadows on your pathway fall,Look to the Lamb of God;In joy or sorrow Christ is all in all,Look to the Lamb of God.

number: 256: LOOK TO THE LAMB OF GOD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There is coming a day when a reaping will be,And all men everywhere will have to share;What they’ve sown long ago will surely sprout and grow,And someday in the future will bring joy or bring woe.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: So be careful, dear ones, what kind of seeds you sow,Lest someday there will be sad regrets and misery;Be careful, I say, what kind of seed you sow today,Lest someday you will weep when you reap what you sow.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Many thorns here are sown that will prick tender hearts,But, be sure, there’s a reaping day to come;Bitter reaping ’twill be and like an adder sting—Oh, dear souls, take this warning for we’ll reap what we sow.

When you think to do wrong, know that God on His throneSees and hears everything you do or say;

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Not one thing can go by from His all-seeing eye,God knows all, and remember, we will reap what we sow.

We will reap seeds we’ve sown, they’ll bring tears or bring joy,Have you brought grief to some kind, loving heart?Or have you sown some love, and pointed souls above?God sees all, and remember, we will reap what we sow.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Will your anchor hold in the storms of life,when the clouds unfold their wings of strife?When the strong tides lift, and the cables strain,will your anchor drift, or firm remain?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: We have an anchor that keeps the soulsteadfast and sure while the billows roll;fastened to the Rock which cannot move,grounded firm and deep in the Saviour’s love!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Will your anchor hold in the straits of fear,when the breakers roar and the reef is near?While the surges rage, and the wild winds blow,shall the angry waves then your bark o'erflow?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Will your anchor hold in the floods of death,when the waters cold chill your latest breath?On the rising tide you can never fail,while your anchor holds within the veil.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Will your eyes behold through the morning lightthe city of gold and the harbour bright?Will you anchor safe by the heavenly shore,when life's storms are past for evermore?

englishTitle: DON’T TURN AROUND TO THE THINGS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
At the cross you knelt and were converted

Jesus saved your soul that happy day

Now that He has led you from the broad road

Never leave the straight and narrow way

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Don't turn around to the things you left behind

All those bridges you burned don't try to find

Set your face like a flint and walk right unto the promise land

Don't turn around to the things you left behind

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Gone the glee and glitter of the old life

It could never really satisfy

Now in Christ your blessings can't be numbered

His is such a bountiful supply

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Someday you will reach the gate of heaven

And your race on earth will then be run

There with Jesus you will live forever

In the happy land that needs no sun

number: 260: DON’T TURN AROUND TO THE THINGS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Last night as i lay sleeping a dream came to meI dreamed about the end of time, about enternity.I saw a million sinners fall on their knees to prayThe lord he sadly shook his head and this I heard him say.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Sorry I never knew you

I find no record of your birthSorry I never knew you

Go and serve the one that you have bserved before.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I thought the time had fully come

When I could stand a thrive,

I told the lord that i had been a christianAll the while, so thru his book

He took a look, and sadly shook his head.

Then he placed me over on his left and this i heard him say..

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
There were my wife and children,

I heard their loving voice,They must have been so happy

Oh how they did rejoice

Their robes of white around them,

Their faces all aglow

My little girl looked over at me and this i heard her say...

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Daddy we can't go with you,

We must dwell in the joy of our lord,

Sorry for we still love you,

But you'll never be our daddy anymore.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Now when I had awakened ,

The tears were in my eyes,

And looking all aroundme,

And there to my surprise there

Were my loving babies I knew it was aDream and down beside that bed of mineYou should have heard me scream.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Father which art in heaven ,

I know thou gave thine onlySon, father please forgive me,

For I want to be ready when you come,

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Troublesome times are here, filling men’s hearts with fear,Freedom we all hold dear now is at stake.Humbling your heart to God saves from the chast’ning rodSeek the way pilgrim’s trod, Christians awake!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus is coming soon, morning or night or noonMany will meet their doom, trumpets will sound.All of the dead shall rise, righteous meet in the skies,Going where no one dies, heaven-ward bound.

Love of so many cold, losing their home of gold,This in God’s Word is told; evils abound.When these signs come to pass, nearing the end at last,It will come very fast; trumpets will sound.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Troubles will soon be o’er; happy forevermore,When we meet on that shore, free from all care.Rising up in the sky, telling this world goodbye;Homeward we then will fly, glory to share.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Soon we'll come to the end of life's journey

And perhaps never meet any more

Till we gather in heaven's bright city

Far away on that beautiful shore

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
If we never meet again this side of heaven

As we struggle through this world and its strife

There's another meeting place somewhere in heaven

By the side of the river of life

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Where the charming roses bloom forever

And where separations come no more

If we never meet again this side of heaven

I will meet you on that beautiful shore

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Many years ago in days of childhood

I used to play till evenin' shadows come

Then windin' down that

old familiar pathway

I'd hear my mother call at set of sun

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Come home, come home it's supper time

The shadows lengthen fast

Come home, come home it's supper time

We're going home at last

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Some of the fondest

memories of my childhood

Were woven around supper time

When my mother used to call

From the backsteps of the old homeplace

"Come on home now son, it's supper time"

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Ah, but I'd love to hear that once more

But you know for me time has woven the realization of

The truth that's even more thrilling and that's when

The call come up from the portals of glory

To come home, for it's supper time

To come home, for it's supper time

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
How many times has the Savior called before

And each time you turn away from His door

You said not this time but someday I'll get in

Though your little world may crumble before He calls again

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Before the Savior calls again you may cry a million tears

Before He calls again you may waste precious years

He's calling now, the door is open, come inside while you can

You may suffer needless heartaches before he calls again

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Storm clouds are darkening the skies

The pain of life with tears has filled your eyes

Years of sorrow you might have saved my friend

If only you had answered when he called back then

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O spread the tidings 'roundWherever man is found,Wherever human hearts and human woes abound;Let every Christian tongue proclaim the joyful sound:The Comforter has come!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: The Comforter has come, the Comforter has come!The Holy Ghost from heaven, the Father's promise given;O spread the tidings 'round wherever man is found:The Comforter has come!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The long, long night is past, the morning breaks at last,And hushed the dreadful wail and fury of the blast,As o'er the golden hills the day advances fast!The Comforter has come!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Lo, the great King of kings with healing in His wings,To every captive soul a full deliverance brings;And through the vacant cells the song of triumph rings;The Comforter has come!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O boundless Love divine! how shall this tongue of mineTo wondering mortals tell the matchless grace divine:That I, a child of hell, should in His image shine!The Comforter has come!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The love of God is greater far

Than tongue or pen can ever tell.

It goes beyond the highest star

And reaches to the lowest hell.

The guilty pair, bowed down with care,

God gave His Son to win;

His erring child He reconciled

And pardoned from his sin.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
O love of God, how rich and pure!

How measureless and strong!

It shall forevermore endure—

The saints’ and angels’ song.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
Verse 1
english.lyrics: Each day I'll do a golden deed,By helping those who are in need;My life on earth is but a span,And so I'll do the best I can,

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Life's evening sun is sinking low,A few more days and I must go,To meet the deeds that I have done,Where there will be no setting sun.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: To be a child of God each day,My light must shine along the way;I'll sing His praise while ages rollAnd strive to help some troubled soul.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The only life that will endure,Is one that's kind and good and pure;And so for God I'll take my stand,Each day I'll lend a helping hand.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: I'll help some one in time of need,And journey on with rapid speed;I'll help the sick and poor and weak,And words of kindness to them speak.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: While going down life's weary road,I'll try to lift some trav'ler's load;I'll try to turn the night to day,Make flowers bloom along the way.

englishTitle: THE BATTLE HYMN OF THE REPUBLIC

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Mine eyes have seen the glory of the coming of the Lord;He is trampling out the vintage where the grapes of wrath are stored;He hath loosed the fateful lightning of his terrible swift sword:His truth is marching on.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Glory! Glory! Hallelujah!Glory! Glory! Hallelujah!Glory! Glory! Hallelujah!His truth is marching on.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Have seen him in the watch-fires of a hundred circling camps;They have builded him an altar in the evening dews and damps;I can read the righteous sentence by the dim and flaring lamps;His day is marching on.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: He has sounded forth the trumpet that shall never call retreat;He is sifting out the hearts of all before his judgment seat;O be swift, my soul, to answer him; be jubilant, my feet!Our God is marching on.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: In the beauty of the lilies Christ was born across the sea,With a glory in his bosom that transfigures you and me;As he died to make us holy, let us die that all be free!While God is marching on.

number: 269: THE BATTLE HYMN OF THE REPUBLIC

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Mighty army of the young,Lift the voice in cheerful song,Send the welcome word along,Jesus lives!Once he died for you and me,Bore our sins upon the tree,Now he lives to make us free, Jesus lives!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Wait not till the shadows lengthen, till you older grow,Rally now and sing for Jesus, ev'rywhere you go;Lift your joyful voices high,Ringing clear thro' earth and sky,Let the blessed tidings fly, Jesus lives!Wait not till the shadows lengthen, till you older grow,Rally now and sing for Jesus, ev'rywhere you go;Lift your joyful voices high,Ringing clear thro' earth and sky,Let the blessed tidings fly, Jesus lives!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Tongues of children light and free,Tongues of youth all full of glee,Sing to all on land and sea,Jesus lives!Light for you and all mankind,Sight for all by sin made blind,Life in Jesus all may find,Jesus lives!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jesus lives, O blessed words!King of kings and Lord of lords!Lift the cross and sheathe the swords,Jesus lives!See, He breaks the prison wall,Throws aside the dreadful pall,Conquers death at once for all,Jesus lives!

englishTitle: HIS NAME IS WONDERFUL/O HOW I LOVE JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There is a name I love to hear,I love to sing its worth;it sounds like music in my ear,the sweetest name on earth.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O how I love Jesus,O how I love Jesus,O how I love Jesus,because he first loved me!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: It tells me of a Savior's love,who died to set me free;it tells me of his precious blood,the sinner's perfect plea.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: It tells of one whose loving heartcan feel my deepest woe;who in each sorrow bears a partthat none can bear below.

number: 271: HIS NAME IS WONDERFUL/O HOW I LOVE JESUS

englishTitle: LORD I WANT TO BE A CHRISTIAN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Lord, I want to be a ChristianIn my heart, in my heart.Lord, I want to be a Christian in my heart.In my heart, in my heart,Lord, I want to be a Christian in my heart.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Lord, I want to be more lovingIn my heart, in my heart.Lord, I want to be more loving in my heart.In my heart, in my heart,Lord, I want to be more loving in my heart.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Lord, I want to be more holyin my heart, in my heart.Lord, I want to be more holy in my heart.In my heart, in my heart,Lord, I want to be more holy in my heart.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Lord, I want to be like JesusIn my heart, in my heart.Lord, I want to be like Jesus in my heart.In my heart, in my heart,Lord, I want to be like Jesus in my heart.

number: 272: LORD I WANT TO BE A CHRISTIAN

englishTitle: WILL THERE BE ANY STARS IN MY CROWN?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I am thinking today of that beautiful landI shall reach when the sun goeth down;When thro' wonderful grace by my Savior I stand,Will there be any stars in my crown?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Will there be any stars, any stars in my crownWhen at evening the sun goeth down?When I wake with the blest in the mansions of rest,Will there be any stars in my crown?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In the strength of the Lord let me labor and pray,Let me watch as a winner of souls;That bright stars may be mine in the glorious day,When His praise like the sea-billow rolls.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh, what joy it will be when His face I behold,Living gems at His feet to lay down;It would sweeten my bliss in the city of gold,Should there be any stars in my crown.

number: 273: WILL THERE BE ANY STARS IN MY CROWN?

englishTitle: HE WHISPERS SWEET PEACE TO ME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Sometime when misgivings darken the day,And faith's light I cannot see;I ask my dear Lord to brighten the way,He whispers sweet peace to me

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He whispers sweet peace to me,He whispers sweet peace to me,And thro'His blest word He strengthens my soul,He whispers sweet peace to me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I could not go on without Him I know,The world would o'erwhelm my soul;His word is a lamp and brightens the way,It points to the heav'nly goal.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I trust Him thru faith, by faith hold His hand,By faith I will travel on;I'll trust in His word, obey His commands,'Till vict'ry I shall have won.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: He speaks thru His word, assurance He gives,I'm His and I know He's mind;And safe in the fold my soul he will keep,I'll rest in His love divine.

number: 274: HE WHISPERS SWEET PEACE TO ME

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
The joy of heaven (The joy of heav'n)

Is rising swelling (it rises swells)

Within my heart (In my heart)

To every surge and roll

(To ever surge and roll)

It gives me vict'ry (Gives victory)

O'er sin and evil (o'er ev'ry sin)

And ever floods my happy newborn soul

(And it floods my happy newborn soul)

The loving Savior (Savior) leads me

By His Spirit here

His love divine I see (love I see)

In ev'ry place (each place)

Oh hallelujah (Oh praise His name)

Oh glory glory (I'm glad He came)

I praise the Lord (praise Him for)

For His amazing grace (His grace)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The joy of heaven is swelling

In my soul ev'ry day 'tis swelling

Sweeter it grows to me and daily o'erflows

The love that saved me

I'm telling all along on my way

I'm glad for Jesus' amazing grace to me

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
This joy of heaven is given

By the Spirit within abiding

Grace to my heart

So freely He doth impart

And with my spirit bears witness

That I'm saved from all sin

I'm glad for Jesus' amazing grace to me

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The joy of heaven like billows

Ever rolls on and on increasing

Glory so free 'tis ever bringing to me

This great salvation will keep me

Till life's morning shall dawn

I'm glad for Jesus' amazing grace to me

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: He who would valiant be 'gainst all disaster,let him in constancy follow the Master.There's no discouragement shall make him once relentHis first avowed intent to be a pilgrim

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Who so beset him round with dismal stories,Do but themselves confound, his strength the more is.No foes shall stay his might, though he with giants fight;he will make good his right to be a pilgrim.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Since, Lord, Thou dost defend us with Thy Spirit,We know we at the end shall life inherit.Then, fancies, flee away! I'll fear not what men say,I'll labor night and day to be a pilgrim.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus, oh Jesus

Do you know Him today

Please don’t turn Him away

Oh Jesus, my Jesus

Without Him how lost would I be

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Without Him I could do nothing

Without Him I’d surely fail

Oh, Without Him I would be drifting

Like a ship without a sail

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Without Him I would be dying

Without Him I’d be enslaved

And without Him my life would be worthless

But with Jesus, thank God I am saved

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
That’s why I cry Jesus, oh Jesus

Do you know Him today

Please don’t turn Him away

Oh Jesus, my Jesus

Without Him how lost would I be

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: In faith she touched the hem of His garmentAs to His side she stole,Amid the crowd that gathered around Him,And straightway she was whole.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I’ve touched the hem of His garment,And now I, too, am free;His healing pow’r this very hourGives life and health to me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: She came with fear and trembling before Him—She knew her Lord had come;She felt that from Him virtue had healed her,The mighty deed was done.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: He turned with, “Daughter, be of good comfort,Thy faith hath made thee whole,”And peace which passeth all understandingWith gladness filled her soul.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Happiness is to know the SaviorLiving a life within His favorHaving a change in my behaviorHappiness is the Lord

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Happiness is a new creationJesus and me in close relationHaving a part in His salvationHappiness is the Lord

(Bridge)Real joy is mineNo matter if teardrops startI've found the secretIt's Jesus in my heart

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Happiness is to be forgivenLiving a life that's worth the livin'Taking a trip that leads to heavenHappiness is the Lord

(Ending)Happiness is the LordHappiness is the Lord

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Time is filled with swift transition.Naught of earth unmoved can stand.Build your hopes on things eternal.Hold to God’s unchanging hand.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Hold to His hand, God’s unchanging hand.Hold to His hand, God’s unchanging hand.Build your hopes on things eternal.Hold to God’s unchanging hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Trust in Him who will not leave you.Whatsoever years may bring.If by earthly friends forsaken,Still more closely to Him cling.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Covet not this world’s vain richesThat so rapidly decay.Seek to gain the heav’nly treasures.They will never pass away.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When your journey is completed,If to God you have been true,Fair and bright the home in GloryYour enraptured soul will view.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I’m going home to Jesus, I’m near the river’s side;A little while to tarry and then I’ll cross the tideTo dwell with Him forever where all the saved abide,All praise to my Redeemer, I’m going home.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I’m going home, I’m going home,To wear a robe in glory, I’m going home,I’m going home, I’m going home,All praise to my Redeemer, I’m going home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I’m going home to Jesus, the precious Son of God,Who, for a world’s transgressions alone the winepress trod,Who, on the cross of anguish so freely spilled His blood,All praise to my Redeemer, I’m going home.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I’m going home to Jesus, of all my joys the Spring,With joyful hallelujahs the courts of bliss shall ring,When in His wondrous beauty I see my Lord and King.All praise to my Redeemer, I’m going home.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: I’m going home to Jesus with burdens all laid down,And in that home of beauty, that land of high renown,The mighty King of Glory His ransomed child shall crown,All praise to my Redeemer, I’m going home.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When I fear my faith will fail,Christ will hold me fast;When the tempter would prevail,He can hold me fast!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He will hold me fast,He will hold me fast;For my Savior loves me so,He will hold me fast.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I could never keep my hold,He must hold me fast;For my love is often cold,He must hold me fast.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I am precious in His sight,He will hold me fast;Those He saves are His delight,He will hold me fast.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: He'll not let my soul be lost,Christ will hold me fast;Bought by Him at such a cost,He will hold me fast.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I’ve never been sorryThat I trusted His nameEv’ry moment I find HimExactly the sameMy soul has been singingSince the Saviour cameI’ve never been sorryThat I trusted His name

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Ever since Jesus saved and pardonedI have been singing ev’ry dayI’ve never been sorryThat I trusted His nameThru the dark shadows He is with meLeading me on the upward wayI’ve never been sorryThat I trusted His name

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: All the day long I sing the storyPraising Him for His wondrous loveI’ve never been sorryThat I trusted His nameSurely I know a home is waitingBeautiful home in heav’n aboveI’ve never been sorryThat I trusted His name

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Brightly the star of hope is shining

Making my pathway brighter growI’ve never been sorryThat I trusted His nameNever a thot of sad repiningJesus is with me this I know

I’ve never been sorryThat I trusted His name

englishTitle: I’VE GOT THAT OLD TIME RELIGION IN MY HEART

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I'm glad Jesus came

Glory to His name

Oh what a Friend is He

He so freely gave

His own life to save

From bonds of sin set free

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
And I've got that old time religion in my heart

And it's way down inside

I've got that new kind of feeling in my heart

Real love abides

Nobody knows what it means to me

Nobody knows but my God and me

I've got that old time religion in my heart

And it's way down inside

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
What a joy to know one

Who loves us so

He is so kind and true

He has changed my life

From all sin and strife

He'll do the same for you

number: 284: I’VE GOT THAT OLD TIME RELIGION IN MY HEART

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Help me, O, Lord, to do Thy will,

Humbly now I pray;

Help me, to Thee, my service give

All along my way;

That I, O, Lord, may live for Thee,

Do Thy blest command

When trying moments come to me,

Help me, Lord, to stand.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Help me, (help me) O, Lord, (O Lord) to stand each tempest shock

That comes (that comes) along my way, (along my way)

Help me (Help me) to stand (to stand) upon the solid Rock,

And live (and live) for Thee (for thee) each day, (for Thee each day)

Be Thou (be thou) my guiding (my giuiding star) Star, (my guiding Star)

And hold (and hold) me by (me by) Thy hand, (yes, by Thy hand)

And when (and when) I face (I face) the judgment,(the judgement, judgment bar)

Help me, (help me) O, Lord (o Lord), to stand, (to bravely stand)

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Help me when I am prone to stray

From Thy blessed fold,

Help me to walk in Thine own way

To the gates of gold

And when I’m burdened down with care,

Hold me by Thy hand;

And when my load is hard to bear,

Help me, Lord, to stand.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Help me to walk the narrow road,

Lord, I humbly pray.

Help me to bear some others’ load struggling in the way;

Help me to build upon the Rock,

Not upon the sand.

And when shall come the tempest shock,

Help me, Lord to stand.

englishTitle: I WANT TO KNOW MORE ABOUT MY LORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
While travelling through this world of sorrow

I'm on my way to gloryland

I'll not turn back for some tomorrow

My trials here I'll understand

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I want to know more (I want to know more) about my Jesus (yes I do)

I want to know more (yes I want to know more) about my Lord (my blessed Lord)

I want to know more (I want to know more) about that mansion (heavenly mansion)

I'm gonna receive (I'm gonna receive) as my reward (my rich reward)

I want to know more (I want to know more) about that homeland (wonderful homeland)

I mean to go there (I mean to go there) someday, somehow (someday, somehow)

And after I reach (and after I reach) that heavenly city (heavenly city)

I mean to know more (yes I'm gonna know more) that I know now (than I know now)

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I'm glad I know the blessed savior

For through His blood He set me free

Though rough the road I shall not waiver

For some glad day His face I'll see

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
He promised when His soul ascended

""I'm coming back"" the Lord did say

If on His promise you've depended

On wings of love you'll soar away

number: 286: I WANT TO KNOW MORE ABOUT MY LORD

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Never give up,Never give up,Never give up to thy sorrows,Jesus will bid them depart;Trust in the Lord,Trust in the Lord,Sing when your trials are greatest,Trust in the Lord and take heart.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: What if thy burdens oppress thee;What though thy life may be drear;Look on the side that is brightest,Pray, and thy path will be clear.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Never be sad or desponding,There is a morrow for thee;Soon thou shalt dwell in its brightness,There with the Lord thou shalt be.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Never be sad or desponding,Lean on the arm of thy Lord;Dwell in the depths of His mercy,Thou shalt receive thy reward.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The Son of man hath come to thee,Has burst thy bonds and set thee free,There’s safety in His blood alone;Just look to God, keep pressing on.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Keep pressing on, keep pressing on,Hold on to Him with all thy might;Keep pressing on, keep pressing on,You’re safe while walking in the light.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The evil works with all his pow’rTo cast us down our souls devour,But when we look to God alone,He’ll keep us safe and lead us on.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Keep trav’ling on the upward road;Just cast on Him your ev’ry load,Now is the time, O do prepareTo meet your Saviour in the air.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
He’ll lift you up and make you stand,And shout His praise here in this land;Yes, wheresoe’er you may be found,Shout out His praise the world around.











.

englishTitle: I’LL MEET YOU IN THE MORNING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I will meet you in the morning by the bright riverside

When all sorrow has drifted away

I'll be standing at the portals when the gates open wide

At the close of life's long dreary day

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I'll meet you in the morning with a "How do you do?"

And we'll sit down by the river and with rapture old acquaintance renew

You'll know me in the morning by the smile that I wear

When I meet you in the morning in the city that is built four square

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I will meet you in the morning at the end of the way

On the streets of that city of gold

Where we all can bе together and be happy always

Whilе the years and the ages shall roll

number: 289: I’LL MEET YOU IN THE MORNING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O for that flame of living fireWhich shone so bright in saints of old;Which bade their souls to heaven aspire,Calm in distress, in danger bold!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Where is that spirit, Lord, which dweltIn Abram’s breast, and sealed Him Thine?Which made Paul’s heart with sorrow melt,And glow with energy divine?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: That spirit which from age to ageProclaimed Thy love, and taught Thy ways?Brightened Isaiah’s vivid page,And breathed in David’s hallowed lays?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Is not Thy grace as mighty nowAs when Elijah felt its power?When glory beamed from Moses’ brow,Or Job endured the trying hour?

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Remember, Lord, the ancient days;Renew Thy work, Thy grace restore;And while to Thee our hearts we raise,On us Thy Holy Spirit pour.

englishTitle: SINCE HE GAVE ME THIS HEART OF LOVE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I'm rejoicing in the Savior every moment of the day,

Since He gave me this heart of love;

On andon we walk together in the hallelujah way,

Since He gave me this heart of love

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Since He gave me this heart of love

Clouds no longer are dark above

There is something I can feel,

That lets me know that God is real

Since He gave me this heart of love

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I can tell the world the story how the blessed Savior came,

Since He gave me this heart of love

How he took away my burdens, lifted me from sin and shame

Since He gave me this heart of love

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Having changed my way of living there is flory all around,

Since He gave me this heart of love

Feel the Spirit moving when He sends the blessing down,

Since He gave me this heart of love

number: 291: SINCE HE GAVE ME THIS HEART OF LOVE

englishTitle: O I WANT TO SEE HIM

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: As I journey through the land singing as I go,Pointing souls to Calvary– to the crimson flow,Many arrows pierce my soul from without, within;But my Lord leads me on, through Him I must win.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Oh, I want to see Him, look upon His face,There to sing forever of His saving grace;On the streets of Glory let me lift my voice;Cares all past, home at last, ever to rejoice.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When in service for my Lord dark may be the night,But I'll cling more close to Him, He will give me light;Satan's snares may vex my soul, turn my thoughts aside;But my Lord goes ahead, leads whate'er betide.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When in valleys low I look toward the mountain height,And behold my Savior there, leading in the fight,With a tender hand outstretched toward the valley low,Guiding me, I can see as I onward go.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When before me billows rise from the mighty deep,Then my Lord directs my bark; He doth safely keep,And He leads me gently on through this world below;He's a real friend to me, oh, I love Him so.

number: 292: O I WANT TO SEE HIM

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I'd rather have Jesus than silver or gold;I'd rather be His than have riches untold;I'd rather have Jesus than houses or lands.I'd rather be led by His nail pierced hand

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Than to be the king of a vast domainOr be held in sin's dread sway.I'd rather have Jesus than anythingThis world affords today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I'd rather have Jesus than men's applause;I'd rather be faithful to His dear cause;I'd rather have Jesus than worldwide fame.I'd rather be true to His holy name

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: He's fairer than lilies of rarest bloom;He's sweeter than honey from out the comb;He's all that my hungering spirit needs.I'd rather have Jesus and let Him lead

englishTitle: JESUS IS ALL THE WORLD TO ME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus is all the world to me,My life, my joy, my all;He is my strength from day to day,Without him I would fall:When I am sad, to him I go,No other one can cheer me so;When I am sad, he makes me glad,He's my friend.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Jesus is all the world to me,My friend in trials sore;I go to him for blessings, andHe gives them o'er and o'er:He sends the sunshine and the rain,He sends the harvest's golden grain;Sunshine and rain, harvest of grain,He's my friend.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jesus is all the world to me,And true to him I'll be;Oh, how could I this friend deny,When he's so true to me?Following him I know I'm right,He watches o'er me day and night;Following him by day and night,He's my friend.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Jesus is all the world to me,I want no better friend;I trust him now, I'll trust him whenLife's fleeting days shall end:Beautiful life with such a friend,Beautiful life that has no end;Eternal life, eternal joy,He's my friend.

number: 294: JESUS IS ALL THE WORLD TO ME

englishTitle: TELL ME THE OLD, OLD STORY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 Tell me the old, old storyOf unseen things above,Of Jesus and His glory,Of Jesus and His love.Tell me the story simply,As to a little child;For I am weak and weary,And helpless and defiled.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Tell me the old, old story;Tell me the old, old story,Tell me the old, old storyOf Jesus and His love.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Tell me the story slowly,That I may take it in -That wonderful redemption,God's remedy for sin.Tell me the story often,For I forget so soon;The early dew of morningHas passed away at noon.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Tell me the same old storyWhen you have cause to fearThat this world's empty gloryIs costing me too dear.Tell me the story always,If you would really be,In any time of trouble,A comforter to me.

number: 295: TELL ME THE OLD, OLD STORY

englishTitle: BELIEVE ON THE LORD JESUS CHRIST

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Believe on the Lord Jesus Christand thou shalt be saved,Believe that His love has sufficed,and thou shalt be saved;His wonderful love is unspoken,His promise has never been broken,Then come with faith as your token,and thou shalt be saved.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Believe on the Lord,believe on the Lord,believe on the Lord Jesus Christ, and thou shalt be saved;Believe on the Lord,believe on the Lord,believe on the Lord Jesus Christ, and be saved.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Denying thyself, take His word,and thou shalt be saved,In all things have faith in the Lord,and thou shalt be saved;‘Tis written He said, “whosoever;”O then be your earnest endeavor,Your heart from all evil to sever,and thou shalt be saved.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Walk humbly before Him alway,and thou shalt be saved,His ev’ry commandment obey,and thou shalt be saved;Believe in His blessed salvation,Proclaim Him your only oblation,To Him give a life-consecration,and thou shalt be saved.

number: 296: BELIEVE ON THE LORD JESUS CHRIST

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Stand up and shout it if you love my Jesus,Stand up and shout it if you love my Lord, oh,I want to know, oh, I want to know do you love my Lord

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Sit down and listen if you love my Jesus,Sit down and listen if you love my Lord, oh,I want to know, oh, I want to know do you love my Lord.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Go tell your neighbor if you love my Jesus,Go tell your neightbor if you love my Lord, oh,I want to know, oh, I want to know do you love my Lord.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Go out and live it if you love my Jesus,Go out and live it if you love my Lord, oh,I want to know, oh, I want to know do you love my Lord.

Coda:He's my rock, my sword, my shield,He's my wheel in the middle of the wheel,He's the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.Makes no difference what they say,I'm gonna love Him ev'ry day,He's my rock, my sword, my shield, Praise the Lord.

englishTitle: WE SHALL STAND BEFORE THE KING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: We shall stand before the King,With the angels we shall sing,By and by, By and by!Walk the bright, the golden shore,Praising Him for ever more,By and by, By and by!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :We shall stand before the King,With the angels we shall sing;Glory, glory to our King!Hallelujah! Hallelujah!We shall stand before the King.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Ring, ye bells of heaven, ring!We shall stand before the King,By and by, By and by!There our sorrows will be o’er;There His name we will adore,By and by, By and by!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Wake, my soul! Thy tribute bring;Thou shalt stand before the King,By and by, By and by!Lay thy trophies at His feet;In His likeness stand complete,By and by, By and by!

number: 299: WE SHALL STAND BEFORE THE KING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: City of God, how broad and faroutspread thy walls sublime!The true thy chartered freemen areof every age and clime:

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: One holy church, one army strong,one steadfast, high intent;one working band, one harvest-song,one King omnipotent.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: How purely hath thy speech come downfrom man's primaeval youth!How grandly hath thine empire grownof freedom, love, and truth!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: How gleam thy watch-fires through the nightwith never-fainting ray!How rise thy towers, serene and bright,to meet the dawning day!

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: In vain the surge's angry shock,in vain the drifting sands:unharmed upon the eternal Rockthe eternal city stands.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I'm satisfied with just a cottage below

A little silver and a little gold

But in that city where the ransomed will shine

I want a gold one that's silver lined

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I've got a mansion just over the hilltop

In that bright land where we'll never grow old

And some day yonder we will never more wander

But walk on streets that are purest gold

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Don't think me poor or deserted or lonely

I'm not discouraged I'm heaven bound

I'm but a pilgrim in search of the city

I want a mansion, a harp and a crown

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I've got a mansion just over the hilltop

In that bright land where we'll never grow old

And some day yonder we will never more wander

But walk on streets that are purest gold

englishTitle: I DREAMT I SEARCHED HEAVEN FOR YOU

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I dreamed I had gone to that city

That city where never comes night

And I saw the bright angels in glory

I saw the fair mansions of light

I gazed for long, long years of rapture

On the face of my Savior so true

And I sang with the seraphim holy

Then I dreamed I searched Heaven for you.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I dreamed I searched Heaven for you

Searched vainly through Heaven for you

Oh won't you prepare to meet me up there?

Lest we should search Heaven for you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I looked on both sides of the river

That flows through the city of God

I searched through bright mansions celestial

And streets of gold pavement I trod

The faces of saints by the million

I scanned in my yearning to see

That face I had cherished so fondly

The face that had grown dear to me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I asked of ten thousand sweet angels

Have you seen this beloved one, pray tell?

Have you met in the bright courts of Heaven

That one whom on earth we loved well?

They shook their heads sadly and told me

That they had not seen you, and then

I knew that somewhere in the darkness

You wandered, lost in your sin.

number: 304: I DREAMT I SEARCHED HEAVEN FOR YOU

englishTitle: THE THINGS I CANNOT DO ALONE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Lord, I would not ask a special blessing Ev by time some service

should be done; But I often need Thy loving coun-selIn the

thinga I can-not do alone.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When I'm ached with mor-tal pain and sor-row, May spend a moment

at Thy throne: Pleading only for Thy tender mercy

In the pain I can-not bear alone.

english.title: Verse  3
english.lyrics:
When my task was greater than my courage, And the world would turn my

heart to stone; Be Thou near, O Lord, and gently lead me In the

path I can-not walk alone.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I do not ask for strength to move a

moun-tain, nor earthly fame or for tune of my own;

I only ask for added strength and courage in the things

I cannot do alone

number: 305: THE THINGS I CANNOT DO ALONE

englishTitle: SHOW A LITTLE BIT OF LOVE AND KINDNESS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Sing a song, spread some cheer,There are sad and lonely people ev’rywhere;Be a friend, show some love,It will lift them from the dungeons of despair.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Show a little bit of love and kindness,Never go along with hatred’s blindness,Take a little time to reach for joy and wear a happy face;Sing a little bit when the days are dreary,Give a little help to a friend who’s weary –That’s the way to make the world a happy place.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Offer help, bring some hope,To the fainting and discouraged on life’s road;See a need, lend a hand,There are many who are crushed beneath their load.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Be a light, show the way,Be a light within the night for those astray;Speak a word, loving word,That will bring them back to walk the narrow way.

number: 306: SHOW A LITTLE BIT OF LOVE AND KINDNESS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: If the world from you withhold of its silver and its gold,And you have to get along with meager fare,Just remember, in His Word, how He feeds the little bird,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Leave it there, leave it there,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.If you trust and never doubt, He will surely bring you out,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: If your body suffers pain and your health you can’t regain,And your soul is almost sinking in despair,Jesus knows the pain you feel, He can save and He can heal,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When your enemies assail and your heart begins to fail,Don’t forget that God in heaven answers prayer;He will make a way for you and will lead you safely through,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When your youthful days are gone and old age is stealing on,And your body bends beneath the weight of care,He will never leave you then, He’ll go with you to the end,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Kneel at the cross,Christ will meet you there,Come while He waits for you;List to His voice,Leave with Him your careAnd begin life anew.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Kneel at the cross,Leave ev'ry care;Kneel at the cross,Jesus will meet you there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Kneel at the cross,There is room for allWho would His glory share;Bliss there awaits,Harm can ne'er befallThose who are anchored there.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Kneel at the cross,Give your idols up,Look unto realms above;Turn not awayTo life's sparkling cup;Trust only in His love.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: They who know the Savior shall in Him be strong,Mighty in the conflict of the right ’gainst wrong;This the blessed promise given in God’s Word,Doing wondrous exploits, they who know the Lord.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Victory! victory! Blessed, blood-bought victory!Victory! victory! Vict’ry all the time!As Jehovah liveth, strength divine He givethUnto those who know Him—vict’ry all the time!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In the midst of battle be thou not dismayed,Though the pow’rs of darkness ’gainst thee are arrayed;God, thy Strength, is with thee, causing thee to stand,Heaven’s allied armies wait at thy command.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Brave to bear life’s testing, strong the foe to meet,Walking like a hero midst the furnace heat,Doing wondrous exploits with the Spirit’s sword,Winning souls for Jesus, praise, oh, praise the Lord!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: They who know the Savior shall in Him be strong,Mighty in the conflict of the right ’gainst wrong;This the blessed promise given in God’s Word,Doing wondrous exploits, they who know the Lord.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Victory! victory! Blessed, blood-bought victory!Victory! victory! Vict’ry all the time!As Jehovah liveth, strength divine He givethUnto those who know Him—vict’ry all the time!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In the midst of battle be thou not dismayed,Though the pow’rs of darkness ’gainstthee are arrayed;God, thy Strength, is with thee, causing thee to stand,Heaven’s allied armies wait at thy command.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Brave to bear life’s testing, strong the foe to meet,Walking like a hero midst the furnace heat,Doing wondrous exploits with the Spirit’s sword,Winning souls for Jesus, praise, oh, praise the Lord!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Lord, I would be wholly Thine,I would do Thy will divine,From the world and sin and self I would be free;On the altar now I lie,And with all my heart I cry,Let the holy fire from heaven fall on me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Let the fire fall on me,Let the fire fall on me;The fire of Pentecost,Consuming sin and dross,Let the holy fire from heaven fall on me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I would have sufficient graceEvery foe to bravely face,And an overcomer evermore to be;That I well may fill my place,And that I may win the race,Let the holy fire from heaven fall on me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Holy Spirit from above,Fill my longing soul with love,Till the Master’s image all in me may see;Make me gentle, true, and kind,Meek of heart, and humble mindLet the holy fire from heaven fall on me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: In the kingdom I would stay,There to labor night and day,Any way and anywhere Thy will may be;But that I may do my best,And that others may be blest,Let the holy fire from heaven fall on me.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I'm only human, I'm just a woman

Help me believe in what I could be and all that I am

Show me the stairway I have to climb

Lord, for my sake, teach me to take one day at a time

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
One day at a time, sweet Jesus

That's all I'm asking from You

Just give me the strength to do everyday

What I have to do

Yesterday's gone, sweet Jesus

And tomorrow may never be mine (Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh)

Lord, help me today, show me the way

One day at a time

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Do You remember when You walked among men?

Well Jesus, You know, if You're looking below, it's worse now than then

Cheating and stealing, violence and crime (Ah-ah-ah-ah)

So for my sake, teach me to take one day at a time

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Central’s never “busy,” always on the line;You may hear from heaven almost any time;’Tis a royal service, free for one and all;When you get in trouble, give this royal line a call.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Telephone to glory, oh, what joy divine!I can feel the current moving on the line,Built by God the Father for His loved and own,We may talk to Jesus through this royal telephone.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There will be no charges, telephone is free,It was built for service, just for you and me;There will be no waiting on this royal line,Telephone to glory always answers just in time.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Fail to get the answer, Satan’s crossed your wire,By some strong delusion, or some base desire;Take away obstructions, God is on the throne,And you’ll get your answer through this royal telephone.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: If your line is “grounded,” and connection trueHas been lost with Jesus, tell you what to do:Prayer and faith and promise mend the broken wire,Till your soul is burning with the Pentecostal fire.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Carnal combinations cannot get controlOf this line to glory, anchored in the soul;Storm and trial cannot disconnect the line,Held in constant keeping by the Father’s hand divine.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: You have heard of little Moses in the bulrush,You have heard of fearless David and his sling;You have heard the story told of dreaming Joseph,And of Jonah and the whale you often sing.There are many, many others thru the Bible,I should like to meet them all, I do declare!By and by the Lord will surely let us meet themAt the meeting in the air.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: There is going to be a meeting in the air,In the sweet, sweet by and by;I am going to meet you, meet you thereIn that home beyond the sky,Such singing you will hear, never heard by mortal ear'Twill be glorious, I do declare!And God's own Son will be the leading OneAt the meeting in the air.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Many things will there be missing, in that meeting,For the mourner's bench will have no place at all;There will never be a sermon preached to sinners,For the sinner had refused to heed the call.There will be no mourning over wayward loved ones,There will be no lonely nights of pleading prayer;All our burdens and our anguish will be liftedAt the meeting in the air.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: There the doubters will be missing altogether,All the skeptics will be absent on that day;There will be no grumblers present to disturb us,And the Achans will be busy far away.There the saints will have His "Seal upon their foreheads",Dressed in raiment none but ransomed ones can wear;All who have the wedding garments will be presentAt the meeting in the air

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Living in Thee, Lord, and Thou in me;Constant abiding, this is my plea;Grant me Thy power, boundless and free:Power with men and power with Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Power in prayer, Lord, power in prayer,Here 'mid earth's sin and sorrow and care;Men lost and dying, souls in despair;O give me power, power in prayer!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: My weakened will, Lord, Thou canst renew;My sinful nature Thou canst subdue;Fill me just now with power anew,Power to pray and power to do!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray;Thou art my pattern, day unto day;Thou art my surety, now and for aye;Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O land of rest, for thee I sigh!When will the moment comeWhen I shall lay my armor byAnd dwell in peace at home?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
We’ll work till Jesus comes,We’ll work till Jesus comes,We’ll work till Jesus comes,And we’ll be gathered home.

No tranquil joys on earth I know,No peaceful, shelt’ring dome;This world’s a wilderness of woe,This world is not my home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: To Jesus Christ I fled for rest;He bade me cease to roam,And lean for comfort on His breastTill He conduct me home.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I sought at once my Savior’s side;No more my steps shall roam;With Him I’ll brave death’s chilling tideAnd reach my heav’nly home.

englishTitle: HIS LOVE IS WONDERFUL TO ME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 Love divine! Oh, sing the wondrous story,Far and near the glorious news proclaim;How for us God’s only Son was given,Bringing life to all who trust His name.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :His love is wonderful to me,His love is wonderful to me;For Jesus loved me so,He did to Calv’ry go;His love is wonderful to me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Love divine, ‘twas manifest in JesusAs He walked and talked by Galilee;He who knew no sin became my Saviour,On the cross He “paid it all” for me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Love divine, the balm for ev’ry heartache,Love divine, the refuge of my soul;Take my life, possess my inmost nature,Over all my being have control.

number: 318: HIS LOVE IS WONDERFUL TO ME

english.title: Verse 1
