Somebody needs your love.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Joys are flowing like a riversince the Comforter has come,who abides with us forever,makes the trusting heart a home.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Blessed quietness, holy quietnesswhat assurance in my soul!On the stormy sea speaking peace to mehow the billows cease to roll!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Like the rain that falls from heaven,like the sunlight from the sky,so the Holy Ghost is given,coming on us from on high.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: See, a fruitful field is growing,blessed fruit of righteousness,and the streams of life are flowingin the lonely wilderness.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: What a wonderful salvation,where we always see God’s face!What a perfect habitation,what a quiet resting place!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Beneath the cross of JesusI fain would take my stand,the shadow of a mighty Rockwithin a weary land;a home within the wilderness,a rest upon the way,from the burning of the noontide heatand the burden of the day.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Upon the cross of Jesusmine eye at times can seethe very dying form of Onewho suffered there for me:and from my stricken heart with tearstwo wonders I confess,the wonders of redeeming loveand my unworthiness.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I take, O cross, thy shadowfor my abiding place:I ask no other sunshine thanthe sunshine of his face;content to let the world go by,to know no gain nor loss;my sinful self my only shame,my glory all the cross.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I have found a joy in serviceThis dear world is much to me;All its pleasures are augmentedSince the light of truth I see,Tho’ my friends despise, forsake me,And on me the world looks cold;Spirit friends will forget meWhen the pearly gates unfold.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Life’s morn will soon be waning,And its evening bells will toll;But my heart will know no sadnessWhen the pearly gates unfold.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When the voice of lov’d ones call me,And the angels whisper low;I will lean upon the dear ones,Thro’ the valley as I go;I will claim their precious promise,Worth to me a world of gold;“Fear no evil” “I’ll be with thee,”When the pearly gates unfold.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Just beyond the waves of Jordan,Just beyond the swelling tide;Blooms the tree of life immortal,And the living waters glide;In that happy land of spirits,Flowers bloom on hills of gold,And the angels are awaitingWhen the pearly gates unfold.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There is a Shepherd who cares for His own, and He is mine;Nothing am I, He’s a King on a throne, but He is mine;How can He love such a sinner as I, though He is mine,I cannot fathom though often I try, but He is mine.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He is mine; He is mine;Though it is wonderful, yet it is true,That He is mine.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Jesus left Heaven my Savior to be, and He is mine;I am not worth all He suffered for me, but He is mine;Though I’m not worthy He dwells in my heart, and He is mine;From Him I’ll never, no, never depart, for He is mine.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: There is a Comforter come from above, He, too, is mine,Coming to me to reveal Jesus’ love, and that is mine;Shepherd and Savior, and Comforter, too, They all are mine;That’s why I know the old story is true, They all are mine.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus, I am coming home today,For I have found there’s joy in Thee alone;From the path of sin I turn away,now I am coming home.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Jesus, I am coming home today,Never, nevermore from Thee to stray;Lord, I now accept Thy precious promise,I am coming home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Many years my heart has strayed from Thee,And Now repentant to Thy throne I come;Jesus opened up the way for me;Now I am coming home

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh, the misery my sin has caused me,Naught but pain and sorrow I have known;Now I seek Thy saving grace and mercy,I am coming home.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Fully trusting in Thy precious promise,With no righteousness to call my own,Pleading nothing but the blood of Jesus,I am coming home.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Now I seek the cross where Jesus died!For all my sins His blood will still atone,Flowing o’er till ev’ry stain is covered,I am coming home.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Hear ye the Master’s call, “Give Me thy best!”For, be it great or small, that is His test.Do then the best you can, not for reward,Not for the praise of men, but for the Lord.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Every work for Jesus will be blest,But He asks from everyone his best.Our talents may be few, these may be small,But unto Him is due our best, our all.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Wait not for men to laud, heed not their slight;Winning the smile of God brings its delight!Aiding the good and true ne’er goes unblest,All that we think or do, be it the best.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Night soon comes on apace, day hastens by;Workman and work must face testing on high.Oh, may we in that day find rest, sweet rest,Which God has promised those who do their best.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When the Saviour calls I will answer,When he calls for me I will hear,When the Saviour calls I will answer,I'll be somewhere list'ning for my name.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I'll be somewhere list'ning/2xI'll be somewhere list'ning for my name.(Oh for my name) I'll be somewhere list'ning/2xI'll be somewhere list'ning for my name.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
If my heart is right when He calls me

If my heart is righat I will hear

If ny heary is right when He calls me

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
If my robe is white when He calls me

If my robe is white I will hear

If my robe is white when He calls me

I’ll be somewhere listening for my name

englishTitle: WHERE EVER HE LEADS I’LL GO

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Take up thy cross and follow meI heard my Master sayI gave my life to ransom theeSurrender your all today

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Wherever He leads I'll goWherever He leads I'll goI'll follow my Christ who loves me soWherever He leads I'll go

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He drew me closer to His sideI sought His will to knowAnd in that will I now abideWherever He leads I'll go

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: It may be through the shadows dimOr o'er the stormy seaI take my cross and follow HimWherever He leadeth me

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: My heart my life my all I bringTo Christ who loves me soHe is my Master Lord and KingWherever He leads I'll go

number: 703: WHERE EVER HE LEADS I’LL GO

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Be not dismayed whate’er betide,God will take care of you;Beneath his wings of love abide,God will take care of you.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: God will take care of you,through ev'ry day, o’er all the way;He will take care of you,God will take care of you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Through days of toil when heart doth fail,God will take care of you;When dangers fierce your path assail,God will take care of you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: No matter what may be the test,God will take care of you;Lean, weary one, upon his breast,God will take care of you.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Soft as the voice of an angel,Breathing a lesson unheard,Hope with a gentle persuasion,Whispers her comforting word.Wait till the darkness is over,Wait till the tempest is done,Hope for the sunshine tomorrow,After the shower is gone.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Whispering HopeO how welcome thy voice,Making my heart in its sorrow rejoice.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: If in the dusk of the twilight,Dim be the region afar,Will not the deepening darknessBrighten the glimmering star?Then when the night is upon us,Why should the heart sink away?When the dark midnight is over,Watch for the breaking of day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Hope as an anchor so steadfast,Rends the dark veil for the soul,Whither the Master has entered,Robbing the grave of its goal.Come then, O come, glad fruition,Come to my sad weary heart,Come, O Thou blest hope of glory,Never, O never depart.O blessed Hope!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: All praise to Him who reigns aboveIn majesty supreme,Who gave His Son for man to die,That He might man redeem!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Blessed be the name! Blessed be the name!Blessed be the name of the Lord!Blessed be the name! Blessed be the name!Blessed be the name of the Lord!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: His name above all names shall stand,Exalted more and more,At God the Father’s own right hand,Where angel hosts adore.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Redeemer, Savior, friend of manOnce ruined by the fall,Thou hast devised salvation’s plan,For Thou hast died for all.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: His name shall be the Counselor,The mighty Prince of Peace,Of all earth’s kingdoms conqueror,Whose reign shall never cease.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Savior, ’tis a full surrender,All I leave to follow Thee;Thou my Leader and DefenderFrom this hour shalt ever be.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I surrender all!I surrender all!All I have I bring to Jesus,I surrender all.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: As I come in deep contrition,At this consecrated hour,Hear, O Christ, my heart’s petition,Let me feel the Spirit’s power!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: No withholding—full confession;Pleasures, riches, all must flee;Holy Spirit, take possession!I no more, but Thou in me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Oh, the joy of full salvation!Oh, the peace of love divine!Oh, the bliss of consecration!I am His, and He is mine.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Come with thy sins to the fountain,Come with thy burden of grief;Bury them deep in its waters,There thou wilt find a relief.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Haste thee away, why wilt thou stay?Risk not thy soul on a moment's delay;Jesus is waiting to save thee,Mercy is pleading today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Come as thou are to the fountain,Jesus is waiting for thee;What tho' thy sins are like crimson,White as the snow they shall be.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: These are the words of the Saviour;They who repent and believe,They who are willing to trust Him,Life at His hand shall receive.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Come and be healed at the fountain,List to the peace-speaking voice;Over a sinner returningNow let the angels rejoice.

englishTitle: WHEN THEY RING THE GOLDEN BELL

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There’s a land beyond the river,That we call the sweet forever,And we only reach that shore by faith’s decree;One by one we’ll gain the portals,There to dwell with the immortals,When they ring the golden bells for you and me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Don’t you hear the bells now ringing.Don’t you hear the angels singing?’Tis the glory hallelujah jubilee.In that far off sweet forever,Just beyond the shining river,When they ring the golden bells for you and me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: We shall know no sin or sorrow,In that haven of tomorrow,When our barque shall sail beyond the silver sea;We shall only know the blessingOf our Father’s sweet caressing,When they ring the golden bells for you and me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When our days shall know their number,And in death we sweetly slumber,When the King commands the spirit to be free;Nevermore with anguish laden,We shall reach that lovely Aiden,When they ring the golden bells for you and me.

number: 709: WHEN THEY RING THE GOLDEN BELL

englishTitle: I LOVE TO TELL THE STORY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I love to tell the story of unseen things above,

Of Jesus and His glory, of Jesus and His love.

I love to tell the story, because I know ’tis true;

It satisfies my longings as nothing else can do.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I love to tell the story,

’Twill be my theme in glory

To tell the old, old story

Of Jesus and His love.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I love to tell the story; more wonderful it seems

Than all the golden fancies of all my golden dreams,

I love to tell the story, it did so much for me;

And that is just the reason I tell it now to thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I love to tell the story; ’tis pleasant to repeat

What seems each time I tell it, more wonderfully sweet.

I love to tell the story; for some have never heard

The message of salvation from God’s own holy Word.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I love to tell the story; for those who know it best

Seem hungering and thirsting to hear it like the rest.

And when, in scenes of glory, I sing the new, new song,

’Twill be the old, old story, that I have loved so long.

number: 710: I LOVE TO TELL THE STORY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
You may have your worldly pleasures,

Your silver and your gold,

You may pile up all the riches that this old world can hold;

But I’d rather have my Savior, and with Him firmly stand,

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I want to be ready to meet Him by and by,

I want to be ready to meet Him in the sky,

O, I want to be more like Him, and do His blest command,

For I want to be ready to meet Him in the gloryland.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
You may talk about your riches,

Your diamonds and your pearls,

You may gain the wealth for ages of this and all the worlds,

But the Savior is more precious, with Him I’ll take my stand,

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
There is one thing I can boast of,

Salvation from the fall, I’m an heir to wealth in glory,

My Father owns it all;

That is why I’m shouting happy and go at His command,

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Conquering now and still to conquer, rideth a King in His might;Leading the host of all the faithful into the midst of the fight;See them with courage advancing, clad in their brilliant array,Shouting the Name of their Leader, hear them exultingly say:

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Not to the strong is the battle, not to the swift is the race,Yet to the true and the faithful vict’ry is promised thro' grace.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Conquering now and still to conquer, who is this wonderful King?Whence are the armies which He leadeth, while of His glory they sing?He is our Lord and Redeemer, Savior and Monarch divine;They are the stars that forever bright in His kingdom shall shine.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Conquering now and still to conquer, Jesus, Thou Ruler of all,Thrones and their scepters all shall perish, crowns and their splendor shall fall,Yet shall the armies Thou leadest, faithful and true to the last,Find in Thy mansions eternal rest, when their warfare is past.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord,a wonderful Savior to me.He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock,where rivers of pleasure I see.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rockthat shadows a dry, thirsty land.He hideth my life in the depths of his love,and covers me there with his hand,and covers me there with his hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord;he taketh my burden away.He holdeth me up, and I shall not be moved;he giveth me strength as my day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: With numberless blessings each moment he crowns,and filled with his fullness divine,I sing in my rapture,“Oh, glory to Godfor such a Redeemer as mine!”

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When clothed in his brightness, transported I riseto meet him in clouds of the sky,his perfect salvation, his wonderful love,I’ll shout with the millions on high.

englishTitle: YOU CAN TELL OUT THE SWEET STORY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 Tell out the wonderful story,Tell it where’er you go;Tell of the King and his glory,Tell how he loved us so.This is the story most precious,Jesus has died to redeem us;You can tell out the sweet story,You, yes, you.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: You can tell out the sweet story,You, yes, you.Somebody’s life will be brighter,Somebody’s care will be lighter;You can tell out the sweet story,You, yes, you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Never a story so wondrous,Tell it to all around;While we were sinners he loved us,Mercy and grace abound.Wandering and weary he sought us,Back to the Father he brought us;You can tell out the sweet story,You, yes, you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Wonderful story of Jesus,Tell every sin-sick soul;Wonderful message of mercy,Jesus can make them whole.Still flows the wonderful river,From every sin to deliver;You can tell out the sweet story,You, yes, you.

number: 715: YOU CAN TELL OUT THE SWEET STORY

englishTitle: THE LORD IS COMING BY AND BY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The Lord is coming by and by,Be ready when He comes;He comes from His fair home on high,Be ready when He comes;He is the Lord our Righteousness,And comes His chosen ones to bless,And at His Father’s throne confess;Be ready when He comes.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Will you be ready when the Bridegroom comes?/2xWill your lamps be trimmed and bright,Be it morning, noon or night?Will you be ready when the Bridegroom comes?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He soon will come to earth again,Be ready when He comes;Begin His universal reign,Be ready when He comes;With hallelujahs Heav’n will ring,When Jesus does redemption bring;O trim your lamps to meet your King!Be ready when He comes.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Behold! He comes to one and all,Be ready when He comes;He quickly comes with trumpet call,Be ready when He comes;To judgment called at His command,Drawn thither by His mighty hand,Before His throne we all must stand;Be ready when He comes.

number: 716: THE LORD IS COMING BY AND BY

englishTitle: MY HOPE IS IN THE LORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
My Hope is in the Lord, who gave Himself for me

And paid the price of all my sin at Calvary

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
For me He died; For me He lives,

And everlasting life and light He freely gives.

english.title: Verse  2
english.lyrics:
No merit of my own His anger to suppress,

My only hope is found in Jesus' righteousness

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
And now for me He stands Before the Father's throne;

He shows His wounded hands and names me as His own.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
His grace has planned it all, 'Tis mine but to believe

And recognize His work of love and Christ receive.

number: 718: MY HOPE IS IN THE LORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The Gospel bells are ringing,Over land, from sea to sea:Blessed news of free salvationDo they offer you and me.For God so loved the worldThat His only Son He gave;Whosoe’er believeth in HimEverlasting life shall have.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Gospel bells, how they ring;Over land from sea to sea;Gospel bells freely bringBlessèd news to you and me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The Gospel bells invite usTo a feast prepared for all;Do not slight the invitation,Nor reject the gracious call.I am the Bread of life;Eat of Me, thou hungry soul;Tho’ your sins be red as crimson,They shall be as white as wool.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The Gospel bells give warning,As they sound from day to day,Of the fate which doth await themWho forever will delay.Escape ye, for thy life;Tarry not in all the plain,Nor behind thee look, oh, never,Lest thou be consumed in pain.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The Gospel bells are joyful,As they echo far and wide,Bearing notes of perfect pardon,Thro’ a Savior crucified.Good tidings of great joyTo all people do I bring,Unto you is born a Savior,Which is Christ the Lord and King.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: If you’re in the battle for the Lord and right,Keep on the firing line;If you win, my brother, surely you must fight,Keep on the firing line.There are many dangers that we all must face,If we die still fighting it is no disgrace;Cowards in the service will not find a place,So keep on the firing line.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Oh, you must fight, be brave against all evil,Never run, nor even lag behind;If you would win for God and the right,Just keep on the firing line.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: God will only use the soldier He can trust,Keep on the firing line;If you’ll wear a crown then bear the cross you must,Keep on the firing line.Life is but to labor for the Master dear,Help to banish evil and to spread good cheer;Great you’ll be rewarded for your service here,So keep on the firing line.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When we get to heaven, brother, we’ll be glad,Keep on the firing line;How we’ll praise the Savior for the call we had,Keep on the firing line.When we see the souls that we have helped to win,Leading them to Jesus, from the paths of sin,With a shout of welcome, we will all march in,So keep on the firing line.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When the world seems cold and your friends seem few

There is someone who cares for you

When you've tears in your eyes, your heart bleeds inside

There is someone who cares for you

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Someone to care, someone to share

All your troubles like no other can do

He'll come down from the skies

And brush the tears from your eyes

You're His child and he cares for you

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When your disappointments come and you feel so blue

There is someone who cares for you

When you need a friend a friend till the end

There is someone who's a friend to you

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus, my Saviour, I love and adore Thee,Jesus my all in all,Nothing on earth would I worship before Thee,Jesus my all in all.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Jesus my all in all.Jesus my all in all,How it would grieve me if e’er Thou shouldst leave me,Jesus my all in all.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Precious Redeemer from sin and from sorrow,Jesus my all in all,Jesus the same in the past and tomorrow,Jesus my all in all.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jesus who died for my sin's precious Master,Jesus my all in all,Jesus my comfort in ev'ry disaster,Jesus my all in all.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Jesus my wisdom and righteousness ever,Jesus my all in all,Jesus my holiness, failing me never,Jesus my all in all.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Follow Me, follow Me,

Leave your home and family,

Leave your fishing nets and boats upon the shore.

Leave the seed that you have sown,

Leave the crops that you have grown,

Leave the people you have known and follow Me.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The foxes have their holes,

And the swallows have their nests,

But the Son of man

Has no place to lay down.

I do not offer comfort,

I do not offer wealth,

But in Me will all happiness be found.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
If you would follow Me,

You must leave old ways behind.

You must take My cross

And follow on My path.

You may be far from loved ones,

You may be far from home,

But My Father will welcome you at last.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Although I go away

You will never be alone.

For the Spirit will be

There to comfort you.

Though all of you may scatter,

Each follow his own path,

Still the Spirit of love will lead you home.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Are you sitting idle, while there's work to do?In the Master's vineyard there's a place for you;Be a faithful servant, ever ready stand,Where the Master calls you, lend a helping hand.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Lend a hand, lend a hand, lend a helping hand;Precious ones are falling,Lend a helping hand.Lend a hand, lend a hand, lend a helping hand;Jesus still is calling,Lend a helping hand.

english.title: Verse 2
chorus
english.lyrics: make his praises ring;Till the strains are wafted over all the land,Reaching up to heaven, lend a helping hand.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Do your prayers no longer reach the throne of grace,That some fallen brother might his steps retrace?Every prayer will help him from the sinking sand,Yours today may save him, lend a helping hand.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Has your heart ceased yearning precious souls to win?Just a word from you might rescue one from sin;Work with all the strength you have at your command,Jesus will reward you, lend a helping hand.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Trials dark on every hand,And we cannot understandAll the ways that God would lead usto that blessed Promised Land;But He'll guide us with His eye,And we'll follow till we die;We will understand it better by and by.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: By and by, when the morning comes,When the saints of God are gathered home;We will tell the story how we've overcome;We will understand it better by and by.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Oft our cherished plans have failed,Disappointments have prevailed,And we've wandered in the darkness,heavy-hearted and alone;But we're trusting in the Lord,And, according to his Word,We will understand it better by and by.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Temptations, hidden snaresOften take us unawares,And our hearts are made to bleedfor some tho'tless word or deed,And we wonder why the testWhen we try to do our best,But we'll understand it better by and by.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: We’ll build on the Rock, the living Rock,On Jesus, the Rock of Ages;So shall we abide the fearful shock,When loud the tempest rages.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: We’ll build on the Rock,We’ll build on the Rock;We’ll build on the Rock, on the solid Rock,On Christ, the mighty Rock.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Some build on the sinking sands of life,On visions of earthly treasure;Some build on the waves of sin and strife,Of fame, and worldly pleasure.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O build on the Rock, for ever sure,The firm and the true foundation;Its hope is the hope which shall endure,The hope of our salvation.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Oh Beautiful Star of BethlehemShining afar through shadows dimGiving the light for those who long have goneGuiding the wise men on their wayUnto the place where Jesus layOh Beautiful Star of Bethlehem shine on.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Oh Beautiful Star of BethlehemShine upon us until the glory dawn.Give us a light to guide the wayUnto the land of perfect dayOh Beautiful Star of Bethlehem, shine on

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Oh Beautiful Star the hope of lightGuiding the pilgrims through the nightOver the mountains till the break of dawnInto the light of perfect dayIt will give out a lovely rayOh Beautiful Star of Bethlehem shine on

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh Beautiful Star the hope of restFor the redeemed the good and blessedYonder in glory when the crown is wonJesus is now the star divineBrighter and brighter he will shineOh Beautiful Star of Bethlehem shine on

englishTitle: CARRY YOUR CROSS WITH A SMILE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Tho’ your heart may be heavy with sorrow and care,You may others to gladness beguile,If a face like the light of the morning you wear,And carry your cross with a smile!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Carry your cross with a smile,Carry your cross with a smile;You may others from sadness to gladness beguile,If you carry your cross with a smile!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Let the well by the wayside that flows unto allStrength impart for each step of the mile;Let your faith the great promises often recall,And carry your cross with a smile!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: For the work that you faithfully, willingly do,You shall reap a reward after while;Only grace in your service can glorify you,So carry your cross with a smile!

number: 730: CARRY YOUR CROSS WITH A SMILE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Oh, now I see the crimson wave!The fountain deep and wide;Jesus, my Lord, mighty to save,Points to His wounded side.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: The cleansing stream I see, I see!I plunge, and, oh, it cleanseth me!Oh, praise the Lord, it cleanseth me!It cleanseth me, yes, cleanseth me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I see the new creation rise,I hear the speaking blood;It speaks, polluted nature dies,Sinks ’neath the cleansing flood.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I rise to walk in Heav’n’s own light,Above the world and sin,With heart made pure and garments white,And Christ enthroned within.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Amazing grace! ’tis Heav’n belowTo feel the blood applied,And Jesus, only Jesus know,My Jesus crucified.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Day by day, and with each passing moment,

Strength I find to meet my trials here;

Trusting in my Father’s wise bestowment,

I’ve no cause for worry or for fear.

He, whose heart is kind beyond all measure,

Gives unto each day what He deems best,

Lovingly its part of pain and pleasure,

Mingling toil with peace and rest.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Every day the Lord Himself is near me,

With a special mercy for each hour;

All my cares He fain would bear and cheer me,

He whose name is Counsellor and Pow’r.

The protection of His child and treasure

Is a charge that on Himself He laid;

“As thy days, thy strength shall be in measure,”

This the pledge to me He made.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Help me then, in every tribulation,

So to trust Thy promises, O Lord,

That I lose not faith’s sweet consolation,

Offered me within Thy holy Word.

Help me, Lord, when toil and trouble meeting,

E’er to take, as from a father’s hand,

One by one, the days, the moments fleeting,

Till with Christ the Lord I stand.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Be of good courageGod spake unto JoshuaWhen o'er the riverGod pointed the wayJordan uncrossableThings seemed impossibleWaters divideAs they march and obey

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Got any riversYou think are uncrossableGot any mountainsYou can't tunnel throughGod specializes inThings tho't impossibleHe does the thingsOthers cannot do

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Battles to winThey would meetWith their obstaclesJericho's walls tooMust fall to the groundGod never failedHe stood back of His promisesWalls had to crumbleAs they marched around

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: God is the sameAnd His Word is dependableHe'll make a wayThru the waters for youLife's situationsBy Him are amendableMountains and hillsHe will part for you too

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: My heart was distressed ’neath Jehovah’s dread frown,And low in the pit where my sins dragged me down;I cried to the Lord from the deep miry clay,Who tenderly brought me out to golden day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He brought me out of the miry clay,He set my feet on the Rock to stay;He puts a song in my soul today,A song of praise, hallelujah!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He placed me upon the strong Rock by His side,My steps were established and here I’ll abide;No danger of falling while here I remain,But stand by His grace until the crown I gain.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: He gave me a song, ’twas a new song of praise;By day and by night its sweet notes I will raise;My heart’s overflowing, I’m happy and free;I’ll praise my Redeemer, Who has rescued me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: I’ll sing of His wonderful mercy to me,I’ll praise Him till all men His goodness shall see;I’ll sing of salvation at home and abroad,Till many shall hear the truth and trust in God.

english.title: Verse 5
chorus
english.lyrics: with the saints above.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Have thine own way, Lord!Have thine own way!Thou art the potter,I am the clay.Mold me and make meafter thy will,while I am waiting,yielded and still.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Have thine own way, Lord!Have thine own way!Search me and try me,Savior today!Wash me just now, Lord,Wash me just now,As in thy presenceHumbly I bow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Have thine own way, Lord!Have thine own way!Wounded and weary,help me I pray!Power, all power,surely is thine!Touch me and heal me,Savior divine!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Have thine own way, Lord!Have thine own way!Hold o'er my beingabsolute sway.Fill with thy Spirittill all shall seeChrist only, always,living in me!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Earthly pleasures vainly call me;I would be like Jesus;Nothing worldly shall enthrall me,I would be like Jesus.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Be like Jesus - this my song,In the home and in the throng;Be like Jesus, all day long,I would be like Jesus.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He has broken every fetter,I would be like Jesus;That my soul may serve Him better,I would be like Jesus.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: All the way from earth to glory,I would be like Jesus;Telling o’er and o’er the story,I would be like Jesus.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: That in heaven He may meet me,I would be like Jesus;That His words “Well done” may greet me,I would be like Jesus.

englishTitle: I DO NOT ASK TO CHOOSE MY PATH

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I do not ask to choose my path,Lord, lead me in Thy way;Inspire each thought, and prompt each word,And make me a bless­ing to­day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Bless me, Lord, and make me a bless­ing;I’ll glad­ly Thy mes­sage con­vey.Use me to help some poor, needy soul,And make me a bless­ing to­day.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Around me, Lord, are sin­ful men,Who scorn and dis­obey;Use me to win them from their sins,And make me a bless­ing to­day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: To those who once Thy love have known,But now are far as­tray;Help me to win them back to Thee,And make me a bless­ing to­day.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Some saints of Thine are in dis­tress,And for de­liv­er­ance pray;Oh, let me go and help them, Lord,And make me a bless­ing to­day.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Whatever er­rand Thou hast, Lord,Send me, and I’ll ob­ey.Use me in any way Thou wilt,And make me a bless­ing to­day.

number: 737: I DO NOT ASK TO CHOOSE MY PATH

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Hear the gentle Spirit’s call,Jesus is pleading for thee;There is pardon free for all,Jesus is pleading for thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Wash in the blood,Wash in the blood of Jesus;Wash in the blood,Wash in the blood of the Lamb.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Sinner, will you come today?Jesus is pleading for thee;Leave that dark and dreary way?Jesus is pleading for thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh, He drank that bitter cup,Jesus is pleading for thee;And this world you must give up,Jesus is pleading for thee.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: He will wash your garments white,Jesus is pleading for thee;Turn your darkness into light,Jesus is pleading for thee.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: He will sweep your guilt away,Jesus is pleading for thee;Make your soul as clear as day,Jesus is pleading for thee.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: He will give you joy and peace,Jesus is pleading for thee;Glory that will never cease,Jesus is pleading for thee.

englishTitle: THE LIGHT OF THE WORLD IS JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The whole world was lost in the darkness of sin,The Light of the world is Jesus!Like sunshine at noonday, His glory shone in;The Light of the world is Jesus!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Come to the light, ’tis shining for thee;Sweetly the light has dawned upon me;Once I was blind, but now I can see:The Light of the world is Jesus!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: No darkness have we who in Jesus abide;The Light of the world is Jesus!We walk in the light when we follow our Guide!The Light of the world is Jesus!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Ye dwellers in darkness with sin-blinded eyes,The Light of the world is Jesus!Go, wash at His bidding, and light will arise;The Light of the world is Jesus!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: No need of the sunlight in Heaven we’re told;The Light of the world is Jesus!The Lamb is the Light in the city of gold,The Light of the world is Jesus!

number: 741: THE LIGHT OF THE WORLD IS JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: On the cross of Calvary,Jesus died for you and me;There he shed his precious blood,That from sin we might be free.O the cleansing stream does flow,And it washes white as snow!It was for me that Jesus diedOn the cross of Calvary.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: On Calvary, on Calvary!It was for me that Jesus diedOn the cross at Calvary.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: O what wondrous, wondrous loveBrought me down at Jesus’ feet!O such wondrous, dying loveAsks a sacrifice complete!Here I give myself to thee,Soul and body, thine to be;It was for me thy blood was shedOn the cross of Calvary.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Take me, Jesus, I am thine,Wholly thine, for evermore;Blessèd Jesus, thou art mine,Dwell within for evermore;Cleanse, O cleanse my heart from sin,Make and keep me pure within!It was for this thy blood was shedOn the cross of Calvary.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Clouds and darkness veiled the skyWhen the Lord was crucified;It is finished! was his cryWhen he bowed his head and died.With this cry from Calvary’s treeAll the world may now go free;It was for this that Jesus diedOn the cross of Calvary.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Who can move the mountainsThat are hindering you todayWho can pick them up like pebblesClear them from the wayWho can prove His powerWhen a Christian kneels to prayIt is Jesus He's the One

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Jesus holds all powerIn His mighty hands divineHe's the One who healed the sickTurned the water into wineHe makes all things possibleAnd He's a friend of mineJesus He's the One

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Who can heal the heartacheThat is crushing you withinWho can pour the balm of heavenWhere the hurt has beenWho can chase the shadowsMake the song of joy beginIt is Jesus He's the OneChorus

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Who can keep you from all harmAnd guide you by His handWho can give you powerFor service and the strength to standWho can give you graceFor all that living may demandIt is Jesus He's the One

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus, my king, my wonderful Savior,All of my life is given to Thee;I am rejoicing in Thy salvation;Thy precious blood now maketh me free.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Wonderful Savior, wonderful Savior,Thou art so near, so precious to me!Wonderful Savior, wonderful Savior,My heart is filled with praises to Thee!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Freedom from sin, oh, wonderful story—All of its stains washed whiter than snow!Jesus has come to live in His temple,And with His love my heart is aglow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jesus, my Lord, I’ll ever adore Thee,Lay at Thy feet my treasures of love;Lead me in ways to show forth Thy glory,Ways that will end in Heaven above.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When in that bright and beautiful cityI shall behold Thy glories untold,I shall be like Thee, wonderful Savior,And I will sing while ages unfold.

englishTitle: I’LL WISH I HAD GIVEN HIM MORE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: By and by when I look on His face,Beautiful face, thorn-shadowed face;By and by when I look on His face,I’ll wish I had given Him more

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: More, so much more —More of my love than I e’er gave before.By and by when I look on His face,I’ll wish I had given Him more.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: By and by when He holds out His hands,Welcoming hands, nail riven hands;By and by when He holds out His hands,I’ll wish I had given Him more.

english.title: Verse 3
