number: 747: I’LL WISH I HAD GIVEN HIM MORE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I don't know about tomorrow,I just live from day to day.I don't borrow from its sunshine,For its skies may turn to gray.I don't worry o'er the future,For I know what Jesus said,And today I'll walk beside Him,For He knows what is ahead.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Many things about tomorrow,I don't seem to understand;But I know who holds tomorrow,And I know who holds my hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Every step is getting brighter,As the golden stairs I climb;Every burden's getting lighter;Every cloud is silver lined.There the sun is always shining,There no tear will dim the eye,At the ending of the rainbow,Where the mountains touch the sky.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I don't know about tomorrow,It may bring me poverty;But the one who feeds the sparrow,Is the one who stands by me.And the path that be my portion,May be through the flame or flood,But His presence goes before me,And I'm covered with His blood.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Great is the Lord, who ruleth over all!Wake, wake and sing, wake, wake and sing;Down at his feet in adoration fall.Praise and magnify our King.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O ye redeemed above,Strike, strike your harps of love,Hail the Blessed One,Hail the Mighty One,Sweetly his wonders tell,Loudly his glory swell,Praise and magnify our King.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Great is the Lord, who spake and it was done;Wake, wake and sing, wake, wake and sing;Honor and strength, dominion he has wonPraise and magnify our King.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Great is the Lord: oh, come with holy mirth;Wake, wake and sing, Wake, wake and sing,Come and rejoice, ye nations of the earth.Praise and magnify our King.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Great is the Lord, and holy is his name!Wake, wake, and sing, wake, wake and sing;Angels and men, his wondrous works proclaim.Praise and magnify our King.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Invisible hands are waiting to guide you

Invisible hands will show you the way

Have faith in the Lord He's always beside you

So pray and believe and help to receive from invisible hands

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Invisible hands (are waiting to guide you)

Invisible hands (are always beside you)

So pray and believe and help to receive from invisible hands

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Invisible hands will keep you from danger

Invisible hands will keep you from harm

Though may have sin God welcomes a stranger

So pray and believe and help to receive from invisible hands

englishTitle: GOD IS STILL ON HIS THRONE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Have you started for glory and heaven,Have you left this old world far behind;In your heart is the Comforter dwelling,Can you say, :Praise the Lord, He is mine;"Have the ones that once walked on the highway,Gone back, and you seem all alone?Keep your eyes on the prize, for the home in the skies.God is still on the throne.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: God is still on the throne,And He will remember His own;Though trials may press us and burdens distress us,He never will leave us alone;God is still on the throne,He never forsaketh His own;His promise is true, He will not forget you,God is still on the throne.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Burdened soul, is your heart growing wearyWith the toil and the heat of the day;Does it seem that your path is more thornyAs you journey along on life’s way?Go away and in secret before HimTell your grief to the Savior alone;He will lighten your care, for He still answers prayer;God is still on the throne.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: You may live in a tent or a cottage,Unnoticed by those who pass by;But a mansion for you He is buildingIn that beautiful city on high;It will outshine the wealth and the splendorOf the richest on earth we have known;He’s the architect true, and He’s building for you;God is still on the throne.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: He is coming again, is the promiseTo disciples when He went away;In like manner as He has gone from you,You will see Him returning some day;Does His tarrying cause you to wonder,Does it seem He’s forgotten His own?His promise is true, He is coming for you;God is still on the throne.

number: 751: GOD IS STILL ON HIS THRONE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I have a song I love to sing,Since I have been redeemed,Of my Redeemer, Savior, King,Since I have been redeemed.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Since I have been redeemed,Since I have been redeemed,I will glory in His name;Since I have been redeemed,I will glory in my Savior's name.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I have a Christ who satisfies,Since I have been redeemed,To do His will-- my highest prize,Since I have been redeemed.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I have a witness bright and clear,Since I have been redeemed,Dispelling ev'ry doubt and fear,Since I have been redeemed.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: I have a home prepared for me,Since I have been redeemed,Where I shall dwell eternally,Since I have been redeemed.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Fading away like the stars of the morning,Losing their light in the glorious sun--Thus would we pass from the earth and its toiling,Only remembered by what we have done.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Only remembered, only remembered,Only remembered by what we have done;Thus would we pass from the earth and its toiling,Only remembered by what we have done.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Shall we be miss'd though by others succeeded,Reaping the fields we in springtime have sown?No, for the sowers may pass from their labors,Only remembered by what they have done.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Only the truth that in life we have spoken,Only the seed that on earth we have sown;These shall pass onward when we are forgotten,Fruits of the harvest and what we have done.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Oh, when the Saviour shall make up His jewels,When the bright crowns of rejoicing are won,Then shall His weary and faithful disciples,All be remembered by what they have done.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Precious mem'ries, unseen angels,Sent from somewhere to my soul;How they linger, ever near me,And the sacred past unfold.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Precious mem'ries, how they linger,How they ever flood my soul;In the stillness of the midnight,Precious, sacred scenes unfold.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Precious father, loving mother,Fly across the lonely years;And old home scenes of my childhood,In fond memory appear.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: As I travel on life's pathway,Know not what the years may hold;As I ponder, hope grows fonder,Precious mem'ries flood my soul.

englishTitle: WHEN I’VE GONE THE LAST MILE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: If I walk in the pathway of duty,If I work till the close of the day,I shall see the great King in His beautyWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: When I've gone the last mile of the way,I will rest at the close of the day,And I know there are joys that await meWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: If for Christ I proclaim the glad story,If I seek for His sheep gone astray,I am sure He will show me His gloryWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Here the dearest of ties we must sever,Tears of sorrow are seen ev'ry day,But no sickness, no sighing foreverWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: And if here I have earnestly striven,And have tried all His will to obey,'Twill enhance all the rapture of heavenWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

number: 755: WHEN I’VE GONE THE LAST MILE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I hear Your welcome voicethat calls me by Your will,for cleansing in Your precious bloodthat flowed on Calvary's hill.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I am coming, Lord,coming by Your will:wash me, cleanse me, by the bloodthat flowed on Calvary's hill.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: ’Tis Jesus calls me onto perfect faith and love,to perfect hope, and peace, and trust,for earth and heaven above.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: ’Tis Jesus who confirmsthe blessed work within,by adding grace to welcomed grace,where reigned the power of sin.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: All hail, atoning blood!All hail, redeeming grace!All hail, the gift of Christ our Lord,our strength and righteousness!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There were ninety and nine that safely layIn the shelter of the fold,But one was out on the hills away,Far off from the gates of gold–Away on the mountains wild and bare,Away from the tender Shepherd’s care,Away from the tender Shepherd’s care.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: "Lord, Thou hast here Thy ninety and nine;Are they not enough for Thee?"But the Shepherd made answer: "This of mineHas wandered away from me;And although the road be rough and steep,I go to the desert to find my sheep,I go to the desert to find my sheep."

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
But none of the ransomed ever knewHow deep were the waters crossed

Nor how dark was the night the Lord passed thro'Ere He found His sheep that was lost.Out in the desert He heard its cry–So sick and helpless and ready to die;So sick and helpless and ready to die.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
"Lord, whence are those blood-drops all the wayThat mark out the mountain’s track?""They were shed for one who had gone astrayEre the Shepherd could bring him back.""Lord, whence are Thy hands so rent and torn?""They are pierced tonight by many a thorn,

They are pierced tonight by many a thorn."

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: And all through the mountains, thunder-riven,And up from the rocky steep,There arose a glad cry to the gate of heaven,"Rejoice! I have found my sheep!"And the angels echoed around the throne,"Rejoice, for the Lord brings back His own,Rejoice, for the Lord brings back His own!"

englishTitle: ISN’T THE LOVE OF JESUS WONDERFUL

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There will never be a sweeter storyStory of the Savior's love divineLove that bro't Him from the realms of gloryJust to save a sinful soul like mine

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Isn't the love of JesusSomething wonderfulWonderfulwonderfulO isn't the love of JesusSomething wonderfulWonderful it is to me

english.title: Verse 2
verse
english.lyrics: around meReaching to the farthest soul awaySaving keeping love it was that found meThat is why my heart can truly say

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Love beyond our human comprehendingLove of God in Christ how can it beThis will be my theme and never endingGreat redeeming love of Calvary

number: 758: ISN’T THE LOVE OF JESUS WONDERFUL

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Precious Lord, take my hand,Lead me on, let me stand,I am tired, I am weak, I am worn;Through the storm, through the night,Lead me on to the light

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Take my hand, pre­cious Lord,Lead me home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When my way grows drear,Precious Lord, lin­ger near,When my life is al­most gone,Hear my cry, hear my call,Hold my hand lest I fall

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When the dark­ness ap­pearsAnd the night draws near,And the day is past and gone,At the ri­ver I stand,Guide my feet, hold my hand

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: They call me old-fashioned because I believeThat the Bible is God’s holy Word,That Jesus, who lived among men long ago,Is divine, and the Christ of God.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: My sin was old-fashioned,My guilt was old-fashioned,God’s love was old-fashioned, I know;And the way I was saved was the old-fashioned way,Thro' the blood that makes whiter than snow.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Old-fashioned, because I believe and acceptOnly what has been spoken from heav’n;Old-fashioned because at the cross I was saved,At the cross had my sins forgiv’n.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Old-fashioned, because I am bound to do right,To walk in the straight narrow way;Because I have given my whole life to God,Old-fashioned, because I pray.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Old-fashioned, because I am looking aboveTo Jesus, my glorified Lord;Because I believe He is coming again,Fulfilling His holy Word.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Oft times the day seems long, our trials hard to bear,We’re tempted to complain, to murmur and despair;But Christ will soon appear to catch His Bride away,All tears forever over in God’s eternal day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: It will be worth it all when we see Jesus,Life’s trials will seem so small when we see Christ;One glimpse of His dear face all sorrow will erase,So bravely run the race till we see Christ.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Sometimes the sky looks dark with not a ray of light,We’re tossed and driven on, no human help in sight;But there is one in heav’n who knows our deepest care,Let Jesus solve your problem – just go to Him in pray’r.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Life’s day will soon be o’er, all storms forever past,We’ll cross the great divide, to glory, safe at last;We’ll share the joys of heav’n – a harp, a home, a crown,The tempter will be banished, we’ll lay our burden down.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Keep me, blessed Savior, keep me

In thy loving care;

May I, in the time of sorrow,

Find a refuge there.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Keep me, blessed Savior, keep me,

Safely evermore;

Stay beside me all the journey,

Till I reach the golden shore.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Keep me, blessed Savior, keep me

Safe from all alarms;

When the storms of life are raging,

Safe within thine arms.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Keep me, blessed Savior, keep me

Near thy bleeding side;

When the tempter’s pow’r assails me,

May I there abide.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Keep me, blessed Savior, keep me

Till this life is o’er;

Then be thou the first to greet me

On the heav’nly shore.

englishTitle: JESUS WE JUST WANT TO THANK YOU

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus we just want to thank YouJesus we just want to thank YouJesus we just want to thank YouThank You for being so good

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Jesus we just want to praise YouJesus we just want to praise YouJesus we just want to praise YouPraise You for being so good

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Savior we just want to serve YouSavior we just want to serve YouSavior we just want to serve YouServe You for being so good

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Jesus we know You are comingJesus we know You are comingJesus we know You are comingTake us to live in Your home

number: 764: JESUS WE JUST WANT TO THANK YOU

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Everybody on the Lord’s side say Amen/2x



Refrain

Jesus wants to hear it now and then

Everbody on the Lord’s side say Amen

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: If you want God’s salvation say Amen/2x

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: If you want God’s healing say Amen/2x

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: If you want God’s protection say Amen/2x

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: If you want God’s provision, say Amen/2x

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: If you want God’s revival say Amen/2x

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Someday you'll hear God's final call to youTo take His offer of salvation trueThis could be it my friend if you but knewGod's final call God's final call

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: How can you live another day in sinThinking some day with Christ you will beginO will you hear above the world's loud dinGod's final call God's final call

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: If you reject God's final call of graceYou'll have no chance your footsteps to retraceAll hope will then be goneAnd doom you'll faceO hear His call O hear His call

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Renew their breed Almighty God

Those pioneers of yesterday

Who through the wilderness and waste

Undaunted pushed their way heaven

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Renew their breed, we need them back

To scorn the softness of our days

We need them back to teach us how

To meet the problems of these days

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Florence Crawford in her own days

Stood for the truth and nothing else

She fought like Deborah of old

And left a glorious heritage

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Raymond her son our brother Ray

A man of undaunted spirit

Took up the torch of hioliness

The light is still burning today

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Peter Vander Puije of Ghana

A man who hungered for the truth

He preached and prayed and lived so well

And died in God’s own righteousness

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics:
Morgan Jsengwayo is gone

But left a mark in Zimbabwe

Now all Southern Africa know

A God who saves and heals and keeps.

english.title: Verse 7
english.lyrics:
Dear God of Timothy Oshokoya

Come and be our God in our days

That all Africa may be

For Jesus Christ alone

english.title: Verse 8
english.lyrics:
Our heavenly Father hear our prayers

And raise for us in our own days

Men and women of such faith

To face the challenges of the day

englishTitle: I AM WEAK BUT THOU ART STRONG

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I am weak but Thou art strong;Jesus, keep me from all wrong;I'll be satisfied as longAs I walk, let me walk close to Thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Just a closer walk with Thee,Grant it, Jesus, is my plea,Daily walking close to Thee,Let it be, dear Lord, let it be.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Thro' this world of toil and snares,If I falter, Lord, who cares?Who with me my burden shares?None but Thee, dear Lord, none but Thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When my feeble life is o'er,Time for me will be no more;Guide me gently, safely o'erTo Thy kingdom shore, to Thy shore.

number: 770: I AM WEAK BUT THOU ART STRONG

englishTitle: THE POWER OF GOD IS JUST THE SAME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When Abraham and Sarah had promised them a son,

They were surprised and knew not what to say;

But they knew what God had promised He was able to perform:

And the power of God is just the same today.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
The pow’r of God is just the same today,

It doesn’t matter what the people say;

Whatever God has promised

He’s able to perform:

And the power of God is just the same today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When Moses wanted water to quench the people’s thirst,

He knew that God would then provide a way;

Although his rod was useful he had the power first:

And the power of God is just the same today.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When Moses made a serpent and placed it on a pole,

The bitten ones were told to look that way,

And then while they were looking Jehovah-rophi made them whole:

And the power of God is just the same today.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
When Joshua was commander, he spoke—the sun stood still,

The moon its onward course was made to stay;

Thus he won a mighty battle, for he did his Father’s will:

And the power of God is just the same today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When Mary and Martha lost their brother Lazarus

They discouraged and know not what to do

But they knew what God has promised

He was able to perform

Jesus raised up Lazarus from the dead

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
When Naaman, the leper, before Elisha stood,

He thought he knew just what the seer would say,

But he had to wash in Jordan, though he thought it wasn’t good:

And the power of God is just the same today.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics:
When David met Goliath he meant to have a fight,

The leaders put the battle in array;

Of course he killed the giant, for he was in the right:

And the power of God is just the same today.

english.title: Verse 7
english.lyrics:
When Jonah went to Tarshish to flee away from God,

A mighty fish was waiting for its prey;

It quickly swallowed Jonah, then threw him on the sod:

And the power of God is just the same today.

english.title: Verse 8
english.lyrics:
When Malachi, the prophet, was preaching all abroad,

And cutting like sickle and the scythe;

The people were accursed, for they were robbing God,

They filled to bring the offering and the tithe.

english.title: Verse 9
english.lyrics:
Then came the blessed Savior, with power to cleanse and heal,

To bear my sin and sickness all away;

My burdens, too, He carries, and doth my sorrows feel:

And the power of God is just the same today.

english.title: Verse 10
english.lyrics:
Through Paul and Silas singing and praying in the jail,

For Paul and Silas knew the way to pray;

The prison doors were opened, for locks could not avail,

And the power of God is just the same today.

number: 771: THE POWER OF GOD IS JUST THE SAME

english.title: Verse 1
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When the ransomed of earth shall unite in the song

That is sung by the angels bright and fair;

When the harps all shall ring and music shall roll,

We'll be there, praise the Lord, we'll all be there.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
We shall ne'er say "good-bye" in that Home of the soul,

There we'll not have a burden or a care;

And when Jesus shall say

"Enter in with thy Lord."

We'll be there, praise the Lord, we'll all be there.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
We'll be there, we'll all be there,

On the dawn (morning) of that great and glorious day,

When the saints all gather home,

We'll be there, praise the Lord, we'll all be there.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Begone, unbelief,

My Savior is near,

And for my relief

Will surely appear;

By prayer let me wrestle,

And He will perform;

With Christ in the vessel,

I smile at the storm.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Though dark be my way,

Since He is my Guide,

’Tis mine to obey,

’Tis His to provide;

Though cisterns be broken,

And creatures all fail,

The word He hath spoken

Shall surely prevail.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
His love, in time past,

Forbids me to think

He’ll leave me at last

In trouble to sink:

Each sweet Ebenezer

I have in review

Confirms His good pleasure

To help me quite through.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Why should I complain

Of want or distress,

Temptation or pain?

He told me no less;

The heirs of salvation,

I know from His Word,

Through much tribulation

Must follow their Lord.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
How bitter that cup

No heart can conceive,

Which He drank quite up,

That sinners might live!

His way was much rougher

And darker than mine;

Did Christ, my Lord, suffer,

And shall I repine?

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics:
Since all that I meet

Shall work for my good,

The bitter is sweet,

The medicine, food;

Though painful at present,

’Twillcease before long,

And then, oh, how pleasant

The conqueror’s song!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Command thy blessing from above,O God! on all assembled here;Behold us with a father's love,While we look up with filial fear.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Command Thy blessing, Jesus! Lord!May we Thy true disciples be;Speak to each heart the mighty Word,Say to the weakest, "Follow me."

english.title: Verse 3
Verse 4
english.lyrics: O Thou, our Maker, Saviour, Guide,One true eternal God confest!Whom, thou hast join'd let none divide,None dare to curse whom thou hast blest.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: With thee and these for ever found,May all the souls who here unite,With harps and songs thy throne surround,Rest in thy love and reign in light.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Ten thousand times ten thousandgive glory to the Lamb;the angel hosts around the thronepraise God, the great I AM.Triumphant alleluiasfill earth and sea and sky,as countless voices join the songand worship God on high.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: O day, for which creationand all its tribes were made!O joy, for all its former griefa thousand fold repaid!The armies of the ransomedhave fought with death and sin:fling open wide the mighty gatesto let the victors in!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Bring near your great salvation,O Lord, return againto gather all your chosen flockthen take your power and reign!Appear, Desire of Nations,your exiles long for home:show in the heavens your promised sign,then, Prince and Saviour, come!



.

englishTitle: IN PITY LOOK ON ME MY GOD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
In pity, look on me my God

Show Thy wonderful love to me

Forbid that I should plan my life

Thou art the One who plans for me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
My Father, lead me here on earth

Let me, Thy great salvation find.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Oh do not let me choose for Thee,

For Thou, my portion ever art

Oh do that which Thou has ordained

For me, in Thy great heart of love.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Lord, who can know Thy beginning

Thou Lord of glory, good and kind

Thou hast with Thee a thousand ways

When I have not yet thought out one.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
As far and high as is the heaven

So are Thy thoughts higher than mine

Lead me, that I may follow Thee

In the way of Thy righteousness.

number: 778: IN PITY LOOK ON ME MY GOD

englishTitle: THE VOICE OF LOVE AND MERCY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Hark! the voice of love and mercy

Sounds aloud from Calvary;

See, it rends the rocks asunder,

Shakes the earth, and veils the sky:

“It is finished!” “It is finished!”

Hear the dying Savior cry.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
“It is finished!” Oh, what pleasure

Do these charming words afford!

Heavenly blessings without measure

Flow to us from Christ, the Lord:

“It is finished!” “It is finished!”

Saints, the dying words record.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Finished all the types and shadows

Of the ceremonial law!

Finished all that God had promised;

Death and hell no more shall awe:

“It is finished!” “It is finished!”

Saints, from hence your comfort draw.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Tune your harps anew, ye seraphs,

Join to sing the pleasing theme;

All on earth and all in heaven

Join to praise Immanuel’s name:

Hallelujah! Hallelujah!

Glory to the bleeding Lamb!

number: 779: THE VOICE OF LOVE AND MERCY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Christ is risen! Alleluia!Risen our victorious head!Sing his praises! Alleluia!Christ is risen from the dead!Gratefully our hearts adore himas his light once more appears,bowing down in joy before him,rising up from griefs and tears.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Christ is risen! Alleluia!Risen our victorious head!Sing his praises! Alleluia!Christ is risen from the dead!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Christ is risen! All the sadnessof our Lenten fast is o’er;through the open gates of gladnesshe returns to life once more;death and hell before him bendingsee him rise, the victor now,angels on his steps attending,glory round his wounded brow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Christ is risen! All the sorrowthat last evening round him laynow hath found a glorious morrowin the rising of today.See the grave its first-fruits giving,springing up from holy ground;Christ was dead, but now is living;he was lost, but he is found.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Christ is risen! Henceforth neverdeath or hell shall us enthrall.We are Christ’s, in him foreverwe have triumphed over all.All the doubting and dejectionof our trembling hearts have ceased;hail the day of resurrection!Let us rise and keep the feast.

englishTitle: FOR MERCIES COUNTLESS AS THE SAND

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: For mercies, countless as the sandsWhich daily I receiveFrom Jesus, my Redeemer’s hands,My soul, what canst thou give?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Alas! from such a heart as mine,What can I bring Him forth?My best is stained and dyed with sin,My all is nothing worth.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Yet this acknowledgement I’ll makeFor all He has bestowed;Salvation’s sacred cup I’ll take,And call upon my God.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The best return for one like me,So wretched and so poor;Is from His gifts to draw a plea,And ask Him still for more.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: I cannot serve him as I ought,No works have I to boast;Yet would I glory in the thoughtThat I shall owe Him most.

number: 781: FOR MERCIES COUNTLESS AS THE SAND

englishTitle: ALL HAIL THE POWER OF JESUS’ NAME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
(Coronation Chorus t. Brod. 1)

All hail the power of Jesus' name!Let angels prostrate fall.Bring forth the royal diadem,and crown him Lord of all.Bring forth the royal diadem,and crown him Lord of all!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
(Milestone Male Voices Bap. 135)

O seed of Israel's chosen racenow ransomed from the fall,hail him who saves you by his grace,and crown him Lord of all.Hail him who saves you by his grace,and crown him Lord of all!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
(Belmont H. 289 Sop Solo)

Sinners whose love can ne’er forget

The wormwood and the gall

Go spread your trophies at His feet

And crown Him Lord of all

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
(Crimond Quintet W Descant)

Let every tongue and every triberesponsive to his call,to him all majesty ascribe,and crown him Lord of all.To him all majesty ascribe,and crown him Lord of all!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
(Diadem Chorus BH 255)

Oh, that with all the sacred throngwe at his feet may fall!We'll join the everlasting songand crown him Lord of all.We'll join the everlasting songand crown him Lord of all.

number: 782: ALL HAIL THE POWER OF JESUS’ NAME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
We shall sing Ebenezer

It is just  by our God’s grace

Remember what God has done

Give thanks unto His name/2x

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
January to December

It is just by our God’s grace

For guidance and protection

Give thanks unto the Lord/2x

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Ebenezer

It is just by our God’s grace

Remember what God has done

Give thanks unto His name

englishTitle: BY THE WAY OF REDEEMING LOVE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 Oh, the love so full and freeThat the Lord bestowed on me,When He bade me comeTo my heave'nly homeBy the way of redeeming love.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: By the way of redeeming love,By the way of redeeming love,I’m going home to gloryBy the way of redeeming love.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: On the cross His life He gave,Ev'ry dying soul to save,And He points the wayTo the realms of dayBy the way of redeeming love.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I will praise the Lord in songTill I join that blood-washed throng,Nevermore to roamWhen I reach my homeBy the way of redeeming love.

number: 784: BY THE WAY OF REDEEMING LOVE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Savior, more than life to me,I am clinging, clinging close to Thee;Let Thy precious blood applied,Keep me ever, ever near Thy side.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Ev'ry day, ev'ry hourLet me feel thy cleansing pow'r;May Thy tender love to meBind me closer, closer, Lord, to Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Through this changing world below,Lead me gently, gently as I go;Trusting Thee, I cannot stray,I can never, never lose my way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Let me love Thee more and more,Till this fleeting, fleeting life is o'er;Till my soul is lost in love,In a brighter, brighter world above.

englishTitle: WHEN THE MIST HAVE ROLLED AWAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When the mists have rolled in splendorFrom the beauty of the hills,And the sunlight falls in gladnessOn the rivers and the rills,We recall our Father’s promiseIn the rainbow of the spray:We shall know each other betterWhen the mists have rolled away.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: We shall know, as we are known,Nevermore to walk alone,In the dawning of the morningOf that bright and happy day,We shall know each other better,When the mists have rolled away.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Oft we tread the path before usWith a weary, burdened heart;Oft we toil amid the shadows,And our fields are far apart;But the Savior’s “Come, ye blessed”All our labor will repay,When we gather in the morningWhere the mists have rolled away.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: We shall come with joy and gladness,We shall gather round the throne;Face to face with those that love us,We shall know as we are known;And the song of our redemptionShall resound through endless day,When the shadows have departed,And the mists have rolled away.

number: 787: WHEN THE MIST HAVE ROLLED AWAY

englishTitle: WHERE JESUS IS TIS HEAVEN THERE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Since Christ my soul from sin set free

This world has been a Heaven to me;

And ’mid earth’s sorrows and its woe,

’Tis Heaven my Jesus here to know.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
O hallelujah, yes, ’tis Heaven,

’Tis Heaven to know my sins forgiven;

On land or sea, what matters where?

Where Jesus is, ’tis Heaven there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Once Heaven seemed a far-off place,

Till Jesus showed His smiling face;

Now it’s begun within my soul,

’Twill last while endless ages roll.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
What matters where on earth we dwell?

On mountain top, or in the dell,

In cottage, or a mansion fair,

Where Jesus is, ’tis Heaven there.

number: 789: WHERE JESUS IS TIS HEAVEN THERE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus, my strength, my hope,on thee I cast my care,with humble confidence look up,and know thou hearest my prayer.Give me on thee to wait,till I can all things do,on thee, almighty to create.almighty to renew.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I want a godly fear,a quick-discerning eyethat looks to thee when sin is near,and bids the tempter fly;a spirit still prepared,and armed with jealous care,for ever standing on its guard,and watching unto prayer.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I want a true regard,a single, steady aim,unmoved by threatening or reward,to thee and thy great name;a jealous, just concernfor thine immortal praise;a pure desire that all may learnand glorify thy grace.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: I rest upon thy word;thy promise is for me:my succour and salvation, Lord,shall surely come from thee:but let me still abide,nor from my hope remove;till thou my patient spirit guideinto thy perfect love.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Soldiers of the cross, arise,Gird you with your armour bright;Mighty are your enemies,Hard the battle ye must fight.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: O’er a faithless, fallen worldRaise your banner in the sky;Let it float there wide unfurled;Bear it onward; lift it high.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: ‘Mid the homes of want and woe,Strangers to the living word,Let the Saviour’s herald go,Let the voice of hope be heard.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Where the shadows deepest lie,Carry truth’s unsullied ray;Where are crimes of blackest dye,There the saving sign display.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: To the weary and the wornTell of realms where sorrows cease;To the outcast and forlornSpeak of mercy and of peace.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: Be the banner still unfurled,Still unsheathed the Spirit’s sword,Till the kingdoms of the worldAre the Kingdom of the Lord.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O swing the gates wide open,Ye angels fair and bright,The King of glory cometh,Triumphant in his might.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Sing glory, hallelujah,The night of death is past;The resurrection morningHas dawned on us at last.Sing glory, hallelujah,The night of death is past;The resurrection morningHas dawned on us at last.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Praise God! Sing hallelujah!The stone is rolled away;Beyond the tomb is shiningHope's glad eternal day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O swing the gates wide open,Our longing eyes would seeThe Christ who lives in heavenTo plead for you and me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: With songs of adorationWe haste to greet our King,While thro' the streets so goldenLoud hallelujah's ring.

englishTitle: WHO ARE THESE LIKE STARS APPEARING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Who are these like stars appearing,these before God's throne who stand?Each a golden crown is wearing;who are all this glorious band?Alleluia! Hark, they sing,praising loud their heav'nly King.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Who are these of dazzling brightness,these in God's own truth arrayed,clad in robes of purest whiteness,robes whose lustre ne'er shall fade,ne'er be touched by time's rude hand?Whence come all this glorious band?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: These are they who have contendedfor their Savior's honor long,wrestling on 'til life was ended,foll'wing not the sinful throng;these, who well the fight sustained,triumph thro' the Lamb have gained.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: These are they whose hearts were riven,sore with woe and anguish tried,who in pray'r full oft have strivenwith the God they glorified;now, their painful conflict o'er,God has bid them weep no more.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: These, like priests, have watched and waited,off'ring up to Christ their will;soul and body consecrated,day and night to serve him still:now in God's most holy placeblest they stand before his face.

number: 797: WHO ARE THESE LIKE STARS APPEARING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O little town of Bethlehem, how still we see you lie!

Above your deep and dreamless sleep the silent stars go by:

yet in your dark streets shining is everlasting light;

the hopes and fears of all the years are met in you tonight.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
O morning stars, together proclaim the holy birth,

and praises sing to God the King, and peace to all the earth.

For Christ is born of Mary; and, gathered all above,

while mortals sleep, the angels keep their watch of wondering love.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
How silently, how silently the wondrous gift is given!

So God imparts to human hearts the blessings of his heaven:

no ear may hear his coming, but in this world of sin,

where meek souls will receive him - still the dear Christ enters in.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
O holy child of Bethlehem, descend to us, we pray;

cast out our sin and enter in, be born in us today!

We hear the Christmas angels the great glad tidings tell -

O come to us, abide with us, our Lord Emmanuel.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Onward, Christian soldiers,marching as to war,With the cross of Jesusgoing on before!Christ, the royal Master,leads against the foe;Forward into battle,see his banner go!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Onward, Christian soldiers,marching as to war,With the cross of Jesusgoing on before!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: At the sign of triumphSatan's host doth flee;On, then, Christian soldiers,on to victory!Hell's foundations quiverat the shout of praise;Brothers, lift your voices,loud your anthems raise!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Like a mighty armymoves the church of God;Brothers, we are treadingwhere the saints have trod;We are not divided;all one body we,One in hope and doctrine,one in charity.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Onward, then, ye people,join our happy throng,Blend with ours your voicesin the triumph song;Glory, laud, and honor,unto Christ the King;This thro' countless agesmen and angels sing

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
All: Glory, glory to the Father

And to the son and to the Holy spirit

Glory, glory to the Father

And to the son and the holy spirit

B: as it was in the beginning so it is now

T: as it was in the beginning so it is now

TB: as it was in the beginning so it is now

TB: So shall it ever be

SA: So shall it ever be

TB: So shall it ever be

SA: So shall it ever be

TB: World without end

All: World without end

so shall it ever be

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O weary pilgrim, lift your head!For joy cometh in the morning;For God in his own word has saidThat joy cometh in the morning.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Joy cometh in the morning,Joy cometh in the morning;Weeping may endure, may endure for a night,But joy cometh in the morning.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Ye feeble saints, dismiss your fears,For joy cometh in the morning;And weeping mourners, dry your tears,For joy cometh in the morning.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Let ev'ry tearful eye look up,For joy cometh in the morning;And ev'ry trembling sinner hope,For joy cometh in the morning.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Our God shall wipe our tears away,For joy cometh in the morning;Sorrow and sighing cannot stay,For joy cometh in the morning.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Out in the highways and byways of life,Many are weary and sad;Carry the sunshine where darkness is rife,Making the sorrowing glad.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Make me a blessing, Make me a blessing.Out of my life may Jesus shine;Make me a blessing, O Savior, I pray.Make me a blessing to someone today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Tell the sweet story of Christ and his love,Tell of his pow'r to forgive;Others will trust him if only you proveTrue, ev'ry moment you live.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Give as 'twas given to you in your need,Love as the Master loved you;Be to the helpless a helper indeed,Unto your mission be true.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Egypt was once my home I was a slave,

Helpless in sin to roam, love's light did crave.

But when I looked up to Heaven's dome,

Christ came to save, I'm living in Canaan now.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I'm living on Canaan side, Egypt behind,

I've crossed over Jordan wide, gladness to find.

My soul is satisfied, no longer I am blind.

Living with Jesus up in Canaan right now.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Satan may have you bound with fetters strong,

Just look up to higher ground twill not be long.

Till Christ the Savior your soul has found,

you'll sing this song, I'm living in Canaan now.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus knocks; He calls to thee;"Weary one, O come to me;"He can save, and only He;Open wide the door.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Open wide the door,Open wide the door,He can save, and only He;--Open wide the door.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Jesus knocks, He comes to save,'Twas for thee His life He gave;He hath triumph'd o'er the grave;Open wide the door.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jesus knocks, is knocking still;Yield to Him at once thy will;He with joy thy heart can fill;Open wide the wide.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Jesus knocks; the moments fly;While salvation yet is nigh;Ere the Saviour passeth by,Open wide the door

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: We are marching on in the army of the Lord,We are true and we are faithful to our Captain’s word,With our flag unfurled we are pressing to the fray,Praising Jesus as we march away.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: We’re marching onward to our home,No more to weep, no more to roam,With songs of joy and hearts aglow,In heav’nly love we onward go,His voice is calling from above,In tender tones, in tender love,He cheers us on, the heav’nly way,That leads to everlasting day.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He will never leave us, He never will forsakeWhat tho’ legions may oppose, temptations overtake,With our trust in him we shall never, never fall!Let us rally at the Captain’s call.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Come and join our throng, we will take you by the hand,Let us journey on together to the better landWith our saints at last we shall wear the victor’s crown,And forever lay our armor down.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 No tears in heaven, no sorrows given,All will be glory in that land;There'll be no sadness, all will be gladness,When we shall join that happy band.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: No tears in heaven fair, no tears, no tears up there,Sorrow and pain will have have flown;No tear, in heaven fair, no tears, no tears up there,No tears in heaven will be known.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Glory is waiting, waiting up yonder,Where we shall spend an endless day;There with our Savior, we'll be forever,where no more sorrow can dismay.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Some morning yonder, we'll cease to ponderO'er things this life has bro't to view;All will be clearer, loved ones be dearer,In heav'n where all will be made new.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Christ the Lord is ris’n today, Alleluia!Sons of men and angels say, Alleluia!Raise your joys and triumphs high, Alleluia!Sing, ye heav’ns, and earth, reply, Alleluia!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Lives again our glorious King, Alleluia!Where, O death, is now thy sting? Alleluia!Once He died our souls to save, Alleluia!Where thy victory, O grave? Alleluia!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Love’s redeeming work is done, Alleluia!Fought the fight, the battle won, Alleluia!Death in vain forbids His rise, Alleluia!Christ hath opened paradise, Alleluia!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Soar we now where Christ hath led, Alleluia!Foll’wing our exalted Head, Alleluia!Made like Him, like Him we rise, Alleluia!Ours the cross, the grave, the skies, Alleluia!

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Hail the Lord of earth and heaven, Alleluia!Praise to Thee by both be given, Alleluia!Thee we greet triumphant now, Alleluia!Hail the Resurrection, thou, Alleluia!

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: King of glory, Soul of bliss, Alleluia!Everlasting life is this, Alleluia!Thee to know, Thypow’r to prove, Alleluia!Thus to sing, and thus to love, Alleluia!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
A call for loyal soldiers

Comes to one and all;

Soldiers for the conflict,

Will you heed the call?

Will you answer quickly,

With a ready cheer,

Will you be enlisted

As a volunteer?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
A volunteer for Jesus,

A soldier true!

Others have enlisted,

Why not you?

Jesus is the Captain,

We will never fear,

Will you be enlisted

As a volunteer?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Yes, Jesus calls for soldiers

Who are filled with pow’r,

Soldiers who will serve Him

Ev’ry day and hour;

He will not forsake you,

He is ever near;

Will you be enlisted

As a volunteer?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
He calls you, for He loves you

With a heart most kind,

He whose heart was broken,

Broken for mankind;

Now, just now, He calls you,

Calls in accents clear,

Will you be enlisted

As a volunteer?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
And when the war is over,

And the vict’ry won,

When the true and faithful

Gather one by one,

He will crown with glory

All who there appear;

Will you be enlisted

As a volunteer?

englishTitle: GLORY TO GOD IN THE HIGHEST

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Glory to God in the highest,

And peace to his people on earth.

Lord God, heavenly king,

Almighty God and Father,

We worship you, we give you thanks,

We praise you for your glory.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Lord Jesus Christ, only Son of the Father,

Lord God, Lamb of God,

You take away the sin of the world:

Have mercy on us; You are seated at

The right hand of the Father:

Receive our prayer.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
For you alone are the Holy One,

You alone are the Lord,

You alone are the Most High,

Jesus Christ, with the Holy Spirit,

In the glory of God the Father.

number: 813: GLORY TO GOD IN THE HIGHEST

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The Lord is risen indeed!Now is his work performed;now is the mighty captive freed,and death's strong castle stormed.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The Lord is risen indeed!Then hell has lost his prey;with him is risen the ransomed seedto reign in endless day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The Lord is risen indeed!He lives, to die no more;he lives, the sinner's cause to plead,whose curse and shame he bore.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The Lord is risen indeed!Attending angels, hear!Up to the courts of heaven with speedthe joyful tidings bear.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Then take your golden lyres,and strike each cheerful chord;join, all the bright celestial choirs,to sing our risen Lord.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus, the Saviour, is calling for thee,

Come, heavy laden one, come unto Me;

I will thy soul from its burdens set free—

Jesus is calling for thee!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus is calling, tenderly calling,

Jesus is calling, calling for Thee;

Jesus is calling, tenderly calling,

Jesus is calling, calling for Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Ye who are wandering now far away,

Heed the blest message—why longer delay?

Why from His presence so long wilt thou stay?

Jesus is calling for thee!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Jesus still seeks thee afar from the fold,

Out on the mountain so dark and so cold;

Turn to Him now—in His arms He’ll enfold—

Jesus is calling for Thee!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
While shepherds watched

their flocks by night,

All seated on the ground,

The Angel of the Lord came down,

And Glory shone around.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Sweet chiming Christmas bells

(Sweet bells)				2x

They cheer us on our heav’nly way,

Sweet chiming bells.

They cheer us on our heav’nly

way, sweet chiming bells.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
"Fear not" said he, for mighty dread

Had seized their troubled minds,

"Glad tidings of great joy I bring

To you and all mankind.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
To you in David’s town this day,

Is born of David’s line;

A good-will henceforth from heav'n to men

Begin and never cease.

englishTitle: WE TALK OF THE REALM OF THE BLESSED

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
We speak of the realms of the Blest,

Of that country so bright and so fair,

And oft are its glories confessed;

But what must it be to be there?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
We speak of its pathways of gold,

Of its walls decked with jewels most rare,

Its wonders and pleasures untold;

But what must it be to be there?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
We speak of its freedom from sin,

From sorrow, temptation, and care,

From trials without and within;

But what must it be to be there?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
We speak of its anthems of praise,

With which we can never compare

The sweetest on earth we can raise;

But what must it be to be there?

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
We speak of its service of love,

Of the robes which the glorified wear,

The church of the First-born above;

But what must it be to be there?

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics:
Do Thou, Lord, 'midst pleasure of woe,

Still for Heaven our spirits prepare;

And shortly we also shall know

And feel what it is to be there.

number: 817: WE TALK OF THE REALM OF THE BLESSED

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O thou blessed rock of agesI am trusting now dear Lord in theekeep me till my journey's endedkeep me till Thy blessed face I seeHide me O blest rock of agestill thy blessed face I seewhen the storms around me ragesrock of ages hide thou me

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When my journey is completedand there's no more work to dosavior guide my weary spiritto that happy land beyond the blueHide me O blest rock of agestill thy blessed face I seewhen the storm around me ragesrock of ages hide thou me

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: “I am the vine and ye are the branches,”Bear precious fruit for Jesus today;Branches in Him no fruit ever bearing,Jesus hath said, “He taketh away.”

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: “I am the vine and ye are the branches;I am the vine, be faithful and true;Ask what ye will, your prayer shall be granted;The Father loved Me, so I have loved you.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: “Now ye are clean through words I have spoken,Living in Me, much fruit ye shall bear;Dwelling in you, My promise unbroken,Glory in heav’n with Me ye shall share.”

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Yes, by your fruits the world is to know you,Walking in love as children of day;Follow your Guide, He passeth before you,Leading to realms of glorious day.

englishTitle: GO TELL IT ON THE MOUNTAIN

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Go, tell it on the mountain,over the hills and everywhere.Go, tell it on the mountainthat Jesus Christ is born.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Oh, when I was a seeker,I sought both night and day.I asked the Lord to help me,and he showed me the way.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: While shepherds kept their watchingo'er silent flocks by night,behold throughout the heavensthere shone a holy light.

english.title: Verse 3
chorus
english.lyrics: that hailed the Savior's birth.

english.title: Verse  4
english.lyrics: Down in a lowly mangerthe humble Christ was born,and God sent us salvationthat blessed Christmas morn.

number: 824: GO TELL IT ON THE MOUNTAIN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
This life is filled with sorrow and troubles here below,

We oft are made to wonder just why it should be so;

In ev’ry tribulation this life must bring to view,

O Lord, we need a friend like you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
O Lord, we know you traveled the road to Jericho,

And helped a lonely pilgrim, the Bible tells us so;

When earthly friends forsake us and all the world seems blue,

O Lord, we need a friend like you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
They say that many trials will come to vex the soul,

That clouds will often gather to dim for us the goal;

In ev’ry sad condition to lead us safely thru,

O Lord, we need a friend like you.

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
Long ago when but a boy at old camp meeting time,

How my heart would leap for joy to hear the old bells chime,

Calling all the saints of God into the house of prayer,

Oh such singing shouting for the Lord was there

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I like the old time preaching, praying, singing, shouting,

I like the old time reading of God's word,

I like to hear those old time, Hallelujah, glory,

I like the old time worship of the Lord

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Preaching in those good ol' days were filled with a holy flame,

Preaching for the souls of men not for worldly fame,

Under such old preaching sinner fell to pray,

And the lord would save them in that good ol' fashion way

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus Christ the Lord opened up the way to gloryWhen He died to save us from our ruined state,And He asks that we shall go tell the world the story,How His blood will save them from their awful fate.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Jesus opened up the way to heaven’s gateWhen He died on the cross,To redeem all the lost;He prepared the roadThat leads to His abode,’Tis a road marked by bloodBut it leads us home to God.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: And the way is marked by the footprints of the Savior,With His blood he made it, made it plain and straight;If you walk that way, it will lead you into heaven,Lead you safely into glory’s golden gate.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Sinner, will you come and join in this heav’nly journey,Walk the bloody pathway that the Savior trod;Then when life is over and all the sheaves are garnered,You will meet the Savior and be not afraid.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: All creatures of our God and King,lift up your voice and with us sing,"Alleluia! Alleluia!"Thou burning sun with golden beam,thou silver moon with softer gleam,O praise Him, O praise Him!alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Thou rushing wind that art so strong,ye clouds that sail in heav'n along,O praise Him! Alleluia!Thou rising morn, in praise rejoice,ye lights of ev'ning, find a voice,O praise Him, O praise Him!alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: And all ye men of tender heart,forgiving others, take your part,O sing ye! Alleluia!Ye who long pain and sorrow bear,praise God and on Him cast your care;O praise Him, O praise Him!alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Let all things their Creator bless,and worship Him in humbleness;O praise Him! Alleluia!Praise, praise the Father, praise the Son,and praise the Spirit, Three in One;O praise Him, O praise Him!alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Ere you left your room this morning,Did you think to pray?In the name of Christ, our Savior,Did you sue for loving favorAs a shield today?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Oh, how praying rests the weary!Prayer will change the night to day.So, when life gets dark and dreary,Don’t forget to pray.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When your heart was filled with anger,Did you think to pray?Did you plead for grace, my brother,That you might forgive anotherWho had crossed your way?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When sore trials came upon you,Did you think to pray?When your soul was full of sorrow,Balm of Gilead did you borrowAt the gates of day?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Send a revival, O Christ, my Lord,Let it go over the land and sea,Send it according to Thy dear Word,And let it begin in me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Lord, send a revival,Lord, send a revival,Lord, send a revival,And let it begin in me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Send a revival among Thine own,Help us to turn from our sins away.Let us draw near to the Father's throne,Revive us again, we pray.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Send a revival to those in sin,Help them, O Jesus, to turn to Thee,Let them the new life in Thee begin,Oh, give them the victory.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Send a revival in ev'ry heart,Draw the world nearer. O Lord to Thee,Let Thy salvation true joy impart,And let it begin in me.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Coming now to Thee O Christ my Lord,

Trusting only in Thy precious word

Let my humble pray'r to The be heard

And send a great revival in my soul

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Send a great revival in my soul (in my soul)

Send a great revival in my soul (in my soul)

Let the Holy Spirit come and take control

And send a great revival in my soul

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Send the Holy Spirit now within

Burning out the dross and guilt of sin

Let Thy mighty works of grace begin

Oh, send a great revival in my soul

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Send a great revival, Lord, in me

Help me that I may rejoice in Thee

Give me strength to win the victory

And send a great revival in my soul

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Help me go for Thee, dear Lord, today

To some lonely soul that's gone astray

Help me lead them in the homeward way

Oh, send a great revival in my soul

englishTitle: WHAT A FRIEND WE HAVE IN JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: What a friend we have in Jesus,all our sins and griefs to bear!What a privilege to carryeverything to God in prayer!O what peace we often forfeit,O what needless pain we bear,all because we do not carryeverything to God in prayer!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Have we trials and temptations?Is there trouble anywhere?We should never be discouraged;take it to the Lord in prayer!Can we find a friend so faithfulwho will all our sorrows share?Jesus knows our every weakness;take it to the Lord in prayer!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Are we weak and heavy laden,cumbered with a load of care?Precious Savior, still our refuge--take it to the Lord in prayer!Do your friends despise, forsake you?Take it to the Lord in prayer!In his arms he'll take and shield you;you will find a solace there.

number: 838. WHAT A FRIEND WE HAVE IN JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling,calling for you and for me;see, on the portals he's waiting and watching,watching for you and for me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Come home, come home;you who are weary come home;earnestly, tenderly, Jesus is calling,calling, O sinner, come home!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Why should we tarry when Jesus is pleading,pleading for you and for me?Why should we linger and heed not his mercies,mercies for you and for me?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Time is now fleeting, the moments are passing,passing from you and from me;shadows are gathering, deathbeds are coming,coming for you and for me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: O for the wonderful love he has promised,promised for you and for me!Though we have sinned, he has mercy and pardon,pardon for you and for me

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
One is our Master,

the blessed Redeemer,

Strong is the bond that

unites us in Him:

Oh, may the love

His own Spirit hath kindled

Burn with a light

that will never grow dim.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Brethren in Jesus,

let us be faithful,

Faithful to Him

who is guiding our ways;

True in allegiance

and loving obedience,

Till in His glory hosannas we raise.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
One is our Master;

with gladness we’ll serve Him,

“Doing the will” of the

Lord “from the heart,”

Knowing His strength

is made perfect in weakness—

All that is needful

His grace will impart.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
One is our Master,

the highest and noblest,

Yet in His tenderness

always “the same”;

Be it our honour

to follow His banner,

Blessing for ever be unto His name.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
One is our Master;

and happy those servants,

Watching and ready

whene’er He may come;

Changed in His image,

from “glory to glory,”

Joyful reward in

His kingdom and home.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: How love­ly on the mount­ains are the feet of HimWho brings good news, good news;Announcing peace, pro­claim­ing news of hap­pi­ness:Our God reigns, our God reigns!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Our God reigns! Our God reigns!Our God reigns! Our God reigns!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He had no state­ly form, He had no ma­jes­tyThat we should be drawn to Him.He was de­spised and we took no ac­count of Him.Our God reigns, our God reigns!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: It was our sin and guilt that bruised and wound­ed Him.It was our sin that brought Him down.When we like sheep had gone astray our Shep­herd cameAnd on His shoul­ders bore our shame.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Meek as a lamb that’s led out to the slaugh­ter­house,Dumb as a sheep be­fore its shear­er,His life ran down up­on the ground like pour­ing rainThat we might be born again.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Out from the tomb He came with grace and ma­jes­ty;He is alive, He is alive.God loves us so, see here His hands, His feet, His sideYes we know, He is alive.

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics: Ring the bells ring the bellsLet the whole world knowChrist the Savior lives todayAs He did so long ago

english.title: Chorus
Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Amazing Grace will always be my song of praise

For it was grace, that brought my liberty

And i do not know just why He came to love me so

He looked beyond my fault and saw my need

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I shall forever lift mine eyes to Calvary

To view the cross where Jesus died for me

how marvelous the grace that caught my falling soul

He looked beyond my fault and saw my need.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
If not for grace my soul would be a drifting shape

With no safe harbor from the angry waves

But Calvary′s cross shines brightest through the darkest of storms

And just in time His mercy rescued me

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I shall forever lift my eyes to Calvary

To view the cross where Jesus died for me

And how marvelous the grace that caught my falling soul

He looked beyond my fault

He saw me in need

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There are so many things which to be thankful,There are so many things which to be glad;If we just tried to count all of our blessings,We would have joy that never have had.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Thank you, Jesus, for your true love.Thank you, Jesus, for saving my soul,Lest I wander from home yonder,Thank you, Jesus, for keeping me whole;And thank you, Jesus for salvation,For unfailing, mighty pow'r;I want to worship and adore you,And to thank you ev'ry hour.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: One day the Father sent Christ our RedeemerDown to this world to die for a lost race;What a great price was paid for our transgressions,Freely Christ offered love, mercy and grace.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: A mighty fortress is our God,a bulwark never failing;our helper he, amid the floodof mortal ills prevailing.For still our ancient foedoes seek to work us woe;his craft and power are great,and armed with cruel hate,on earth is not his equal.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Did we in our own strength confide,our striving would be losing,were not the right Man on our side,the Man of God's own choosing.You ask who that may be?Christ Jesus, it is he;Lord Sabaoth his name,from age to age the same;and he must win the battle.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: And though this world, with devils filled,should threaten to undo us,we will not fear, for God has willedhis truth to triumph through us.The prince of darkness grim,we tremble not for him;his rage we can endure,for lo! his doom is sure;one little word shall fell him.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: That Word above all earthly powersno thanks to them abideth;the Spirit and the gifts are oursthrough him who with us sideth.Let goods and kindred go,this mortal life also;the body they may kill:God's truth abideth still;his kingdom is forever!

englishTitle: THIS WORLD IS NOT MY HOME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: This world is not my home, I’m just a-passing through,My treasures are laid up somewhere beyond the blue;The angels beckon me from heaven’s open door,And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O Lord, You know I have no friend like You,If heaven’s not my home, then, Lord, what will I do?The angels beckon me from heaven’s open door,And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: They’re all expecting me, and that’s one thing I know—My Savior pardoned me, and now I onward go;I know He’ll take me through though I am weak and poor,And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I have a loving Savior up in glory-land,I don’t expect to stop until I with Him stand;He’s waiting now for me in heaven’s open door,And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Just up in glory-land we’ll live eternally,The saints on every hand are shouting victory,Their songs of sweetest praise drift back from heaven’s shore,And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

number: 847: THIS WORLD IS NOT MY HOME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Gone from my heart the world and all its charms;Now through the blood I’m saved from all alarms;Down at the cross my heart is bending low;The precious blood of Jesus cleanses white as snow.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I love Him, I love Him,Because He first loved me,And purchased my salvation on Calv’ry’s tree.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Once I was lost, and ’way down deep in sin;Once was a slave to passions fierce within;Once was afraid to meet an angry God;But now I’m cleansed from ev’ry stain through Jesus’ blood.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Once I was bound, but now I am set free;Once I was blind, but now the light I see;Once I was dead, but now in Christ I live,To tell the world around the peace that He doth give.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Shall I come just as I am,Come with all my guilt and sin?If I open wide my heart,Will He enter in?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: As you are, just as you areCome to Jesus, come today;He will kindly welcome you,Take your sins away.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Shall I come vile as I am,And bend low at Jesus' feet?Shall I plead His pard'ning grace,And His love entreat?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Shall I come with all my fear,Lest my sins have been too great?Shall I break thro' all my doubts,To sweet mercy's gate?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Shall I come, tho' far awayFrom the loving Shepherd's fold?Will He bless me if I firmTo His promise hold?

englishTitle: LIFE AT BEST IS VERY BRIEF

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Life at best is very brief,

Like the falling of a leaf,

Like the binding of a sheaf,

Be in time!

Fleeting days are telling fast

That the die will soon be cast,

And the fatal line be passed,

Be in time!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Be in time! Be in time!

While the voice of Jesus calls you,

Be in time!

If in sin you longer wait,

You may find no open gate,

And your cry be just too late:

Be in time!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Fairest flowers soon decay,

Youth and beauty pass away;

O you have not long to stay,

Be in time!

While God’s Spirit bids you come,

Sinner, do not longer roam,

Lest you seal your hopeless doom,

Be in time!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Time is gliding swiftly by,

Death and judgment draweth nigh,

To the arms of Jesus fly,

Be in time!

O I pray you count the cost!

Ere the fatal line be crossed,

And your soul in hell be lost,

Be in time!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Sinner, heed the warning voice,

Make the Lord your final choice,

Then all heaven will rejoice,

Be in time!

Come from darkness into light;

Come, let Jesus make you right;

Come, receive His life tonight,

Be in time!

number: 851: LIFE AT BEST IS VERY BRIEF

englishTitle: PAUSE FOR A MOMENT OF PRAYER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Weary and worn in the battle of life,Driven and beaten by sorrow and strife;Turn to your Saviour your burden to share;Pause at His feet for a moment of prayer.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Pause at His feet for a moment of prayer;Honor the dear blessed name that we bearPause in your hurry, worry and care,Pause at His feet for a moment of prayer.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Pray for His strength lest you fall by the wayPlead for His grace to sustain you today;Safely through evil His armor to wearPause at His feet for a moment of prayer.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Pause to partake of the sweet living breadDrink of His life at the great fountain head;Christ will restore you from sin and despair,Pause at His feet for a moment of prayer.

number: 852: PAUSE FOR A MOMENT OF PRAYER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: God calling yet! shall I not hear?Earth’s pleasures shall I still hold dear?Shall life’s swift passing years all fly,And still my soul in slumber lie?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: God calling yet! shall I not rise?Can I His loving voice despise,And basely His kind care repay?He calls me still; can I delay?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: God calling yet! and shall He knock,And I my heart the closer lock?He still is waiting to receive,And shall I dare His Spirit grieve?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: God calling yet! and shall I giveNo heed, but still in bondage live?I wait, but He does not forsake;He calls me still; my heart, awake!

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: God calling yet! I cannot stay;My heart I yield without delay;Vain world, farewell, from thee I part;The voice of God hath reached my heart.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Bowed beneath your burden, is there none to share?Weary with the journey, is there none to care?Courage, wayworn traveler, heed your Lord’s commands,There’s a thought to cheer you, Jesus understands.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Yes, He understands, all His ways are best.Hear, He calls to you, Come to Me and rest.Leave the unknown future in the Master’s hand,Whether sad or joyful, Jesus understands.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Every heavy burden, He will gladly share,Are you sad and weary? Jesus has a care;Well He knows the pathway o’er life’s burning sands,Courage, fainting pilgrim, Jesus understands.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Though temptation meet you, Jesus can sustain,Life has vexing problems which He can explain;Serve Him where He sends you, though in distant lands,Do not doubt or question, Jesus understands.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Weary heart, He calls you, Come to Me and rest,Does the path grow rugged? yet His way is best;Leave the unknown future in the Master’s hands,Whether sad or joyful, Jesus understands.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There is no friend like Jesus, in weakness,No one who lifts such burdens of care;No one like Him to strengthen and guide me,No one like Him to hearken to prayer.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: There is no friend like Jesus my Saviour,No one like Him to help and defend,No one like Him, my blessed Redeemer,No one like Him, my Wonderful Friend.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There is no friend like Him in temptation,Fully He knows the depth of its power,Met it for me and triumphed forever,Just to become my strength and my tower.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: There is no friend like Jesus, in sorrow;No one like Him hath sorrowed and sighed;No one so comforts me like a mother,No one whose heart is open so wide.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: There is no friend such hope hath imparted;No one but Jesus bringeth such calm;No one who comes to earth’s broken hearted,Ever bestows such healing and balm

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: We would see Jesus, for the shadows lengthenAcross this little landscape of our life;We would see Jesus, our weak faith to strengthenFor the last weariness, the final strife.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: We would see Jesus, the great rock foundationWhereon our feet were set with sov’reign grace;Nor life nor death, with all their agitation,Can thence remove us, if we see His face.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: We would see Jesus; other lights are paling,Which for long years we have rejoiced to see;The blessings of our pilgrimage are failing;We would not mourn them, for we go to Thee.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: We would see Jesus: this is all we’re needing;Strength, joy, and willingness come with the sight;We would see Jesus, dying, risen, pleading;Then welcome day, and farewell mortal night.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The name of Jesus is so sweet,I love its music to repeat;It makes my joys full and complete,The precious name of Jesus!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: “Jesus,” oh, how sweet the name!“Jesus,” every day the same;“Jesus,” let all saints proclaimIts worthy praise forever!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I love the name of Him whose heartKnows all my griefs and bears a part;Who bids all anxious fears depart,I love the name of Jesus!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: That name I fondly love to hear,It never fails my heart to cheer;Its music dries the falling tear,Exalt the name of Jesus!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: No word of man can ever tellHow sweet the name I love so well;Oh, let its praises ever swell,Oh, praise the name of Jesus!

englishTitle: BRING YOUR VESSEL NOT A FEW

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Are you looking for the fullnessof the blessing of the lordIn your heart and life today?Claim the promise of your Father,come according to His word,in the blessed old time way.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He will fill your heart today to overflowing,As the Lord commandeth you,"Bring your vessels, not a few;"He will fill your heart today to overflowingWith the Holy Ghost and pow'r.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Bring your empty earthen vessels,clean thro' Jesus' precious blood,Come, ye needy, one and all;And in human consecrationwait before the throne of God,'Till the Holy Ghost shall fall.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Like the cruse of oil unfailingis His grace forevermore,And His love unchanging still;And according to His promisewith the Holy Ghost and pow'r,He will ev'ry vessel fill.

number: 859: BRING YOUR VESSEL NOT A FEW

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: My soul is so happy in Jesus,For He is so precious to me;His voice it is music to hear it,His face it is heaven to see.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I am happy in Him,I am happy in Him;My soul with delightHe fills day and night,For I am happy in Him.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He sought me so long ere I knew Him,When wand’ring afar from the fold;Safe home in His arms He hath bro't me,To where there are pleasures untold.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: His love and His mercy surround me,His grace like a river doth flow;His Spirit, to guide and to comfort,Is with me wherever I go.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: They say I shall some day be like Him,My cross and my burden lay down;Till then I will ever be faithful,In gathering gems for His crown.

englishTitle: NO ONE EVER CARED LIKE JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I would love to tell youWhat I think of JesusSince I found in HimA friend so strong and trueI would tell you howHe changed my life completelyHe did somethingThat no other friend could do

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: No one ever cared for me like JesusThere's no other friend so kind as HeNo one else could take the sinAnd darkness from meO how much He cared for me

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: All my life was full of sinWhen Jesus found meAll my heart was fullOf misery and woeJesus placed His strongAnd loving arms around meAnd He led me in the wayI ought to go

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Ev'ry day He comes to meWith new assuranceMore and more I understandHis words of loveBut I'll never knowJust why He came to save meTill someday I seeHis blessed face above

number: 861: NO ONE EVER CARED LIKE JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Life is like a mountain railway,With an engineer that’s brave;We must make the run successful,From the cradle to the grave;Watch the curves, the fills, the tunnels;Never falter, never fail;Keep your hands upon the throttle,And your eyes upon the rail.

english.title: Chorus
