english.lyrics: Blessed Savior, Thou wilt guide us,Till we reach that blissful shore,Where the angels wait to join usIn Thy praise forevermore.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: You will roll up grades of trial;You will cross the bridge of strife;See that Christ is your conductorOn this lightning train of life;Always mindful of obstruction,Do your duty, never fail;Keep your hands upon the throttle,And your eyes upon the rail.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: You will often find obstructions,Look for storms and wind and rain;On a fill, or curve, or trestleThey will almost ditch your train;Put your trust alone in Jesus,Never falter, never fail;Keep your hands upon the throttle,And your eyes upon the rail.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: As you roll across the trestle,Spanning Jordan’s swelling tide,You behold the Union DepotInto which your train will glide;There you’ll meet the Sup’rintendent,God the Father, God the Son,With the hearty, joyous plaudit,“Weary Pilgrim, welcome home.”

englishTitle: JUST A CLOSER WALK WITH THEE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 I am weak but Thou art strong;Jesus, keep me from all wrong;I'll be satisfied as longAs I walk, let me walk close to Thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Just a closer walk with Thee,Grant it, Jesus, is my plea,Daily walking close to Thee,Let it be, dear Lord, let it be.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Thro' this world of toil and snares,If I falter, Lord, who cares?Who with me my burden shares?None but Thee, dear Lord, none but Thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When my feeble life is o'er,Time for me will be no more;Guide me gently, safely o'erTo Thy kingdom shore, to Thy shore.

englishTitle: MY TIMES ARE IN YOUR HANDS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: My times are in Your hand;my God, I wish them there!My life, my friends, my soul, I leaveentirely to Your care.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: My times are in Your handwhatever they may be,pleasing or painful, dark or bright,as You know best for me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: My times are in Your hand;why should I doubt or fear?My Father's hand will never causeHis child a needless tear.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: My times are in Your hand:Jesus, the Crucified;those hands my cruel sins had piercedare now my guard and guide.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: My times are in Your hand;such faith You give to methat after death, at Your right handI shall for ever be.

number: 866: MY TIMES ARE IN YOUR HANDS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Long years we have yearnedFor the show­ers of bless­ing,Have ear­nest­ly prayed for abun­dance of rain;Praise God, some are sing­ingThe new song of Hea­ven,The breath of the Spir­it brings pow­er again.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Power again, pow­er again,Our hearts have been tuned to the sweet re­frain,The breath of the Spir­it brings pow­er again.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The life has been fruit­less,The heart dry and thirs­ty,The task of the Mas­ter seemed giv­en in vain;But now ev’ry day is a day of rich bless­ing,The breath of the Spir­it brings pow­er again.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: No tithes have been broughtTo the store­house of Hea­ven,Our pow­ers for ser­vice long dor­mant have lain;But now ev’ry im­pulse is used in God’s glo­ry,The breath of the Spir­it brings pow­er again.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: No souls have been wonFor the king­dom of glo­ry,But pow­er for ser­vice we now may ob­tain;Then glad­ly as reap­ers we enter the har­vest,The breath of the Spir­it brings pow­er again.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Unbounded grace it reached to meWhen hope was gone from viewIn my despair Christ came to meAs He alone could do

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Grace was for me the only wayMy guilt could find reliefMy destiny was changed that dayI reached out in belief

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: God’s grace does not on me dependIt’s God who is my StayHis love is offered without endHe walks with me each day

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The universe with joy will ringWhen grace has won the dayAs all creation joins to singPraise God who paid man’s way

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus wants me for a sun­beam,To shine for Him each day;In ev­ery way try to please Him,At home, at school, at play.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: A sun­beam, a sun­beam,Jesus wants me for a sun­beam;A sun­beam, a sun­beam,I’ll be a sun­beam for Him.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Jesus wants me to be lov­ing,And kind to all I see;Showing how plea­sant and hap­pyHis lit­tle one can be.



I will ask Je­sus to help meTo keep my heart from sin,Ever re­flect­ing His good­ness,And al­ways shine for Him.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I’ll be a sun­beam for Je­sus;I can if I but try;Serving Him mo­ment by mo­ment,Then live with Him on high.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Go, labor on: spend, and be spent,Thy joy to do the Father’s will:It is the way the Master went;Should not the servant tread it still?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Go, labor on! ’Tis not for naughtThine earthly loss is heav’nly gain;Men heed thee, love thee, praise thee not;The Master praises: what are men?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Go, labor on! Enough, while here,If He shall praise thee, if He deignThe willing heart to mark and cheer:No toil for Him shall be in vain.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Go, labor on! Your hands are weak,Your knees are faint, your soul cast down;Yet falter not; the prize you seekIs near—a kingdom and a crown.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Go, labor on while it is day:The world’s dark night is hast’ning on;Speed, speed thy work, cast sloth away;It is not thus that souls are won.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: Men die in darkness at thy side,Without a hope to cheer the tomb;Take up the torch and wave it wide—The torch that lights time’s thickest gloom.

english.title: Verse 7
english.lyrics: Toil on, faint not, keep watch and pray,Be wise the erring soul to win;Go forth into the world’s highway,Compel the wand’rer to come in.

english.title: Verse 8
english.lyrics: Toil on, and in thy toil rejoice!For toil comes rest, for exile home;Soon shalt thou hear the Bridegroom’s voice,The midnight peal, “Behold, I come!”

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When your grief cannot be spokenIf you smile, it's but a tokenWhen your heart is nearly brokenSpend a little time with Jesus in prayer

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Spend a little time with Jesus in prayerHe alone can lift your heavy load of careTell him all about the things that try youEvery little need he will supply youSpend a little time with Jesus in prayer

When you're weary from life's hurryWhen you're filled with doubt and worryWhen the storm-clouds show their furySpend a little time with Jesus in prayer

When the future makes you wonderAs the road ahead you ponderAre there many problems yonder?Spend a little time with Jesus in prayer

englishTitle: I’VE A HOME BEYOND THE RIVER

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I've a home beyond the riverI've a mansion bright and fairI've a home beyond the riverI will dwell with Jesus there

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Oh the blessed contemplationWhen with trouble here I sighI've a home beyond the riverThat I'll enter by and by

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Just a little more to laborTell the story watch and prayJust a few more earthly sorrowsThen to heav'n we'll fly away

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh how sweet t'will be to meet themAll the ransomed host aboveSweeter still to see the SaviorPraise Him for redeeming love

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Tho the world is filled with sorrowAnd the teardrops often fallThere will be but joy and gladnessSafe inside the jasper wall

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Tho the hills are rough and stonyAnd the valleys dark and coldI must walk the path before meIt will someday turn to gold

number: 874: I’VE A HOME BEYOND THE RIVER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Christ has need of soldiers,brave and staunch and true;In the front of battlethere’s a place for you;Ever marching onwardthrough a world of sin,For the heav’nly countryis the prize we win.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Onward! soldiers of the cross,Doubting never, trusting ever;Onward! soldiers of the cross,Trusting the Lord, heeding His Word,Onward to victory!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Satan would oppose us,tempt our souls to stray,But through Him who loves uswe shall win the day;Other valiant soldiersin the ages past,O’er this upward pathwayreached their home at last.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Let us then with couragepress our upward way,With our gaze on Jesus,ever watch and pray;Blazoned on our banner,Christ the Lord of all,While we shout, Hosanna,Satan’s hosts must fall

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Thanks to God for my Redeemer,Thanks for all Thou dost provide!Thanks for times now but a mem’ry,Thanks for Jesus by my side!Thanks for pleasant, balmy springtime,Thanks for dark and stormy fall!Thanks for tears by now forgotten,Thanks for peace within my soul!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Thanks for prayers that Thou hast answered,Thanks for what Thou dost deny!Thanks for storms that I have weathered,Thanks for all Thou dost supply!Thanks for pain, and thanks for pleasure,Thanks for comfort in despair!Thanks for grace that none can measure,Thanks for love beyond compare!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Thanks for roses by the wayside,Thanks for thorns their stems contain!Thanks for home and thanks for fireside,Thanks for hope, that sweet Thanks for joy and thanks for sorrow,Thanks for heav’nly peace with Thee!Thanks for hope in the tomorrow,Thanks through all eternity!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: (Oh) God is so WonderfulI can't explain but I can sayGlory hallelujahPraise His Holy Name

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: It's wonderful because He saved meIt's wonderful that He forgave meIt's wonderful wonderfulSo very wonderful wonderful that He is mine

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I cast on Him my ev'ry burdenLay at His feet my ev'ry careIt's wonderful wonderfulSo very wonderful wonderful that He is mine

englishTitle: PRAISE YE THE LORD O SING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O praise ye the LORD and sing a new song,amid all His saints His praises prolong;the praise of their Maker His people shall sing,and children of Zion rejoice in their King.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: With timbrel and harp and joyful acclaim,with gladness and mirth, sing praise to His name;for God in His people His pleasure doth seek,with robes of salvation He clotheth the meek.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: In glory exult, ye saints of the LORD;with songs in the night high praises accord;go forth in His service, be strong in His mightto conquer all evil and stand for the right.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: For this is His word: His saints shall not fail,but over the earth their pow'r shall prevail;all kingdoms and nations shall yield to their sway.To God give the glory and praise Him for aye.

number: 880: PRAISE YE THE LORD O SING

englishTitle: GUIDE ME O THOU GREAT JEHOVAH

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Guide me, O my great Redeemer,pilgrim through this barren land;I am weak, but you are mighty;hold me with your powerful hand.Bread of heaven, bread of heaven,feed me now and evermore,feed me now and evermore.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Open now the crystal fountain,where the healing waters flow.Let the fire and cloudy pillarlead me all my journey through.Strong Deliverer, strong Deliverer,ever be my strength and shield,ever be my strength and shield.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When I tread the verge of Jordan,bid my anxious fears subside.Death of death, and hell's Destruction,land me safe on Canaan's side.Songs of praises, songs of praisesI will ever sing to you,I will ever sing to you.

number: 882: GUIDE ME O THOU GREAT JEHOVAH

englishTitle: THE SON HATH MADE YOU FREE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I was once in Egypt’s bondage,But deliverance came to me,And I’m living now in Canaan,For the Son hath made me free.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I am dwelling now in Canaan,Jesus’ blood avails for me;I am free from condemnation,For the Son hath made me free.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I was once a slave to Satan,And he worked his will in me,But I’m bound by sin no longer,For the Son hath made me free.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Ere I entered into Canaan,Inbred sin remained in me;But from it I’ve found a cleansing,For the Son hath made me free.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: All my fear, all condemnation,All that stood ’twixt God and me,Praise His name! are left behind meFor the Son hath made me free.

number: 883: THE SON HATH MADE YOU FREE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The path that I have trod,

Has brought me nearer God,

Though oft it led through sorrow's gates .

Though not the way I choose,

In my way I might lose

The joy that yet for me awaits

Not what I wish to be,

Nor where I wish to go,

For who am I that I should choose my way?

The Lord shall choose for me,

'Tis better far, I know,

So let him bid me go, or stay

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
The cross that I must bear,

If I a crown would wear,

Is not the cross that I should take;

But since on me 'tis laid,

I'll take it unafraid,

And bear it for the Master's sake.

Not what I wish to be,

Nor where I wish to go,

For who am I that I should choose my way?

The Lord shall choose for me,

'Tis better far, I know,

So let him bid me go, or stay

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Submission to the will

Of him who guides me still

Is surety of His love revealed;

My soul shall rise above

This world in which I move,

I conquer only when I yield.

Not what I wish to be,

Nor where I wish to go,

For who am I that I should choose my way?

The Lord shall choose for me,

'Tis better far, I know,

So let him bid me go, or stay

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Saviour, blessed Saviour,

Listen while we sing;

Hearts and voices raising

Praises to our King:

All we have we offer,

All we hope to be,

Body, soul, and spirit,

All we yield to thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Nearer, ever nearer,

Christ we draw to thee,

Deep in adoration

Bending low the knee;

Thou for our redemption

Cam'st on earth to die;

Thou, that we might follow,

Hast gone up on high.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Great and ever greater,

Are thy mercies here;

True and everlasting

Are the glories there,

Where no pain nor sorrow,

Fear nor care, is known,

Where the angel legions

Circle round thy throne.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Higher then, and higher,

Bear the ransomed soul,

Earthly toils forgotten,

Saviour, to its goal;

Where, in joys unthought of,

Saints with angels sing,

Never weary, raising

Praises to their King.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Speak, my Lord, speak, my Lord,Speak, and I'll be quick to answer Thee;Speak, my Lord, speak, my Lord,Speak, and I will answer, “Lord, send me.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When the coal of fire touched the prophet,Making him as pure, as pure can be;When the voice of God said, “Who'll go for us?”Then he answered, “Here am I, send me.”

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Millions now in sin and shame are dying;Listen to their sad and bitter cry;Hasten, brother, hasten to the rescue;Quickly answer, “Master, here am I.”

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Soon the time for reaping will be over;Soon we'll gather for the harvest, home;May the Lord of harvest smile upon us,May we hear His blessed, “Child, well done.”

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: In the book of God so preciousWe are told of pentecost,How the blessed Lord’s disciplesTarried for the Holy Ghost.Pentecostal fire fell on them,Burning up their sin and dross,Filling them with pow’r for service,Making them a mighty host.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Pentecostal fire is falling,Praise the Lord, it fell on me,Pentecostal fire is falling,Brother, it will fall on thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Pentecost can be repeated,For the Lord is just the same,Yesterday, today, forever,Glory to His precious name!Saints of God can be victoriousOver sin and death and hell;Have a full and free salvation,And the blessed story tell.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When the Church of Jesus tarries,Pentecostal fire will fall;Sin and wrong will be defeated,Sinners on the Lord will call.She will march to glorious vict’ry,Over ev’ry land and sea,Lifting high the blood-stained banner,Holiness her motto be.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Master, speak! thy servant heareth,waiting for thy gracious word,longing for thy voice that cheereth,Master, let it now be heard.I am list'ning, Lord, for thee;what hast thou to say to me?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Speak to me by name, O Master,let me know it is to me;speak, that I may follow faster,with a step more firm and free,where the Shepherd leads the flock,in the shadow of the Rock!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Master, speak! tho' least and lowest,let me not unheard depart;Master, speak! for oh, thou knowestall the yearning of my heart,knowest all its truest need;speak! and make me blest indeed.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Master, speak! and make me ready,when thy voice is truly heard,with obedience glad and steady,still to follow ev'ry word.I am listening, Lord, for thee:Master, speak, oh speak to me!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Are you weary, are you heavyhearted?Tell it to Jesus,Tell it to Jesus;Are you grieving over joys departed?Tell it to Jesus alone.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Tell it to Jesus, tell it to Jesus,He is a friend that's well known;You've no other such a friend or brother,Tell it to Jesus alone.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Do the tears flow down your cheeks unbidden?Tell it to Jesus,Tell it to Jesus;Have you sins that to men's eyes are hidden?Tell it to Jesus alone.

english.title: Verse 3
Verse 4
english.lyrics: Are you troubled at the thought of dying?Tell it to Jesus,Tell it to Jesus;For Christ's coming kingdom are you sighing?Tell it to Jesus alone.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
See him lying on a bed of straw:

a draughty stable with an open door;

Mary cradling the babe she bore

the prince of glory is his name.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
O now carry me to Bethlehem

to see the Lord of love again:

just as poor as was the stable then,

the prince of glory when he came.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Star of silver, sweep across the skies,

show where Jesus in the manger lies;

shepherds, swiftly from your stupor rise

to see the saviour of the world!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Angels, sing again the song you sang,

sing the glory of God's gracious plan;

Sing that Bethl'em's little baby can

be the saviour of us all.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Mine are riches, from your poverty,

from your innocence, eternity;

mine, forgiveness by your death for me,

child of sorrow for my joy.

englishTitle: I LOVE TO WALK WITH JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Oh, I love to walk with JesusLike the publicans of old,When He gathered them about HimAnd the blessed tidings told;How He came to bring deliv'ranceTo the captives in distress,Take away our ev’ry burden,Giving perfect peace and rest

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I will follow where He leadeth,I will pasture where He feedeth,I will follow all the way, Lord,I will follow Jesus ev’ry day.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Oh, I love to walk with JesusLike the man of long ago,Who had tarried by the waysideNear the gates of Jericho;Jesus heard his cry for mercy,Gave him back his sight that day,And immediately he followedJesus all along the way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh, I love to walk with JesusAll the way to Calv’ry’s brow,Gaze upon that scene of suff'ring,While my tears of sorrow flow;There He tells me how He loves me,Takes my ev’ry sin away,So I follow Him so gladly,Lead me anywhere He may.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Oh, sometime I’ll walk with JesusIn the land of endless day,When our journey here is overAnd we’ve reached our home to stay;Then I’ll walk with Him foreverSing His praises o’er and o’er,Laugh and shout, and ever tell HimThat I love Him more and more.

number: 892: I LOVE TO WALK WITH JESUS

english.title: Verse 1

englishTitle: My sheep hear My voice, and the path that I take,They follow wherever I go;My sheep know My voice and come at my call,But a stranger’s voice do they not know.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: My sheep know My voice, and day by dayThey abide in the fold and go not astray,They love Me because I have made them my choice,And they follow My call for My sheep know My voice.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: My sheep know My voice, and the pastures of green,Where I lead them so often to feed;My sheep know My voice and the cool sparkling streamWhere beside its still waters I lead.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: My sheep know My voice, and the valley of deathThrough which I shall lead them some day;But no danger nor harm can touch one of them,For I will be with them alway.

number: 1. My sheep hear My voice, and the path that I take,They follow wherever I go;My sheep know My voice and come at my call,But a stranger’s voice do they not know.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O my brother, do you know the Savior,Who is wondrous, kind, and true?He’s the Rock of your salvation!There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Oh, there’s honey in the Rock, my brother;There’s honey in the Rock for you.Leave your sins for the Blood to cover;There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Have you tasted that the Lord is gracious?Do you walk in the way that’s new?Have you drunk from the living fountain?There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Do you pray unto God the Father,“What wilt Thou have me to do?”Never fear, He will surely answer,There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Then go out through the streets and byways,Preach the Word to the many or few;Say to every fallen brother,There’s honey in the Rock for you.

englishTitle: LET US HEAR YOU TELL IT OVER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O brother, have you told how the Lord forgave?Let us hear you tell it over once again;Thy coming to the cross, where he died to save,Let us hear you tell it over once again.Are you walking now in his blessed light?Are you cleansed from ev’ry guilty stain?Is he your joy by day and your song by night?Let us hear you tell it over once again.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Let us hear, you tell to over tell it over once again.Tell the sweet and blessed story,It will help you on to glory,Let us hear you tell it over once again.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When toiling up the way, was the Saviour there?Let us hear you tell it over once again;Did Jesus bear you up in His tender care?Let us hear you tell it over once again.Never have you found such a friend as he,Who can help you ‘midst the toil and pain;O all the world should hear what he’s done for thee;Let us hear you tell it over once again.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Was ever on your tongue such a blessed theme?Let us hear you tell it over once again;‘Tis ever sweeter far than the sweetest dream,Let us hear you tell it over once again.There are aching hearts in the world’s great throng,Who have sought for rest, and all in vain;Hold Jesus up to them by your word and song;Let us hear you tell it over once again.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The battles you have fought, and the vict’ries won,Let us hear you tell it over once again;‘Twill help them on the way who have just begun,Let us hear you tell it over once again.We are striving now with the hosts of sin,Soon with Christ our Savior we shall reign;Ye ransomed of the Lord, try a soul to win;Let us hear you tell it over once again.

number: 895: LET US HEAR YOU TELL IT OVER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Precious Lord, take my hand,Lead me on, let me stand,I am tired, I am weak, I am worn;Through the storm, through the night,Lead me on to the light:

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Take my hand, pre­cious Lord,Lead me home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When my way grows drear,Precious Lord, lin­ger near,When my life is al­most gone,Hear my cry, hear my call,Hold my hand lest I fall:

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When the dark­ness ap­pearsAnd the night draws near,And the day is past and gone,At the ri­ver I stand,Guide my feet, hold my hand:

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Breathe on me, Breath of God,fill me with life anew,that I may love the way you love,and do what you would do.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Breathe on me, Breath of God,until my heart is pure,until my will is one with yours,to do and to endure.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Breathe on me, Breath of God,so shall I never die,but live with you the perfect lifefor all eternity.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: On life’s pathway I am never lonely,My Lord is with me, my Lord divine;Ever present guide, I trust Him only,No longer lonely, for He is mine.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: No longer lonely, no longer lonely,For Jesus is the friend of friends to me;No longer lonely, no longer lonely,For Jesus is the friend of friends to me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I shall not be lonely in my sorrow,He will sustain me until the end;Darkest night He turns to brightest morrow,No longer lonely! He is my friend.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I shall not be lonely in the valleyTho’ shadows gather, I will not fear;He has promised ever to uphold me,No longer lonely! He will be near.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There is something in my soul

Which keeps the shadows all away;

It is love, my Savior’s love!

Something lightens every burden,

Gives me gladness day by day,

It is love, my Savior’s love.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
O the precious love of Jesus,

How it thrills my ransomed soul!

More and more I’ll sing its praises

While the happy ages roll.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When the tempter tries to win me

Something keeps me true and strong;

It is love, my Savior’s love!

Something makes my life a blessing

To the needy in the throng,

It is love, my Savior’s love.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When misfortune overtakes me

Something calms my troubled breast;

It is love, my Savior’s love!

Something draws my soul to heaven,

That sweet land of peace and rest.

It is love, my Savior’s love.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Soul astray and bowed in sorrow,

Something waits for you today;

It is love, my Savior’s love!

It would give you peace and comfort,

Make your burdens roll away,

It is love, my Savior’s love.

englishTitle: WE SHALL SEE THE KING ONE DAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Tho' the way we journey may be often drear,We shall see the King some day;On that blessèd morning clouds will disappear;We shall see the King some day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: We shall see the King some day,We will shout and sing some day;Gathered ’round the throne,When He shall call His own,We shall see the King some day.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: After pain and anguish, after toil and care,We shall see the King some day;Thro' the endless ages joy and blessing share,We shall see the King some day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: After foes are conquered, after battles won,We shall see the King some day;After strife is over, after set of sun,We shall see the King some day.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: There with all the loved ones who have gone before,We shall see the King some day;Sorrow past forever, on that peaceful shore,We shall see the King some day.

number: 902. WE SHALL SEE THE KING ONE DAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Come, Thou Almighty King,help us Thy name to sing;help us to praise:Father, all glorious,o'er all victorious,come, and reign over us,Ancient of Days.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Come, Thou Incarnate Word,gird on Thy mighty sword,our pray'r attend:come, and Thy people bless,and give Thy Word success:Spirit of holiness,on us descend.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Come, Holy Comforter,Thy sacred witness bearin this glad hour:Thou who almighty art,now rule in every heart,and ne'er from us depart,Spirit of pow'r.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: To Thee, great One in Three,eternal praises behence, evermore.His sov'reign majestymay we in glory see,and to eternitylove and adore!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: To Canaan’s land I’m on my way,Where the soul never dies;My darkest night will turn to day,Where the soul never dies.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: No sad farewells,No tear-dimmed eyes;Where all is love,And the soul never dies.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: A rose is blooming there for me,Where the soul never dies;And I will spend eternity,Where the soul never dies.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: A love light beams across the foam,Where the soul never dies;It shines to light the shores of home,Where the soul never dies.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: My life will end in deathless sleep,Where the soul never dies;And everlasting joys I’ll reap,Where the soul of man never dies.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: I’m on my way to that fair land,Where the soul of man never dies;Where there will be no parting hand,Where the soul never dies.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When the storms of life are raging,Tempests wild on sea and land,I will seek a place of refugeIn the shadow of God’s hand.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He will hide me, He will hide me,Where no harm can e’er betide me;He will hide me, safely hide me,In the shadow of His hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Though He may send some affliction,’Twill but make me long for home;For in love and not in anger,All His chastenings will come.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Enemies may strive to injure,Satan all his arts employ;He will turn what seems to harm meInto everlasting joy.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: So while here the cross I’m bearing,Meeting storms and billows wild,Jesus for my soul is caring,Naught can harm His Father’s child.

englishTitle: BEARING THE CROSS TO WIN THE CROWN

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics: Bearing the cross, bearing the crossBearing the cross to win the CrownI need Thy light to guide me arightBearing the cross to win the Crown

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Often my soul is burden heavy with careSatan oft try to turn me ’roundBut I’ll keep walking in the straight narrow wayBearing the cross to win the CrownVerse 3

Must Jesus bear the cross and let us go freeUntil the sun of life goes downKnow there’s a cross for you, and there’s a one for meBearing the cross to win the Crown

number: 906: BEARING THE CROSS TO WIN THE CROWN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: While we pray and while we plead,While you see your soul’s deep need,While our Father calls you home,Will you not, my brother, come?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Why not now? Why not now?/4x

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: You have wandered far away;Do not risk another day;Do not turn from God your face,But today accept His grace.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: In the world you’ve failed to findAught of peace for troubled mind;Come to Christ, on Him believe,Peace and joy you shall receive.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Come to Christ, confession make;Come to Christ, and pardon take;Trust in Him from day to day,He will keep you all the way

englishTitle: COME FOR ALL THINGS ARE READY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Come, for all things are rea­dy!

’Tis a ban­quet of love;

Here’s a free in­vi­ta­tion

From the Mas­ter above:

It is writ­ten in crim­son,

Drawn from Cal­va­ry’s flood,

From the won­der­ful fount­ain

Of the soul cleans­ing blood.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh, what fullness in Je­sus!

Oh, what glad­ness to know,

Though our sins be as scarlet,

He’ll make them as snow.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Come, for all things are rea­dy!

Heaven’s boun­ty is spread;

Take the cup of sal­va­tion,

Take the life giv­ing bread:

Come, the poor and un­wor­thy,

Come, though sin­ful and weak;

’Tis the hun­gry and thirs­ty

Whom the Mas­ter doth seek.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Come, for all things are rea­dy!

Here’s a robe, snowy white,

Fairer far than the rai­ment

Of the an­gels of light:

For the beau­ty of Je­sus

Will thy co­ver­ing be;

Only ask for this gar­ment,

’Twill be giv­en to thee.

number: 908: COME FOR ALL THINGS ARE READY

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
He will save you, He will save you,

He will save you now.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Come then and join this holy band,

And on to glory go,

To dwell in that celestial land,

Where joys immortal flow.

I will trust Him, I will trust Him,

I will trust Him now;

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O think of the home over there,

By the side of the river of light,

Where the saints all immortal and fair

Are robed in their garments of white.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Over there, over there, O think of the home over there.

Over there, over there, O think of the home over there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
O think of the friends over there,

Who before us the journey have trod;

Of the song that they breathe on the air

In their home in the palace of God.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
My Saviour is now over there,

Where my kindred and friends are at rest;

Then away from my sorrow and care

Let me fly to the land of the blest.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I’ll soon be at home over there,

For the end of my journey I see;

Many dear to my heart over there

Are waiting and watching for me.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
On that bright and golden morning, when the Son of Man shall come,

And the radiance of His glory we shall see,

When from ev’ry clime and nation He shall call His people home,

What a gath’ring of the ransomed that will be!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
What a gath’ring, what a gath’ring,

What a gath’ring of the ransomed in the summer land of love!

What a gath’ring, what a gath’ring,

Of the ransomed in that happy home above!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When the blest, who sleep in Jesus, at His bidding shall arise

From the silence of the grave, and from the sea,

And with bodies all celestial they shall meet Him in the skies,

What a gath’ring and rejoicing there will be!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When our eyes behold the city, with its many mansions bright,

And its river, calm and restful, flowing free,

When the friends that death hath parted shall in bliss again unite,

What a gath’ring and a greeting there will be!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
O the King is surely coming, and the time is drawing nigh

When the blessed day of promise we shall see;

Then the changing “in a moment, in the twinkling of an eye,”

And forever in His presence we shall be.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I know Thy hand upholdeth me,

My Savior and my God;

And step by step I’ll follow Thee

Where’er Thy feet have trod.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I know in whom I have believed,

And, knowing, I am blest;

Thou art the anchor of my soul—

In Thee my hope shall rest.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I know Thy hand upholdeth me,

When doubt and danger near

Would tempt me from the narrow way,

Or fill my heart with fear.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I know Thy hand upholdeth me,

And will in safety keep

My trusting heart, though I may pass

Through waters dark and deep.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I know Thy hand upholdeth me,

And will my soul defend;

Sufficient is Thy grace, O Lord,

To keep me to the end.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Forth from God’s throne, into this world of woe,

Came God’s own Son, salvation to bestow;

Nailed to the cross in pain and agony,

Laid in the tomb to save both you and me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus arose! Praise His holy name!

Jesus arose! Death He overcame!

An angel rolled away the stone,

My Lord arose to save His own,

And now He reigns upon His throne!

Hallelujah! Hallelujah!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Three days He lay within that dark domain,

Then with new life, forth from the tomb He came;

Christ has the key; oh, death, where is thy sting?

Our Lord doth live! Oh, let your praises ring!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Tho’ He’s on high, He’s coming back some day,

Then from this earth, He’ll carry us away;

E’en tho’ we die, we know we’ll rise again,

For Christ arose, our precious souls to win!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
It won’t be very long till this short life shall end,

It won’t be very long till Jesus shall descend;

And then the dead in Christ from beds of clay shall rise

To meet the Lord and King up yonder in the skies.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
It won’t be very long,

It won’t be very long

Till Jesus shall appear,

That day is drawing near;

Will you be ready then

To meet the ransomed throng?

Get ready for that day,

It won’t be very long.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
It won’t be very long till here we cease to roam,

It won’t be very long till all the saints get home;

And then with smiling face we’ll walk the streets of gold,

And sing the Savior’s praise where saints are never old.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
It won’t be very long till burdens we lay down,

It won’t be very long till we’ll receive a crown;

And then we’ll should and sing with angels round the throne,

And when we meet up there, we’ll know as we are known.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
It won’t be very long till earth shall pass away,

It won’t be very long till works of men decay;

But Jesus has prepared a happy dwelling place,

For all who look above and trust His matchless grave.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I am so happy in Christ today,

That I go singing along my way;

Yes, I’m so happy to know and say,

“Jesus included me, too.”

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus included me,

Yes, He included me;

When the Lord said, “Whosoever,”

He included me.

Jesus included me,

Yes, He included me;

When the Lord said, “Whosoever,”

He included me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Gladly I read, “Whosoever may

Come to the fountain of life today;”

But when I read it I always say,

“Jesus included me, too.”

english.title: Verse 3
Verse 4
english.lyrics:
:

“Freely come drink,” words the soul to thrill!

O with what joy they my heart do fill!

For when He said, “Whosoever will,”

Jesus included me, too.

englishTitle: WHAT A DAY THAT WILL BE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There is coming a day

When no heartaches shall come

No more clouds in the sky

No more tears to dim the eye

All is peace forevermore

On that happy golden shore

What a day glorious day that will be

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
What a day that will be

When my Jesus I shall see

When I look upon His face

The One who saved me by His grace

When He takes me by the hand

And leads me thro' the Promised Land

What a day glorious day that will be

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There'll be no sorrow there

No more burdens to bear

No more sickness no pain

No more parting over there

And forever I will be

With the One who died for me

What a day glorious day that will be

number: 925: WHAT A DAY THAT WILL BE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
On Mount Olive’s sacred brow

Jesus spent the night in pray’r,

He's the pattern for us all, all alone,

If we’ll only steal away

In some portion of the day,

We will find it always pays to be alone.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
There are times I’d like to be

All alone with Christ my Lord,

I can tell Him of my troubles all alone.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There are times I’d like to be

With the sanctified and blest,

There are times I like to be all alone,

God can always grace impart,

To my weary, saddened heart,

There are times I'd like to be just all alone.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
There are days to fast and pray

For the pilgrim in his way,

There are days to be with Christ all alone,

We can tell Him all our grief,

He will give us quick relief,

There are times I'd like to be just all alone.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
When a heart is broken up

With the tearful, lonesome cup,

Then’s the time to go to Christ all alone,

In our blessed Lord divine,

There is peace and joy sublime,

When we take our sorrows all to Him alone.

englishTitle: BRETHREN WE HAVE COME TO WORHIP

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Brethren we have met to worship,

And adore the Lord our God;

Will you pray with all your power,

While we try to preach the Word?

All is vain unless the Spirit

Of the Holy One comes down

Brethren, pray, & holy manna

Will be showered all around.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Brethren see poor sinners round you

Slumbering on the brink of woe;

Death is coming, hell is moving,

Can you bear to let them go?

See our fathers and our mothers

And our children sinking down!

Brethren, pray and holy manna

will be showered all around.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Sisters, will you join and help us?

Moses’ sister aided him;

Will you help the trembling mourners

Who are struggling hard with sin?

Tell them all about the Savior

Tell them that He will be found!

Sisters, pray, and holy manna

Will be showered all around.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Let us love our God supremely,

Let us love each other, too;

Let us love and pray for sinners,

‘Till our God makes all things new.

Then He’ll call us home to Heaven

At His table we’ll sit down.

Christ will gird Himself and serve us

With sweet manna all around.

number: 928: BRETHREN WE HAVE COME TO WORHIP

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Right there in the dust, he sat by the gate,

To listen to footsteps and patiently wait.

The blind man just didn't dream that this was the day

That Jesus of Nazareth would pass by his way.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Something good is going to happen to you

Happen to you this very day.

Something good is going to happen to you

Jesus of Nazareth is passing your way.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
She stood by the well, so tired and alone,

Misfortune and heartache was all she had known,

She looked at the stranger, but who would ever think,

'Twas Jesus to offer her living water to drink.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
They were only wee children so happy at play

And told to stay quiet and out of the way;

But then came the Saviour with arms open wide,

They're part of His kingdom, make room by His side.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
My friend if you're listening now humbly to me

Yes this is the moment that you can be free

This very same Jesus is right here today;

Release your faith and touch Him, then believe me when I say

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Don’t you want to go to that happy home on high?

Where the good shall meet, yes meet to part no more.

And shall live and reign far above the starry sky.

In that sunny clime upon the golden shore.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Don’t you want to go? Don’t you want to go?

While we plead and pray, make the start today;

Jesus bids you come to that happy home:

Don’t you want to go? Don’t you want to go?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Think how many prayers have been offered up for you:

Often while you slept, dear mother’s tears did flow.

Turn and seek salvation, O to her love be true.

While your friends are waiting, don’t you want to go?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Time is swiftly passing, and soon will close the gate.

Then your soul must sink in everlasting woe;

Give your heart to Jesus, for soon ’twill be too late.

Mother now is waiting, don’t you want to go?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Could you stand in judgment, if you should die today?

All that you have written you must face, you know.

Jesus now is pleading, He’ll wash your sins away.

To that home in glory, don’t you want to go?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Savior, Thy dying love

Thou gavest me,

Nor should I aught withhold,

Dear Lord, from Thee:

In love my soul would bow,

My heart fulfill its vow,

Some off'ring bring Thee now,

Something for Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
At the blest mercy seat,

Pleading for me,

My feeble faith looks up,

Jesus, to Thee:

Help me the cross to bear,

Thy wondrous love declare,

Some song to raise, or pray'r,

Something for Thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Give me a faithful heart,

Likeness to Thee,

That each departing day

Henceforth may see

Some work of love begun,

Some deed of kindness done,

Some wand'rer sought and won,

Something for Thee.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
All that I am and have,

Thy gifts so free,

In joy, in grief, thro' life,

Dear Lord, for Thee!

And when Thy face I see,

My ransom'd soul shall be,

Thro' all eternity,

Something for Thee.

english.title: Verse 1
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He will protect thee forever,

Wipe every falling tear;

He will forsake thee oh, never,

Sheltered so tenderly there!

Haste, then, the hours are flying,

Spend not the moments in sighing,

Cease from your sorrow and crying,

The Saviour will wipe ev'ry tear,

The Saviour will wipe ev'ry tear.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Oh, 'twill be joy when I see Him!

See Him and hear Him say, come!

Oh, 'twill be joy when I hear Him,

Saying, my child, welcome home!

Now thou art free from thy sorrow,

There thou shalt ne'er trouble borrow,

Night never comes nor tomorrow,

With Jesus forever to dwell,

With Jesus forever to dwell.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
My trials here on earth will cease

Some day, some day

And I will have unending peace

Some day, some day

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Some day, some happy day

From sin, set free

I'll live....with Christ for aye

Some day, some day

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
No more in darkness...I will roam

Some day, some day

But rest eternally at home

Some day, some day

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Those gone before me I shall meet

Some day, some day

My loved ones will my spirit greet

Some day, some day

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
My loving Savior I shall see

Some day, some day

With Him in glory I shall be

Some day, some day

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Hush, Hush. Somebody’s callin' mah name.

Hush. Hush. Somebody’s callin' mah name,

Hush. Hush. Somebody’s callin' mah name,

Oh mah Lawd, Oh mah Lawd, what shall I do?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I'm so glad. Trouble don't last always.

I'm so glad. Trouble don't last always,

yea, yea, yea. I'm so glad.

Trouble don't last always.

Oh mah Lawd, Oh mah LawD, what shall I do?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Sounds like Jesus. Somebody’s callin' mah name,

Sounds like Jesus. Somebody’s callin' mah name,

yea, yea, yea. I'm so glad.

Somebody’s callin' my name.

Oh mah Lawd, Oh mah Lawd, what shall I do?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Soon one mornin', death'll come creepin' in mah room,

Soon one mornin', death'll come creepin' in mah room,

yea, yea, yea. I'm so glad.

Death'll come creepin' in mah room.

Oh mah Lawd, Oh mah Lawd, what shall I do?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I'm so glad. Ah got mah religion in time,

I'm so glad. Ah got mah religion in time,

yea, yea, yea. I'm so glad.

Got mah religion in time.

Oh mah Lawd, Oh mah Lawd, what shall I do?

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
I’m so glad. I'm on mah journey home,

I’m so glad. I'm on mah journey home,

yea, yea, yea. I'm so glad.

I'm on mah journey home.

Oh mah Lawd, Oh mah Lawd, what shall I do?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
At the feast of Belshazzar, and a thousand of his lords,

While they drank from golden vessels, as the Book of Truth records;

In the night as they revel in the royal palace hall,

They were seized with consternation,- 'twas the hand upon the wall.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
'Tis the hand of God on the wall, (on the wall,)

'Tis the hand of God on the wall; (on the wall;)

Shall the record be, "Found wanting," or shall it be, "Found trusting!"

While that hand is writing on the wall? (writing on the wall.)

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
See the brave captive Daniel, as he stood before the throng,

And rebuked the haughty monarch for his mighty deeds of wrong;

As he read out the writing, 'twas the doom of one and all,

For the kingdom now was finished,- said the hand upon the wall.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
See the faith, zeal and courage that would dare to do the right,

Which the Spirit gave to Daniel, this the secret of his might;

In his home in Judea, or a captive in the hall-

He understood the writing of his God upon the wall.

english.title: Verse 4
Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There were twelve disciples Jesus called to help Him,

Simon Peter, Andrew, James, his brother John;

Philip, Thomas, Matthew, James the son of Alphaeus,

Simon, Thaddaeus, Judas, and Bartholomew.

english.title: Chorus
Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I’m in the way, the bright and shining way,

I’m in the glory-land way;

Telling the world that Jesus saves today,

Yes, I’m in the glory-land way.

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
List to the call, the gospel call today,

Get in the glory-land way;

Wand’rers, come home, oh, hasten to obey,

And get in the glory-land way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Onward I go, rejoicing in His love

I’m in the glory-land way;

Soon I shall see Him in that home above,

Oh, I’m in the glory-land way.

englishTitle: JESUS IS THE SWEETEST NAME I KNOW

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There have been names that I have loved to hear,

But never has there been a name so dear

To this heart of mine, as the name divine,

The precious, precious name of Jesus.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus is the sweetest name I know,

And He’s just the same as His lovely name,

And that’s the reason why I love Him so;

Oh, Jesus is the sweetest name I know.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There is no name in earth or heav’n above,

That we should give such honor and such love

As the blessed name, let us all acclaim,

That wondrous, glorious name of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
And some day I shall see Him face to face

To thank and praise Him for His wondrous grace,

Which He gave to me, when He made me free,

The blessed Son of God called Jesus.

number: 940: JESUS IS THE SWEETEST NAME I KNOW

englishTitle: BREAK THOU THE BREAD OF LIFE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Break now the bread of life, dear Lord, to me,

as once you broke the loaves beside the sea.

Beyond the sacred page I seek you, Lord;

my spirit waits for you, O living Word.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Bless your own word of truth, dear Lord, to me,

as when you blessed the bread by Galilee.

Then shall all bondage cease, all fetters fall;

and I shall find my peace, my All in all!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
You are the bread of life, dear Lord, to me,

your holy word the truth that rescues me.

Give me to eat and live with you above;

teach me to love your truth, for you are love.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
O send your Spirit now, dear Lord, to me,

that he may touch my eyes and make me see.

Show me the truth made plain within your Word,

for in your book revealed I see you, Lord.

number: 945: BREAK THOU THE BREAD OF LIFE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Once more, my soul, thy Saviour, thro’ the Word,

Is offered full and free;

And now, O Lord, I must, I must decide:

Shall I accept of Thee?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I will! I Will! I will!

God helping me, I will,

O Lord, be Thine!

Thy precious blood was shed to purchase me—

I will be wholly Thine!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
By grace I will Thy mercy now receive,

Thy love my heart hath won:

On Thee, O Christ, I will, I will believe,

And trust in Thee alone!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Thou knowest, Lord, how very weak I am,

And how I fear to stray;

For strength to serve I look to Thee alone—

The strength Thou must supply.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
And now, O Lord, give all with us to-day

The grace to join our song;

And from the heart to gladly with us say:

“I will to Christ belong!”

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
To all who came, when Thou wast here below

And said, “O Lord, wilt Thou?”

To them, “I will!” was ever Thy reply:

We rest upon it now.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Have you failed in your plan of your storm-tossed life?

Place you hand in the nail-scarred hand;

Are you weary and worn from its toil and strife?

Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand,

Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand;

He will keep to the end, He's your dearest friend,

Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Are you walking alone through the shadows dim?

Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand;

Christ will comfort your heart, put your trust in Him,

Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Would you follow the will of the risen Lord?

Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand;

Would you live in the light of His blessed Word?

Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Is your soul burdened down with its load of sin?

Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand;

Throw your heart open wide, let the Savior in,

Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand.

englishTitle: JUST A LITTLE HELP FROM YOU

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Do you ever stop, my friend, to think,

The while this world you’re passing thro’

Someone may be saved from ruin’s brink,

By just a little help from you?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Just a little help from you,

Just a little help from you;

Wondrous things the Lord may do,

By just a little help from you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Just a little deed of kindness now,

It may the faith of one restore,

Who beneath some load of grief doth bow,

Is almost ready to give o’er.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Just a little word of Jesus’ love,

Some precious soul may help decide

To forsake the wrong and look above,

And let the Lord his footsteps guide.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Let us do our part, ere day is done,

And to our calling faithful be;

For the world to Christ must now be won,

By help of you, by help of me.

number: 948: JUST A LITTLE HELP FROM YOU

englishTitle: AWAKE MY SOUL, TO JOYFUL LAYS

english.title: Verse 1
Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When I was Sa­tan’s ea­sy prey,

And deep and debt and bond­age lay,

He paid His life for my dis­charge;

His lov­ing-kind­ness is so large.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Thro’ migh­ty hosts of cru­el foes,

Where earth and hell my way op­pose,

He safe­ly leads my soul along;

His lov­ing-kind­ness is so strong!

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
When earth­ly friends for­sake me quite,

And I have nei­ther skill nor might,

He’s sure my help­er to ap­pear;

His lov­ing-kind­ness is so near.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics:
Often I feel my sin­ful heart

Prone from my Je­sus to de­part;

And tho’ I have Him oft for­got,

His lov­ing-kind­ness chang­es not!

english.title: Verse 7
english.lyrics:
So, when I pass death’s gloomy vale,

And life and mor­tal pow’rs shall fail,

Oh may last ex­pir­ing breath

His lov­ing-kind­ness sing in death

english.title: Verse 8
english.lyrics:
Then I shall mount and soar away

To the bright world of end­less day;

Then shall I sing with sweet sur­prise

His lov­ing-kind­ness in the skies.

english.title: Verse 9
english.lyrics:
There with their gold­en harps I’ll join,

And with their an­thems min­gle mine,

And loud­ly sound on ev­ery chord

The lov­ing-kind­ness of the Lord.

number: 949: AWAKE MY SOUL, TO JOYFUL LAYS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Walk in the light! so shalt thou know

That fellowship of love

His Spirit only can bestow,

Who reigns in light above.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Walk in the light! and thou shalt find

Thy heart made truly His,

Who dwells in cloudless light enshrined,

In whom no darkness is.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Walk in the light! and thou shalt own

Thy darkness passed away,

Because that light hath on thee shone,

In which is perfect day.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Walk in the light! and thine shall be

A path, though thorny, bright:

For God, by grace, shall dwell in thee,

And God Himself is light.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Hark! the herald angels sing,

"Glory to the newborn King:

peace on earth, and mercy mild,

God and sinners reconciled!"

Joyful, all ye nations, rise,

join the triumph of the skies;

with th'angelic hosts proclaim,

"Christ is born in Bethlehem!"

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Hark! the herald angels sing,

"Glory to the newborn King"

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Christ, by highest heaven adored,

Christ, the everlasting Lord,

late in time behold him come,

offspring of the Virgin's womb:

veiled in flesh the Godhead see;

hail th'incarnate Deity,

pleased with us in flesh to dwell,

Jesus, our Immanuel.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Hail the heaven-born Prince of Peace!

Hail the Sun of Righteousness!

Light and life to all he brings,

risen with healing in his wings.

Mild he lays his glory by,

born that we no more may die,

born to raise us from the earth,

born to give us second birth.

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
Holy, holy, holy is the Lord,

Let the hills be joyful before Him.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
Verse 1
english.lyrics:
In thy name, O blessed Saviour,

Gathered in this sacred place;

Here we seek a Father’s blessing,

Plead and pray for needed grace;

From the ocean of thy fulness,

Boundless, fathomless and free,

Let a tidal wave come sweeping,

Setting hearts at liberty.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Lift the flood-gates, lift the flood-gates,

Let the tide come sweeping in;

Blessed tide of full salvation,

Washing, cleansing from all sin.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Lift the flood-gates, let salvation

In tremendous currents flow,

To the uttermost fulfilling

Thy blest mission here below;

Until myriads of sinners,

Borne on love’s resistless tide,

Shall be swept into the kingdom,

And believers sanctified.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
It is coming, we believe it,

Thou dost hear and answer pray’r;

It is coming, we shall see it,

Thine almighty arm made bare;

Tides of power, tides of glory,

Holy tides of perfect love,

Satisfying, overflowing,

Coming on us from above.

englishTitle: LAY SOME SOUL UPON MY HEART

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Lord, lay some soul upon my heart,

And love that soul through me;

And may I bravely do my part

To win that soul for Thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Some soul for Thee, some soul for Thee,

This is my earnest plea;

Help me each day, on life’s highway,

To win some soul for Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Lord, lead me to some soul in sin,

And grant that I may be

Endued with power and love to win

That soul, dear Lord, for Thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
To win that soul for Thee, my Lord,

Will be my constant prayer;

That when I’ve won Thy full reward

I’ll with that dear one share.

number: 957: LAY SOME SOUL UPON MY HEART

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There's a land that is fairer than day,

And by faith we can see it afar,

For the Father waits over the way

To prepare us a dwelling place there.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
In the sweet by and by,

We shall meet on that beautiful shore;

In the sweet by and by,

We shall meet on that beautiful shore.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
We shall sing on that beautiful shore

The melodious songs of the blest;

And our spirits shall sorrow no more-

Not a sigh for the blessing of rest.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
To our bountiful Father above

We will offer our tribute of praise

For the glorious gift of His love

And the blessings that hallow our days.

englishTitle: WHO AT MY DOOR IS STANDING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Who at my door is standing,

Patiently drawing near,

Entrance within demanding?

Whose is the voice I hear?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Sweetly the tones are falling;

“Open the door for me!

If thou wilt heed My calling,

I will abide with thee.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Lonely without He’s staying:

Lonely within am I;

While I am still delaying,

Will He not pass me by?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
All through the dark hours dreary,

Knocking again is He;

Jesus, art Thou not weary,

Waiting so long for me?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Door of my heart, I hasten!

Thee will I open wide.

Though He rebuke and chasten,

He shall with me abide.

number: 960: WHO AT MY DOOR IS STANDING

englishTitle: IN THE SHADOW OF HIS WINGS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
In the shadow of His wings

There is rest, sweet rest;

There is rest from care and labor,

There is rest for friend and neighbor;

In the shadow of His wings

There is rest, sweet rest,

In the shadow of His wings

There is rest (sweet rest).

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
There is rest, (sweet rest,)

There is peace, (sweet peace,)

There is joy, (glad joy,)

In the shadow of His wings:

There is rest, (sweet rest,)

There is peace, (sweet peace,)

There is joy, (glad joy,)

In the shadow of His wings.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
In the shadow of His wings

There is peace, sweet peace,

Peace that passeth understanding,

Peace, sweet peace that knows no ending;

In the shadow of His wings

There is peace, sweet peace,

In the shadow of His wings

There is peace (sweet peace).

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
In the shadow of His wings

There is joy, glad joy,

There is joy to tell the story,

Joy exceeding, full of glory;

In the shadow of His wings

There is joy, glad joy,

In the shadow of His wings

There is joy (glad joy).

number: 961: IN THE SHADOW OF HIS WINGS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Sinners Jesus will receive:

Sound this word of grace to all

Who the heav'nly pathway leave,

All who linger, all who fall.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Sing it o'er (Sing it o'er again)

and o'er again (Sing it o'er again:)

Christ receiveth (Christ receiveth sinful men)

sinful men. (Christ receiveth sinful men)

Make the message (Make the message clear and plain)

clear and plain (Make the message clear and plain)

Christ receiveth sinful men.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Now my heart condemns me not,

Pure before the law I stand;

He who cleansed me from all spot

Satisfied its last demand.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Christ receiveth sinful men,

Even me with all my sin;

Purged from ev’ry spot and stain,

Heav’n with Him I enter in.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
From over hill and plain

There comes the signal strain -

’Tis loyalty, loyalty, loyalty to Christ;

Its music rolls along,

The hills take up the song,

Of loyalty, loyalty, yes, loyalty to Christ.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
“On to victory! On to victory!”

Cries our great Commander, “On!”

We’ll move at His command -

We’ll soon possess the land,

Thru loyalty, loyalty, yes, loyalty to Christ!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
O hear, ye brave, the sound

That moves the earth around -

’Tis loyalty, loyalty, loyalty to Christ;

Arise to dare and do,

Ring out the watchword true,

Of loyalty, loyalty, yes, loyalty to Christ.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Come, join our loyal throng -

We’ll rout the giant wrong -

’Tis loyalty, loyalty, loyalty to Christ;

Where Satan’s banners float

We’ll send the bugle note,

Of loyalty, loyalty, yes, loyalty to Christ.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
The strength of youth we lay

At Jesus’ feet today -

’Tis loyalty, loyalty, loyalty to Christ;

His gospel we’ll proclaim

Thruout the world’s domain,

Of loyalty, loyalty, yes, loyalty to Christ.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
A ruler once came to Jesus by night

To ask Him the way of salvation and light;

The Master made answer in words true and plain,

"Ye must be born again.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Ye must be born again,

Ye must be born again;

I verily, verily say unto thee,

Ye must be born again.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Ye children of men, attend to the word

So solemnly uttered by Jesus the Lord;

And let not this message to you be in vain,

"Ye must be born again.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
O ye who would enter that glorious rest,

And sing with the ransomed the song of the blest,

The life everlasting if ye would obtain,

"Ye must be born again.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
A dear one in heaven thy heart yearns to see,

At the beautiful gate may be watching for thee,

Then list to the note of this solemn

"Ye must be born again.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
He sendeth the sunshine and rain,

He scattereth dew on the flowers;

He maketh the desert to bloom—

His blessings descend as the showers.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Bountiful, Merciful,

Wonderful love!

Bountiful, Merciful,

Wonderful love!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He causeth the rivers to flow,

The fields now with verdure are clad;

He tempers the wind to His lambs,

The earth with His fullness is glad.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
For bounty so royal and free,

For mercies unending and new,

Oh, help us to praise Thee, dear Lord,

And serve Thee in all that we do.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Hark, the voice of Jesus crying,

"Who will go and work today?

Fields are white, and harvests waiting,

who will bear the sheaves away?"

Long and loud the Master calls us,

rich reward He offers free;

who will answer, gladly saying,

"Here am I, send me, send me"?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
If you cannot cross the ocean,

And the distant lands explore,

You can find the lost around you,

You can help them at your door;

If you cannot give your thousands,

You can give the widow's mite;

What you truly give for Jesus

Will be precious in His sight.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
If you cannot be the watchman

Standing high on Zion's wall,

Pointing out the path to heaven,

Off'ring life and peace to all,

With your prayers and with your bounties

You can do what heav'n demands;

You can be like faithful Aaron,

Holding up the prophet's hands.

english.title: Verse 4
Verse 1
english.lyrics:
From Jerusalem to Jericho, along that lonely road

A certain man was set upon and robbed of all his gold

They beat him and they stripped him, and they left him there for dead

Who was it then that come along and bathed the aching head?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Then who (then who), tell me who (tell me who)

Tell me who was this neighbor kind and true?

From Jerusalem to Jericho we're traveling every day

And many are the fallen ones that lie along the way

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
From Jerusalem to Jericho, a certain priest come by

He heard the poor man crying, but he heeded not the cry

He gathered his robes about him and he quickly passed away

Who was it then that come along and ministered that day?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
From Jerusalem to Jericho, a Levite came along

He heard the poor man crying, that lie upon the ground

He lifted his hands up to the heavens and he quickly passed him by

Who was it then that came along and heeded that needy cry?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There is rest, sweet rest, at the Master's feet.

There is favor now at the mercy seat,

For atoning blood has been sprinkled there.

There is always a blessing, a blessing in prayer.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
There's a blessing in prayer, in believing prayer,

When our Saviour's name to the throne we bear.

Then a Father's love will receive us there;

There is always a blessing, a blessing in prayer.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There is grace to help in our time of need,

For our Friend above is a Friend indeed.

We may cast on Him ev'ry grief and care.

There is always a blessing, a blessing in prayer.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When our songs are glad with the joy of life,

When our hearts are sad with its ills and strife,

When the pow'rs of sin would the soul ensnare,

There is always a blessing, a blessing in prayer.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
There is perfect peace tho' the wild waves roll;

There are gifts of love for the seeking soul,

Till we praise the Lord in His home so fair.

There is always a blessing, a blessing in prayer.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Hark! a voice is calling:

“Who will go today?

Who my service seeking,

Will not say me nay?

Who will hold my banner

Forward in the fight,

‘Gainst My foes engaging,

Stand for God and right?”

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus leads His army,

‘Neath His flag unfurled

All our foes defeating,

Right shall sweep the world!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
On God’s might relying

Till the vict’ry’s won,

Satan’s host defying,

Gird our armor on;

For the cause that’s holy,

For the right that’s grand,

For God’s warfare solely,

Join we heart and hand!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Hear the tramp of legions,

Marching as they sing,

“Glory to our Leader,

Glory to our King;”

One in holy purpose,

From the near and far,

Hear the voices ringing,

Marching to the war!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
We've a story to tell to the nations,

That shall turn their hearts to the right,

A story of truth and mercy,

A story of peace and light,

A story of peace and light.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
For the darkness shall turn to dawning,

And the dawning to noonday bright,

And Christ's great kingdom shall come on earth,

The kingdom of love and light.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
We've a song to be sung to the nations,

That shall lift their hearts to the Lord,

A song that shall conquer evil,

And shatter the spear and sword,

And shatter the spear and sword

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
We've a message to give to the nations,

That the Lord who reigneth above

Has sent us His Son to save us,

And show us that God is love,

And show us that God is love.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
We've a Savior to show to the nations,

Who the path of sorrow has trod,

That all of the world's great peoples

May come to the truth of God,

May come to the truth of God!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The Master has come, and He calls us to follow

the track of the footprints He leaves on our way;

far over the mountain and through the deep hollow,

the path leads us on to the mansions of day:

the Master has called us, the children who fear Him,

who march 'neath Christ's banner, His own little band;

we love Him and seek Him, we long to be near Him,

and rest in the light of His beautiful land.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The Master has called us, in life's early morning,

with spirits as fresh as the dew on the sod:

we turn from the world, with its smiles and its scorning,

to cast in our lot with the people of God:

the Master has called us, His sons and His daughters,

We plead for His blessing and trust in His love;

and thru the green pastures, beside the still waters,

He'll lead us at last to His kingdom above.

englishTitle: WHEN WE REACH THE GLORY LAND

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
What a wonderful Savior is Jesus,

Who suffered with nail-pierced hand;

O yes, ’twill be heaven to see Him,

When we reach the glory land.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
When we reach the glory land,

When we reach the glory land,

We’ll walk and we’ll talk with the Savior

When we reach the glory land.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
O the Savior is calling the sinner,

To join with that glorious band

Of saved who will praise Him forever,

When we reach the glory land.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
In the glorious, wonderful city,

Where Jesus shall have command,

We’ll dwell with the Savior forever,

When we reach the glory land.

number: 975: WHEN WE REACH THE GLORY LAND

englishTitle: BRETHREN WE HAVE MET TO WORSHIP

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Brethren, we have met to worship

And adore the Lord our God;

Will you pray with all your power,

While we try to preach the Word?

All is vain unless the Spirit

Of the Holy One comes down;

Brethren, pray, and holy manna

Will be showered all around.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Brethren, see poor sinners round you

Slumb'ring on the brink of woe;

Death is coming, hell is moving,

Can you bear to let them go?

See our fathers and our mothers,

And our children sinking down;

Brethren, pray and holy manna

Will be showered all around.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Sisters, will you join and help us?

Moses' sister aided him;

Will you help the trembling mourners

Who are struggling hard with sin?

Tell them all about the Savior,

Tell them that He will be found;

Sisters, pray, and holy manna

Will be showered all around.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Let us love our God supremely,

Let us love each other, too;

Let us love and pray for sinners,

Till our God makes all things new.

Then He'll call us home to heaven,

At His table we'll sit down;

Christ will gird Himself, and serve us

With sweet manna all around.

number: 977: BRETHREN WE HAVE MET TO WORSHIP

englishTitle: MY HOPE IS IN THE LORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
My Hope is in the Lord, who gave Himself for me

And paid the price of all my sin at Calvary

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
For me He died; For me He lives,

And everlasting life and light He freely gives.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
No merit of my own His anger to suppress,

My only hope is found in Jesus' righteousness

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
And now for me He stands Before the Father's throne;

He shows His wounded hands and names me as His own.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
His grace has planned it all, 'Tis mine but to believe

And recognize His work of love and Christ receive.

number: 981: MY HOPE IS IN THE LORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I remember when my burdens rolled away;

I had carried them for years, night and day.

When I sought the blessed Lord,

And I took Him at His word,

Then at once all my burdens rolled away.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Rolled away, rolled away,

I am happy since my burdens rolled away.

Rolled away, rolled away,

I am happy since my burdens rolled away.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I remember when my burdens rolled away,

That had hindered me for years, night and day.

As I sought the throne of grace,

Just a glimpse of Jesus’ face,

And I knew that my burdens could not stay.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I am singing since my burdens rolled away;

There’s a song within my heart night and day.

I am living for my King,

And with joy I shout and sing:

“Hallelujah, all my burdens rolled away!”

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The love that Jesus had for me,

To suffer on the cruel tree,

That I a ransomed soul might be,

Is more than tongue can tell.

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
The many sorrows that He bore,

And oh, that crown of thorns He wore,

That I might live forevermore,

Is more than tongue can tell.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The peace I have in Him, my Lord,

Who pleads before the throne of God,

The merit of His precious blood,

Is more than tongue can tell.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
The joy that comes when He is near,

The rest He gives, so free from fear,

The hope in Him so bright and clear,

Is more than tongue can tell.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Some day I’ll cross the mystic stream,

It won’t be long, it may be soon;

Some day I’ll lay my burdens down,

It won’t be long, it may be soon;

Some day I’ll reach the golden shore,

And dwell with Jesus evermore,

I’ll meet the ones who’ve gone before,

It won’t be long, it may be soon.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
There’ll be no sorrow there/2x

In heav’n above, where all is love.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Then as you travel on life’s way,

Thro’ waters deep, or billows’ foam;

You may have Jesus as your stay,

He’ll walk with you and lead you home.

O brother, will you let Him in?

He’ll save and keep you free from sin,

Till heaven’s door you enter in;

It won’t be long, it may be soon.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Seal us, O Holy Spirit,

Grant us Thine impress, we pray;

We would be more like the Saviour,

Stamped with His image today.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
:

Seal us, seal us,

Seal us just now, we pray;

Seal us, O Holy Spirit,

Seal us for service today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Seal us, O Holy Spirit,

Help us Thy likeness to show;

Then from our lives unto others

Streams of rich blessing shall flow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Seal us, O Holy Spirit,

Make us Thine own from this hour;

May we be useful, dear Master,

Seal us with witnessing power.

englishTitle: GLORIOUS IS THY NAME O LORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Blessed Saviour, we adore thee;

we thy love and grace proclaim.

Thou art mighty; thou are holy.

Glorious is thy matchless name!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Glorious, is thy name, O Lord!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Great Redeemer, Lord and Master,

light of all eternal days,

let the saints of every nation

sing thy just and endless praise!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
From the throne of heaven's glory

to the cross of sin and shame,

thou didst come to die a ransom,

guilty sinners to reclaim!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Come, O come, immortal Saviour,

come and take thy royal throne.

Come, and reign, and reign forever;

be the kingdom all thine own!
