number: 988: GLORIOUS IS THY NAME O LORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The cross upon which Jesus died

Is a shelter in which we can hide

And its grace so free is sufficient for me

And deep is its fountain as wide as the sea

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
There's room at the cross for you

There's room at the cross for you

Tho' millions have come

There's still room for one

Yes there's room at the cross for you

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Tho' millions have found Him a friend

And have turned from the sins they have sinned

The Savior still waits to open the gates

And welcome a sinner before it's too late

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The hand of my Savior is strong

And the love of my Savior is long

Through sunshine or rain through loss or in gain

The blood flows from Calv'ry to cleanse ev'ry stain

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus may come today,

Glad day! Glad day!

And I would see my Friend;

Dangers and troubles would end

If Jesus should come today.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Glad day! Glad day!

Is it the crowning day?

I'll live for today, nor anxious be,

Jesus my Lord I soon shall see;

Glad day! Glad day!

Is it the crowning day?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I may go home today,

Glad day! Glad day!

Seemeth I hear their song;

Hail to the radiant throng!

If I should go home today.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Why should I anxious be?

Glad day! Glad day!

Lights appear on the shore,

Storms will affright nevermore,

For He is "at hand" today.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Faithful I'll be today,

Glad day! Glad day!

And I will freely tell

Why I should love Him so well,

For He is my all today.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I cannot tell why he, whom angels worship,

should set his love upon the sons of men,

or why, as Shepherd, he should seek the wanderers,

to bring them back, they know not how or when.

But this I know, that he was born of Mary

when Bethl'em's manger was his only home,

and that he lived at Nazareth and laboured,

and so the Saviour, Saviour of the world, is come

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I cannot tell how silently he suffered,

as with his peace he graced this place of tears,

or how his heart upon the cross was broken,

the crown of pain to three and thirty years.

But this I know, he heals the broken-hearted

and stays our sin and calms our lurking fear

and lifts the burden from the heavy laden;

for still the Saviour, Saviour of the world is here.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I cannot tell how he will win the nations,

how he will claim his earthly heritage,

how satisfy the needs and aspirations

of east and west, of sinner and of sage.

But this I know, all flesh shall see his glory,

and he shall reap the harvest he has sown,

and some glad day his sun will shine in splendour

when he the Saviour, Saviour of the world, is known

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I cannot tell how all the lands shall worship,

when at his bidding every storm is stilled,

or who can say how great the jubilation

when every heart with love and joy is filled.

But this I know, the skies will thrill with rapture,

and myriad myriad human voices sing,

and earth to heav'n, and heav'n to earth, will answer,

'at last the Saviour, Saviour of the world, is King!'

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
My God my Father, while I stray

Far from my home, on life’s rough way,

O teach me from my heart to say,

“Thy will be done!”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Tho' dark my path, and sad my lot,

Let me be still and murmur not,

Or breathe the prayer divinely taught,

“Thy will be done!”

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Let but my fainting heart be blest

With Thy sweet Spirit for its Guest,

My God, to Thee I leave the rest;

“Thy will be done!”

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Renew my will from day to day;

Blend it with Thine, and take away

All that now makes it hard to say,

“Thy will be done!” AMEN.

englishTitle: I AM ON THE BATTLEFIELD FOR MY LORD

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I am on the battlefield for my Lord,

I'm on the battlefield for my Lord;

And I promised Him that I would serve Him till I die.

I am on the battlefield for my Lord.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I was alone and idle,

I was a sinner too,

I heard a voice from heaven

Say there is work to do,

I took the Master's hand,

And I joined the Christian band,

I'm on the battlefield for my Lord.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I left my friends and kindred

Bound for the Promised Land,

The grace of God upon me,

The Bible in my hand,

In distant lands I trod,

Crying, sinner, come to God,

I'm on the battlefield for my Lord.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Now when I met my Savior,

I met Him with a smile,

He healed my wounded spirit,

And owned me as His child,

Around the throne of grace,

He appoints my soul a place,

I'm on the battlefield for my Lord

number: 995: I AM ON THE BATTLEFIELD FOR MY LORD

englishTitle: WHEN THE SAINTS GO MARCHING IN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I am just a lonesome trav’ler,

Through this big, wide world of sin;

Want to join that grand procession,

When the saints go marching in.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh, when the saints go marching in,

Oh, when the saints go marching in;

Lord, I want to be in that number,

When the saints go marching in.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All my folks have gone before me,

All my friends and all my kin;

But I’ll meet with them up yonder,

When the saints go marching in.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Come and join me in my journey,

’Cause it’s time that we begin;

And we’ll be there for that judgment,

When the saints go marching in.

number: 997: WHEN THE SAINTS GO MARCHING IN

englishTitle: I WANT TO LOVE HIM MORE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
With Jesus I would ever be,

His matchless name adore;

He’s done so very much for me,

I want to love Him more.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I want to love Him more,

I want to love Him more,

I want to love Him more,

I do, I do, I do;

I want to love Him more,

I want to love Him more,

He’s done so much for me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He died upon the cruel tree,

Our load of guilt He bore;

He suffered shame for you and me,

I want to love Him more.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
His children He will not forsake,

When troubles press them sore;

But in their souls sweet peace awakes,

I want to love Him more.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
O Prince of life, sweet Prince of peace,

Who dwelt on earth below.

My faith in Him will never cease,

I want to love Him more.

number: 998: I WANT TO LOVE HIM MORE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Hallelujah/10x

for the LORD God omnipotent reigneth

Hallelujah /4x					3x

The Kingdom of our Lord

The kingdom of our God and of His Christ

And He shall reign for ever and ever

King of Kings

Hallelujah /2x

Lord ….. forever and ever

Hallelujah /2x

And Lord … forever and ever

Hallelujah /2x

King of Kings…. Forever and ever

King of kings…… King of kings

And He shall reign for ever and ever

Forever and ever2x

Hallelujah /4x

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus is tenderly calling thee home-

Calling today, calling today;

Why from the sunshine of love wilt thou roam

Farther and farther away?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
:

Calling today,

Calling today,

Jesus is calling,

Is tenderly calling today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Jesus is calling the weary to rest-

Calling today, calling today;

Bring Him thy burden and thou shalt be blest-

He will not turn thee away.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Jesus is waiting; O come to Him now-

Waiting today, waiting today;

Come with thy sins, at His feet lowly bow-

Come, and no longer delay.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Jesus is pleading; O list to His voice-

Hear Him today, hear Him today;

They who believe on His name shall rejoice-

Quickly arise and away.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty!

Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee;

Holy, holy, holy! merciful and mighty!

God in three Persons, blessed Trinity!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Holy, holy, holy! all the saints adore Thee,

casting down their golden crowns around the glassy sea;

cherubim and seraphim, falling down before Thee,

which wert and art and evermore shalt be.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Holy, holy, holy! though the darkness hide Thee,

though the eye of sinful man Thy glory may not see;

only Thou art holy, there is none beside Thee,

perfect in pow'r, in love, and purity.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty!

All Thy works shall praise Thy name, in earth and sky and sea;

Holy, holy, holy! merciful and mighty!

God in three Persons, blessed Trinity!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Our father and our God

Accept our songs of praise

On earth and heaven above

The God who reigns in love

To thee is due all praise and thanks

And majesty forever more

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Eternal son of God

Who shed His blood for us

Who rose up from the dead

And up to heaven ascend

To thee is due all praise and thanks

And majesty for ever more

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
To thee the Holy Ghost

We raise our songs of praise

Thou who hast shed the light

Of life into our hearts

To thee is due all praise and thanks

And majesty for ever more

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Our Holy Triune God

We praise thee three in one

On earth and even above

We raise our songs of praise

To thee is due all praise and thanks

And majesty for ever more

englishTitle: LET US WITH A GLADSOME MIND

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Let us, with a gladsome mind,

Praise the Lord for he is kind:

For his mercies shall endure,

Ever faithful, ever sure.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Let us sound his name abroad,

For of gods he is the God:

For his mercies shall endure,

Ever faithful, ever sure.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
He with all-commanding might

Filled the new-made world with light:

For his mercies shall endure,

Ever faithful, ever sure.

english.title: Verse 4
Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Let us then, with glad-some mind,

Praise the Lord for he is kind:

For his mercies shall endure,

Ever faithful, ever sure.

number: 1005: LET US WITH A GLADSOME MIND

englishTitle: NOW THANK WE ALL OUR GOD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Now thank we all our God

with heart and hands and voices,

who wondrous things has done,

in whom his world rejoices;

who from our mothers' arms

has blessed us on our way

with countless gifts of love,

and still is ours today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
O may this bounteous God

through all our life be near us,

with ever joyful hearts

and blessed peace to cheer us,

to keep us in his grace,

and guide us when perplexed,

and free us from all ills

of this world in the next.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
All praise and thanks to God

the Father now be given,

the Son and Spirit blest,

who reign in highest heaven

the one eternal God,

whom heaven and earth adore;

for thus it was, is now,

and shall be evermore.

number: 1006: NOW THANK WE ALL OUR GOD

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
O, the children of the Lord have a right to shout and sing,

For the way is growing bright, and our souls are on the wing;

We are going by and by to the palace of a King!

Glory to God, hallelujah!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
We are lost amid the rapture of redeeming love

Glory to God, hallelujah!

We are rising on its pinions to the hills above:

Glory to God, hallelujah!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
We are going to a palace that is built of gold;

Glory to God, hallelujah!

Where the King in all His splendor we shall soon behold

Glory to God, hallelujah!

english.title: Verse 4
Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Praise him, praise him! Jesus, our blessed redeemer!

Sing, O earth, his wonderful love proclaim!

Hail him, hail him! Highest archangels in glory!

Strength and honor give to his holy name!

Like a shepherd, Jesus will guard his children.

In his arms he carries them all day long.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Praise him! Praise him! tell of his excellent greatness.

Praise him! Praise him! ever in  joyful song.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Praise him, praise him! Jesus, our blessed redeemer!

For our sins, he suffered, and bled, and died.

He our rock, our hope of eternal salvation,

hail him, hail him! Jesus, the crucified.

Sound his praises, Jesus who bore our sorrows,

love unbounded, wonderful, deep, and strong.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Praise him, praise him! Jesus, our blessed redeemer!

Heav’nly portals loud with hosannas ring!

Jesus, Savior, reigneth forever and ever!

Crown him, crown him! prophet, and priest, and king!

Christ is coming, over the world victorious.

Pow’r and glory unto the Lord belong.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Praise the king of Glory, He is God alone,

Praise Him for the wonders He to us hath shown;

For His promised presence, All the pilgrim way,

For the flaming pillar, And the cloud by day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Praise... Him, shining angels,

Strike ... your harps of gold,

All ... His hosts adore Him,

Who ... His face behold;

Through ... His great dominion,

While ... the ages roll,

All His works shall praise Him (3ce)

Bless the Lord, my soul!

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Praise Him for the trials, Sent as chords of love,

Binding us more closely, To the things above;

For the faith that conquers, Hope, that naught can dim,

For the land where loved ones, Gather unto Him.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
To God be the glory, great things He hath done,

So loved He the world that He gave us His Son,

Who yielded His life our redemption to win,

And opened the life-gate that all may go in.

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Oh, perfect redemption, the purchase of blood,

To every believer the promise of God;

The vilest offender who truly believes,

That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Great things He hath taught us, great things He hath done,

And great our rejoicing through Jesus the Son;

But purer, and higher, and greater will be

Our wonder, our transport when Jesus we see.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Joy to the world, the Lord is come!

Let earth receive her King!

Let every heart prepare Him room,

and heav'n and nature sing,

and heav'n and nature sing,

and heav'n, and heav'n and nature sing.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Joy to the earth, the Savior reigns!

Let men their songs employ,

while fields and floods, rocks, hills, and plains

repeat the sounding joy,

repeat the sounding joy,

repeat, repeat the sounding joy.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
No more let sins and sorrows grow,

nor thorns infest the ground;

He comes to make His blessings flow

far as the curse is found,

far as the curse is found,

far as, far as the curse is found.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
He rules the world with truth and grace,

and makes the nations prove

the glories of His righteousness

and wonders of His love,

and wonders of His love,

and wonders, wonders of His love.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O come, all ye faithful, joyful and triumphant,

O come ye, O come ye to Bethlehem!

Come, and behold Him, born the King of angels!

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
Verse 3
Verse 4
Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Abide with me: fast falls the eventide;

the darkness deepens; Lord, with me abide.

When other helpers fail and comforts flee,

Help of the helpless, O abide with me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Swift to its close ebbs out life's little day;

earth's joys grow dim, its glories pass away.

Change and decay in all around I see.

O thou who changest not, abide with me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I need thy presence every passing hour.

What but thy grace can foil the tempter's power?

Who like thyself my guide and strength can be?

Through cloud and sunshine, O abide with me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I fear no foe with thee at hand to bless,

ills have no weight, and tears no bitterness.

Where is death's sting? Where, grave, thy victory?

I triumph still, if thou abide with me.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Hold thou thy cross before my closing eyes.

Shine through the gloom and point me to the skies.

Heaven's morning breaks and earth's vain shadows flee;

in life, in death, O Lord, abide with me.

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
Cling to the Bible!

Cling to the Bible!

Cling to the Bible—

Our Lamp and our Guide!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Cling to the Bible! This jewel and treasure

Brings life eternal, and saves fallen man;

Surely its value no mortal can measure:

Seek for its blessing, O soul, while you can!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Lamp for the feet that in byways have wandered,

Guide for the youth that would otherwise fall;

Hope for the sinner whose life has been squandered,

Staff for the agèd, and best book of all.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When we walk with the Lord

in the light of his word,

what a glory he sheds on our way!

While we do his good will,

he abides with us still,

and with all who will trust and obey.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Trust and obey, for there's no other way

to be happy in Jesus, but to trust and obey.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Not a burden we bear,

not a sorrow we share,

but our toil he doth richly repay;

not a grief or a loss,

not a frown or a cross,

but is blest if we trust and obey.

english.title: Verse 3
Verse 4

englishTitle: SAFE IN THE ARMS OF JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Safe in the arms of Jesus,

Safe on His gentle breast,

There by His love o’ershaded,

Sweetly my soul shall rest.

Hark! ’tis the voice of angels,

Borne in a song to me,

Over the fields of glory,

Over the jasper sea.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Safe in the arms of Jesus,

Safe on His gentle breast,

There by His love o’ershaded,

Sweetly my soul shall rest.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Safe in the arms of Jesus,

Safe from corroding care,

Safe from the world’s temptations,

Sin cannot harm me there.

Free from the blight of sorrow,

Free from my doubts and fears;

Only a few more trials,

Only a few more tears.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Jesus, my heart’s dear refuge,

Jesus has died for me;

Firm on the Rock of Ages,

Ever my trust shall be.

Here let me wait with patience,

Wait till the night is o’er;

Wait till I see the morning

Break on the golden shore.

number: 1016: SAFE IN THE ARMS OF JESUS

englishTitle: MY FAITH LOOKS UP TO THEE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
My faith looks up to Thee,

Thou Lamb of Calvary,

Savior divine!

Now hear me while I pray,

take all my guilt away;

O let me from this day

be wholly Thine.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
May Thy rich grace impart

strength to my fainting heart,

my zeal inspire;

as Thou hast died for me,

O may my love to Thee

pure, warm, and changeless be,

a living fire.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
While life’s dark maze I tread,

and griefs around me spread,

be Thou my Guide;

bid darkness turn to day,

wipe sorrow’s tears away,

nor let me ever stray

from Thee aside.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
When ends life's transient dream,

when death’s cold, sullen stream

shall o'er me roll,

blest Savior, then in love,

fear and distrust remove;

O bear me safe above,

a ransomed soul.

number: 1017: MY FAITH LOOKS UP TO THEE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Through the love of God our Saviour,

all will be well.

Free and changeless is his favour,

all, all is well.

Precious is the blood that healed us,

perfect is the grace that sealed us,

strong the hand stretched forth to shield us,

all must be well.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Though we pass through tribulation,

all will be well.

Ours is such a full salvation,

all, all is well.

Happy, still in God confiding,

fruitful, if in Christ abiding,

holy, through the Spirit’s guiding,

all must be well.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
We expect a bright tomorrow,

all will be well.

Faith can sing through days of sorrow,

'All, all is well.'

On our Father’s love relying,

Jesus every need supplying,

in our living, in our dying,

all must be well.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Lord, I care not for riches, neither silver nor gold;

I would make sure of heaven, I would enter the fold.

In the book of Thy kingdom with its pages so fair,

Tell me, Jesus, my Savior, is my name written there?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Is my name written there

On the page white and fair?

In the book of Thy kingdom,

Is my name written there?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Lord, my sins they are many, like the sands of the sea,

But Thy blood, O my Savior, is sufficient for me;

For Thy promise is written in bright letters that glow,

"Though your sins be as scarlet, I will make them like snow."

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
O that beautiful city with its mansions of light,

With its glorified beings in pure garments of white;

Where no evil thing cometh to despoil what is fair,

Where the angels are watching, yes, my name's written there.

Yes, my name’s written there

On the page white and fair;

In the book of Thy Kingdom,

Yes, my name’s written there!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
More love to Thee, O Christ,

More love to Thee!

Hear Thou the prayer I make

On bended knee;

This is my earnest plea:

More love, O Christ, to Thee,

More love to Thee,

More love to Thee!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Once earthly joy I craved,

Sought peace and rest;

Now Thee alone I seek,

Give what is best;

This all my prayer shall be:

More love, O Christ, to Thee,

More love to Thee,

More love to Thee!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Then shall my latest breath

Whisper Thy praise;

This be the parting cry

My heart shall raise;

This still its prayer shall be:

More love, O Christ, to Thee,

More love to Thee,

More love to Thee!

englishTitle: I HAVE FOUND A FRIEND IN JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I’ve found a friend in Jesus, He’s everything to me,

He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul;

The Apple-tree of trees, in Him alone I see

All I need to cleanse and make me fully whole.

In sorrow He’s my comfort, in trouble He’s my stay,

He tells me every care on Him to roll:

He’s the Apple-tree of trees, the Bright and Morning Star,

He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He all my griefs has taken, and all my sorrows borne;

In temptation He’s my strong and mighty tower;

I’ve all for Him forsaken, and all my idols torn

From my heart, and now He keeps me by His power.

Though all the world forsake me, and Satan tempt me sore,

Through Jesus I shall safely reach the goal:

He’s the Apple-tree of trees, the Bright and Morning Star,

He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
He’ll never, never leave me, nor yet forsake me here,

While I live by faith and do His blessed will;

A wall of fire about me, I’ve nothing now to fear,

With His manna He my hungry soul shall fill.

Then sweeping up to glory to see His blessed face,

Where rivers of delight shall ever roll:

He’s the Apple-tree of trees, the Bright and Morning Star,

He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

number: 1021: I HAVE FOUND A FRIEND IN JESUS

englishTitle: WHAT A FRIEND WE HAVE IN JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
What a friend we have in Jesus,

all our sins and griefs to bear!

What a privilege to carry

everything to God in prayer!

O what peace we often forfeit,

O what needless pain we bear,

all because we do not carry

everything to God in prayer!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Have we trials and temptations?

Is there trouble anywhere?

We should never be discouraged;

take it to the Lord in prayer!

Can we find a friend so faithful

who will all our sorrows share?

Jesus knows our every weakness;

take it to the Lord in prayer!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Are we weak and heavy laden,

cumbered with a load of care?

Precious Savior, still our refuge--

take it to the Lord in prayer!

Do your friends despise, forsake you?

Take it to the Lord in prayer!

In his arms he'll take and shield you;

you will find a solace there.

number: 1022: WHAT A FRIEND WE HAVE IN JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Just as God who reigns on high

Spake to men in days gone by;

So the Lord is calling men today;

And, my brother, this is true,

Whatsoe’er He says to you,

There is but one thing to do –

Just obey.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Just obey . . ..just obey . . .,

Is the way . . ., God’s way . . .,

When His message comes to you,

There is but one thing to do:

Just obey . . . just obey.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
If you’re in the Saviour’s hands,

You must do as He commands,

For there is no other gospel way;

Never put the message by,

Never stop to reason, “why?”

When the Saviour speaks to you –

Just obey.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
If for mansions fair you sigh,

In that land beyond the sky,

After time with you has pass’d away;

Though the way you may not see,

Christ is calling, “Follow me,”

Faith and duty both will cry –

Just obey.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Alas, and did my Savior bleed?

And did my Sovereign die?

Would He devote that sacred head

For such a worm as I?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
At the cross, at the cross where

I first saw the light,

And the burden of my heart rolled away,

It was there by faith I received my sight,

And now I am happy all the day!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Was it for sins that I had done

He groaned upon the tree?

Amazing pity! grace unknown!

And love beyond degree!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Well might the sun in darkness hide,

And shut His glories in,

When Christ, the mighty Maker, died

For man, His creature’s sin.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Thus might I hide my blushing face

While His dear cross appears.

Dissolve my heart in thankfulness,

And melt mine eyes to tears.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
But drops of grief can ne’er repay

The debt of love I owe;

Here, Lord, I give myself away,

’Tis all that I can do.

englishTitle: I GAVE MY LIFE FOR THEE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I gave My life for thee,

My precious blood I shed,

That thou mightst ransomed be,

And quickened from the dead;

I gave, I gave My life for thee,

What hast thou done for Me?

I gave, I gave My life for thee,

What hast thou done for Me?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
My Father's house of light,

My glory-circled throne

I left for earthly night,

For wanderings sad and lone;

I left, I left it all for thee,

Hast thou left aught for Me?

I left, I left it all for thee,

Hast thou left aught for Me?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I suffered much for thee,

More than thy tongue can tell,

Of bitterest agony,

To rescue thee from hell;

I've borne, I've borne it all for thee,

What hast thou borne for Me?

I've borne, I've borne it all for thee,

What hast thou borne for Me?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
And I have brought to thee,

Down from My home above,

Salvation full and free,

My pardon and My love;

I bring, I bring rich gifts to thee,

What hast thou brought to Me?

I bring, I bring rich gifts to thee,

What hast thou brought to Me?

number: 1025: I GAVE MY LIFE FOR THEE

englishTitle: WHEN THE ROLL IS CALLED UP YONDER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When the trumpet of the Lord shall sound and time shall be no more,

And the morning breaks, eternal, bright and fair;

When the saved of earth shall gather over on the other shore,

And the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
When the roll is called up yonder,

When the roll is called up yonder,

When the roll is called up yonder,

When the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
On that bright and cloudless morning when the dead in Christ shall rise,

And the glory of his resurrection share;

When his chosen ones shall gather to their home beyond the skies,

And the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Let us labor for the Master from the dawn till setting sun;

Let us talk of all his wondrous love and care.

Then when all of life is over and our work on earth is done,

And the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

number: 1026: WHEN THE ROLL IS CALLED UP YONDER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Ring the bells of heaven!

There is joy today,

For a soul, returning from the wild!

See, the Father meets him out upon the way,

Welcoming His weary, wandering child.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Glory! Glory! How the angels sing:

Glory! Glory! How the loud harps ring!

'Tis the ransomed army, like a mighty sea,

Pealing forth the anthem of the free.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Ring the bells of heaven!

There is joy today,

For the wanderer now is reconciled;

Yes, a soul is rescued from his sinful way,

And is born anew, a ransomed child.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Ring the bells of heaven!

Spread the feast today!

Angels, swell the glad triumphant strain!

Tell the joyful tidings, bear it far away!

For a precious soul is born again.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Amazing grace (how sweet the sound)

that saved a wretch like me!

I once was lost, but now am found,

was blind, but now I see.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear,

and grace my fears relieved;

how precious did that grace appear

the hour I first believed!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Through many dangers, toils and snares

I have already come:

'tis grace has brought me safe thus far,

and grace will lead me home.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
The Lord has promised good to me,

his word my hope secures;

he will my shield and portion be

as long as life endures.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Yes, when this flesh and heart shall fail,

and mortal life shall cease:

I shall possess, within the veil,

a life of joy and peace.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics:
The earth shall soon dissolve like snow,

the sun forbear to shine;

but God, who called me here below,

will be forever mine.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Rescue the perishing,

Care for the dying,

Snatch them in pity from sin and the grave;

Weep o’er the erring one, lift up the fallen,

Tell them of Jesus the mighty to save.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Rescue the perishing,

Care for the dying;

Jesus is merciful,

Jesus will save.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Down in the human heart,

Crushed by the tempter,

Feelings lie buried that grace can restore;

Touched by a loving heart, wakened by kindness,

Chords that were broken will vibrate once more.

english.title: Verse 4
Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Hark! 'Tis the Shepherd's voice I hear,

Out in the desert dark and drear,

Calling the sheep who've gone astray,

Far from the Shepherd's fold away.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Bring them in, bring them in,

Bring them in from the fields of sin;

Bring them in, bring them in,

Bring the wandering ones to Jesus.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Who'll go and help this Shepherd kind,

Help Him the wandering ones to find?

Who'll bring the lost ones to the fold,

Where they'll be sheltered from the cold?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Out in the desert hear their cry,

Out on the mountains wild and high;

Hark! 'Tis the Master speaks to thee,

"Go find My sheep where'er they be."

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Whither, pilgrims, are you going,

Going each with staff in hand?

We are going on a journey,

Going at our King’s command.

Over hills and plains and valleys,

We are going to His palace,

We are going to His palace,

Going to the better land;

We are going to His palace,

Going to the better land.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Fear ye not the way so lonely—

You, a little, feeble band?

No, for friends unseen are near us:

Holy angels round us stand.

Christ, our Leader, walks beside us:

He will guard and He will guide us,

He will guard and He will guide us,

Guide us to the better land;

He will guard and He will guide us,

Guide us to the better land.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Tell me, pilgrims, what you hope for

In that far-off better land.

Spotless robes and crowns of glory

From a Saviour’s loving hand.

We shall drink of life’s clear river,

We shall dwell with God forever,

We shall dwell with God forever

In that bright and better land;

We shall dwell with God forever

In that bright and better land.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Pilgrims, may we travel with you

To that bright, that better land?

Come and welcome, come and welcome,

Welcome to our pilgrim band.

Come, O come, and do not leave us,

Christ is waiting to receive us,

Christ is waiting to receive us

In that bright, that better land;

Christ is waiting to receive us

In that bright, that better land.

englishTitle: GOD WILL TAKE CARE OF YOU

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
:

Be not dismayed whate’er betide,

God will take care of you;

Beneath his wings of love abide,

God will take care of you.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
God will take care of you,

through ev'ry day, o’er all the way;

He will take care of you,

God will take care of you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Through days of toil when heart doth fail,

God will take care of you;

When dangers fierce your path assail,

God will take care of you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
No matter what may be the test,

God will take care of you;

Lean, weary one, upon his breast,

God will take care of you.

number: 1032: GOD WILL TAKE CARE OF YOU

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
Ask the Savior to help you,

Comfort, strengthen and keep you;

He is willing to aid you,

He will carry you through.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Trust on! trust on, believer!

Tho’ long the conflict be,

Thou yet shall prove victorious;

Thy God shall fight for thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Trust on! (trust on!)/2x

Tho’ dark the night and drear;

Trust on! (trust on!)/2x

The morning dawn is near.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Trust on! trust on; thy failings

May bow thee to the dust,

But in thy deepest sorrow,

O give not up thy trust.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Trust on! the danger presses;

Temptation strong is near,

Yet o’er life’s dangerous rapids,

He shall thy passage steer.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
O Christ is strong to save us,

He is a faithful friend;

Trust on! trust on! believer,

O trust Him to the end.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There’s a place I love to tarry,

When my soul is sad, oppressed,

‘Tis alone with Christ my Saviour,

Where He bids me “Come and rest.”

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Just to be alone with Jesus,

Just to hear Him softly say:

“Fear not, though the world forsake you,

Lo I’m with you alway.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When the cares of life are heavy,

And beneath my cross I bend;

Then I go alone with Jesus,

For He is my dearest Friend.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When the tempter would assail me,

Jesus bids me to Him flee;

He’s my Refuge, Friend and Saviour,

He is all in all to me.

english.title: Verse 1
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Calm is thy slumber as an infant's sleep;

But thou shalt wake no more to toil and weep:

Thine is a perfect rest, secure and deep--

Good-night! Good-night! Good-night!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Until the shadows from this earth are cast,

Until He gathers in His sheaves at last,

Until the twilight gloom be over past--

Good-night! Good-night! Good-night!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Until the Easter glory lights the skies,

Until the dead in Jesus shall arise,

And He shall come, but not in lowly guise--

Good-night! Good-night! Good-night!

englishTitle: GOD BE WITH YOU TILL WE MEET

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
Till we meet, till we meet,

till we meet at Jesus’ feet.

Till we meet, till we meet,

God be with you till we meet again.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
Verse 4

number: 1037: GOD BE WITH YOU TILL WE MEET

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The soul that would live close to Jesus,

Is He who spends much time in prayer.

Although it may not always please us,

'Tis that which relieves us from care.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Would God that more people would pray,

For 'tis prayer that moves mountain away;

Those mountains of doubt are sure to move out,

If unceasingly, brother, you pray.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
'Twas Elijah that prayed on Mount Carmel,

And the heavens gave ear to his cry;

And I'm sure it was not very formal,

For fire came down from the sky.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
We read that a prophet for praying

Was cast to the lions to eat;

But an angel prevented the slaying,

And delivered old Daniel complete.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
The Saviour now looks for prevailers,

Who will pray with a confidence bold,

Will you join this band of availers

And pray till the heavens unfold?

englishTitle: WHEN WE ALL GET TO HEAVEN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Sing the wondrous love of Jesus,

Sing His mercy and His grace;

In the mansions bright and blessed

He'll prepare for us a place.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
:

When we all get to heaven,

what a day of rejoicing that will be!

When we all see Jesus,

we'll sing and shout the victory!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
While we walk the pilgrim pathway

Clouds will overspread the sky;

But when trav'ling days are over

Not a shadow, not a sigh.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Let us then be true and faithful,

Trusting, serving ev'ry day;

Just one glimpse of Him in glory

Will the toils of life repay.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Onward to the prize before us!

Soon His beauty we'll behold;

Soon the pearly gates will open–

We shall tread the streets of gold.

number: 1040:  WHEN WE ALL GET TO HEAVEN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Once in royal David’s city

stood a lowly cattle shed,

where a mother laid her baby

in a manger for His bed:

Mary was that mother mild,

Jesus Christ her little Child.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He came down to earth from heaven

who is God and Lord of all,

and His shelter was a stable,

with the poor, and meek, and lowly,

lived on earth our Savior holy.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
And our eyes at last shall see Him,

through His own redeeming love;

for that Child so dear and gentle

is our Lord in heav'n above,

and He leads His children on

to the place where He is gone.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Not in that poor lowly stable,

with the oxen standing by,

we shall see Him, but in heaven,

set at God’s right hand on high;

when like stars His children crowned

all in white shall wait around.

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
Once in royal David’s city

stood a lowly cattle shed,

where a mother laid her baby

in a manger for His bed:

Mary was that mother mild,

Jesus Christ her little Child.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
He came down to earth from heaven

who is God and Lord of all,

and His shelter was a stable,

and His cradle was a stall:

with the poor, and meek, and lowly,

lived on earth our Savior holy.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
And our eyes at last shall see Him,

through His own redeeming love;

for that Child so dear and gentle

is our Lord in heav'n above,

and He leads His children on

to the place where He is gone.

english.title: Verse4
english.lyrics:
Not in that poor lowly stable,

with the oxen standing by,

we shall see Him, but in heaven,

set at God’s right hand on high;

when like stars His children crowned

all in white shall wait around.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
All to Jesus I surrender,

I will ever love and trust Him,

In His presence daily live.



Refrain:

I surrender all, I surrender all;

All to Thee, my blessed Savior,

I surrender all.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All to Jesus I surrender,

Make me, Savior, wholly Thine;

Let me feel Thy Holy Spirit,

Truly know that Thou art mine.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
All to Jesus I surrender,

Lord, I give myself to Thee;

Fill me with Thy love and power,

Let Thy blessing fall on me.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
What can wash away my sin?

Nothing but the blood of Jesus.

What can make me whole again?

Nothing but the blood of Jesus.



Refrain:

O precious is the flow

that makes me white as snow;

no other fount I know;

nothing but the blood of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
For my pardon this I see:

nothing but the blood of Jesus.

For my cleansing this my plea:

nothing but the blood of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Nothing can for sin atone:

nothing but the blood of Jesus.

Naught of good that I have done:

nothing but the blood of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
This is all my hope and peace:

nothing but the blood of Jesus.

This is all my righteousness:

nothing but the blood of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I’m tempted then to murmur, and of my lot complain,

But when I think of Jesus, and all He’s done for me,

Then, I cry, O Rock of Ages,

Hide Thou Me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
O Rock of Ages,

Hide Thou Me,

No other Refuge, have I but Thee,

When life’s dark vale I wander,

Far, far from Thee;

Then I cry, O Rock of Ages,

Hide Thou me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Sometimes it seems I dare not go one step farther on,

And from my heart all courage has slipped away and gone;

But, I remember Jesus, and all His love for me,

Then, I cry, O Rock of Ages,

Hide Thou Me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
O what a Friend is Jesus, sure Anchor for my soul,

So tender, true and gracious, I’m safe in His control.

My help in time of danger, my strong defense is He,

O Thou blessed Rock of Ages,

Hide Thou Me.

english.title: Verse 1
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All Your works with joy surround You,

Earth and heav'n reflect Your rays,

Stars and angels sing around You,

Center of unbroken praise;

Field and forest, vale and mountain,

Flow'ry meadow, flashing sea,

Chanting bird and flowing fountain

Praising You eternally!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Always giving and forgiving,

Ever blessing, ever blest,

Well-spring of the joy of living,

Ocean-depth of happy rest!

Loving Father, Christ our Brother,

Let Your light upon us shine;

Teach us how to love each other,

Lift us to the joy divine.

english.title: Verse 4
chorus
english.lyrics:
,

Which the morning stars began;

God's own love is reigning o’er us,

Joining people hand in hand.

Ever singing, march we onward,

Victors in the midst of strife;

Joyful music leads us sunward

In the triumph song of life.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Nothing, either great or small—

Nothing, sinner, no;

Jesus died and paid it all,

Long, long ago.



Refrain:

“It is finish’d!” yes, indeed,

Finished, every jot;

Sinner, this is all you need,

Tell me, is it not?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When He, from His lofty throne,

Stoop’d to do and die,

Ev’rything was fully done;

Hearken to His cry!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Weary, working, burden’d one,

Wherefore toil you so?

Cease your doing; all was done

Long, long ago.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Cast your deadly “doing” down—

Down at Jesus’ feet;

Stand in Him, in Him alone,

Gloriously complete.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Tho’ the foes of right oppress,

Keep on praying;

Christ, the Lord, is near to bless,

All prevailing.

Let not fear your heart appall,

Naught of evil can befall,

Stronger is your God than all;

Keep on praying.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Keep on praying,

Keep on praying,

Thro’ the Savior’s blessed name,

All prevailing.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Christian, has your faith grown weak?

Keep on praying;

Do the tears roll down your cheek?

Keep on praying.

Soon you never more will sigh,

Tears no more shall dim your eye,

Pray to Him who’s always nigh,

Never failing.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Pilgrim, have you weary grown?

Keep on praying,

God is yet upon His throne,

Keep on praying.

He will hear your faithful cry,

He to help is ever nigh,

You shall conquer by and by,

Keep on praying.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Praises shall with prayers ascend

Keep on praying;

Pray and praise till life shall end,

Keep on praying.

Till you reach the golden gate,

Where the ransomed souls await,

Claiming there your triumph great,

Keep on praying.

englishTitle: IF SALVATION HAD NOT BEEN FREE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
If the price of salvation were silver and gold,

all the poor of this world would be lost;

But the Savior who loved us, in mercy we're told,

paid the price on the cruel  cross.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh Lord, oh Lord, what could I have done,

if salvation had not been free?

God so loved the world, He gave His only Son,

thus making a way for me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All the poor of my people  thus speaketh the Lord,

they shall feast on the fat of the land;

Everyone who will trust me, believing my word,

shall be strengthened and made to stand.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Oh what love and compassion, was made manifest,

when He gave up His life on the tree;

sure deliverance He brought to the poor and oppressed,

and salvation to all is free.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
It is finished oh, hear Him so tenderly say,

when He gave up His all on the tree;

thus the plan of salvation was made on that day,

full salvation for you and me.

number: 1056. IF SALVATION HAD NOT BEEN FREE

englishTitle: THERE IS HONEY IS THE ROCK

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O my brother, do you know the Savior,

Who is wondrous, kind, and true?

He’s the Rock of your salvation!

There’s honey in the Rock for you.



Refrain:

Oh, there’s honey in the Rock, my brother;

There’s honey in the Rock for you.

Leave your sins for the Blood to cover;

There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Have you tasted that the Lord is gracious?

Do you walk in the way that’s new?

Have you drunk from the living fountain?

There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Do you pray unto God the Father,

“What wilt Thou have me to do?”

Never fear, He will surely answer,

There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Then go out through the streets and byways,

Preach the Word to the many or few;

Say to every fallen brother,

There’s honey in the Rock for you.

number: 1060. THERE IS HONEY IS THE ROCK

englishTitle: GOD IS HERE AND THAT TO BLESS US

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
God is here, and that to bless us

With the Spirit’s quick’ning power;

See, the cloud already bending,

Waits to drop the grateful shower.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Let it come, O Lord, we pray Thee,

Let the shower of blessing fall;

We are waiting, we are waiting,

Oh, revive the hearts of all.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
God is here! we feel His presence

In this consecrated place;

But we need the soul refreshing

Of His free, unbounded grace.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
God is here! oh, then, believing,

Bring to Him our one desire,

That His love may now be kindled,

Till its flame each heart inspire.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Savior, grant the prayer we offer,

While in simple faith we bow,

From the windows of Thy mercy

Pour us out a blessing now.

number: 1061. GOD IS HERE AND THAT TO BLESS US

englishTitle: I WANT THAT KIND OF BLESSING

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
One night while Paul and Silas alone in prison lay,

The blessing came upon them, and they began to pray;

God broke the chains that bound them and rolled the clouds away

I want that kind of blessing.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I want, I want that kind of blessing

That saves and keeps and satisfies the soul;

I want, I want that full salvation,

Till billows of heaven o’er me roll.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Elijah on Mount Carmel prevailed with God in prayer:

God closed the doors of heaven and drought was everywhere,

He prayed again in earnest, and rain came pouring down

He had that kind of blessing.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
If you will come to Jesus and full surrender make,

Your all upon the altar, the He the gift will take;

The fire will fall upon you, and burn up inbred sin

You’ll have that kind of blessing.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
In Canaan now we’re living, and feasting on its wine,

With milk and honey flowing, and vict’ry all the time;

With triumph we are marching, and giants there are bread

We have that kind of blessing.

number: 1062. I WANT THAT KIND OF BLESSING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
If thou wouldst have the dear Savior from heaven

Walk by thy side from the morn till the even,

There is a rule that each day you must follow:

Humble thyself to walk with God.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Humble thyself and the Lord will draw near thee,

Humble thyself and His presence shall cheer thee;

He will not walk with the proud or the scornful,

Humble thyself to walk with God.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Just as the Lord, in the world’s early ages,

Walked and communed with the prophets and sages,

He will come now if you meet the conditions:

Humble thyself to walk with God.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Just as the stream finds a bed that is lowly,

So Jesus walks with the pure and the holy;

Cast out thy pride, and in heartfelt contrition

Humble thyself to walk with God.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When you are weary and sore opprest,

When sorrow darkens the day,

Have faith in Jesus, He knoweth best,

And pray your troubles away.

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When strong temptations in you combine

To lead your footsteps astray,

Just go to Jesus your Friend divine,

And pray your troubles away.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Be not discouraged, but press along,

And live for Jesus today;

He’ll turn your sighing into a song,

And pray your troubles away.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Oh, soul in bondage, why longer roam,

In sin’s unending dismay?

Just trust in Jesus, He’ll lead you home,

And pray your troubles away.

englishTitle: SITTING AT THE FEET OF JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Sitting at the feet of Jesus,

Oh, what words I hear Him say!

Happy place! so near, so precious!

May it find me there each day;

Sitting at the feet of Jesus,

I would look upon the past;

For His love has been so gracious,

It has won my heart at last.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Sitting at the feet of Jesus,

Where can mortal be more blest?

There I lay my sins and sorrows,

And, when weary, find sweet rest;

Sitting at the feet of Jesus,

There I love to weep and pray;

While I from His fullness gather

Grace and comfort every day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Bless me, O my Savior, bless me,

As I sit low at Thy feet; [I’m waiting]

Oh, look down in love upon me,

Let me see Thy face so sweet;

Give me, Lord, the mind of Jesus,

Keep me holy as He is;

May I prove I’ve been with Jesus,

Who is all my righteousness.

number: 1066. SITTING AT THE FEET OF JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
By the proud worshippers,

Scorned for her sin,

Was the poor wanderer

Rudely brought in.

Scribes came and Pharisees,

Eager to see,

What the meek Nazarene’s,

Verdict would be.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
“Neither do I condemn thee,”

Precious words divine!

Falling from lips of mercy,

Like the sweetest chime.

Wonderful words of Jesus!

Sing them o’er and o’er,

“Neither do I condemn thee,

Go, and sin no more.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Told of her wanderings,

Marking each flaw,

Spoke they of punishment,

Quoting the law.

Sat He unheedingly,

Head bowing low,

Writing the ground upon,

Sadly and slow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Still cried the Pharisees,

“Pray, Master, pray,

What shall we do with her

What dost Thou say?”

Spoke He rebukingly,

“Let the first stone,

Come from a sinless hand,

And thence alone.”

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Cheeks flushing red with shame,

Turned each about,

And from His presence went

Silently out.

Then saw He standing there,

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Spoke He most tenderly,

“Pray, woman, pray,”

“Hast thou accusers none?”

“Nay, Master, nay,”

“Neither do I condemn,

Soul sick and sore,

Go, for I pardon thee,

Go, sin no more.”

















































Head bending low,

Her whom the world despised,

Saw her tears flow.

english.title: Verse1
Verse2
Verse 3
Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Suffer a sinner whose heart overflows,

Loving his Savior to tell what he knows;

Once more to tell it would I embrace--

I’m only a sinner saved by grace!

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
In sorrow I wandered, my spirit oppressed,

But now I am happy - securely I rest;

From morning till evening glad carols I sing,

And this is the reason: I walk with the King.



Refrain:

I walk with the King, hallelujah!

I walk with the King, praise His name!

No longer I roam, my soul faces home,

I walk and I talk with the King.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
For years in the fetters of sin I was bound,

The world could not help me - no comfort I found;

But now like the birds and the sunbeams of Spring,

I'm free and rejoicing - I walk with the King.

english.title: Verse3
Verse1
english.lyrics:
All the way my Lord is leading me;

Praise His name,

Praise His name!

With His heav’nly manna feeding me,

Praise His holy name.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus, Jesus!

This is my song,

Jesus, Jesus the whole day long;

He is mine,

A Savior divine,

Praise His holy name.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
When I faint, His grace upholdeth me;

Praise His name,

Praise His name!

When I fear, His arms enfoldeth me,

Praise His holy name.

english.title: Verse3
english.lyrics:
Cares of life have overtaken me;

Praise His name,

Praise His name!

Yet He never has forsaken me,

Praise His holy name.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Our Sunday-school, how sweet, how dear

To meet and learn of Jesus here;

To read his word, whose ev’ry line

Is full of hope and joy divine.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Our blessed Sunday-school,

Our bright and happy home,

Within thy peaceful dome

We love, we love to come;

Our thoughts will cling to thee,

And still our prayer will be,

That God may bless and keep our Sunday-school.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Our Sunday school, where all may sing

Glad songs of praise to God our King,

And youthful hearts may find the way

To perfect peace and endless day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Our school is like a garden fair,

Where plants are trained with tender care

To bloom for him, The Lord of all,

Whose loving smiles like sunbeams fall.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Our Sunday-school, whose golden hours

From Eden bring refreshing showers,

In thee on earth we learn to live,

For thee our thanks to God we give.

englishTitle: LET THE LOWER LIGHT BE BURNING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Brightly beams our Father’s mercy

From His lighthouse evermore;

But to us He gives the keeping

Of the lights along the shore.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Let the lower lights be burning!

Send a gleam across the wave!

Some poor fainting, struggling seaman

You may rescue, you may save.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Dark the night of sin has settled,

Loud the angry billows roar;

Eager eyes are watching, longing,

For the lights along the shore.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Trim your feeble lamp, my brother!

Some poor seaman, tempest-tossed,

Trying now to make the harbor,

In the darkness may be lost.

number: 1073. LET THE LOWER LIGHT BE BURNING

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
There is much to do, there's work on ev'ry hand,

Hark! The cry for help comes ringing through the land;

Jesus calls for reapers, I must active be,

What wilt Thou, O Master? Here am I, send me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Here am I,

(Here am I, send me, Lord, send me)

Lord, Send me;

(Here am I, send me, Lord, send me)

Here am I,

(Here am I, send me, Lord, send me)

Ready at Thy bidding, Lord, send me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There's a plaintive cry of mourning souls distressed,

And the cry of hearts who seek but find no rest;

These should have my love and tender sympathy,

Ready at Thy bidding, Here am I, send me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
There are hung'ring souls who cry aloud for bread,

With the bread of life they're longing to be fed;

Shall they starve and famish while a feast is free?

I must be more faithful, Here am I, send me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
There are souls who linger on the brink of woe,

Lord, I must not, cannot bear to let them go;

Let me go and tell them, "Brother, turn and flee,"

Master, I would save them, Here am I send me.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Have you prayed all night, till the break of day,

And the morning light drove the dark away?

Did you linger there, till the morning dew,

In prevailing prayer, did you pray it through?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Did you pray till the answer came,

Did you plead in the Savior’s name?

Have you prayed all night till the morning light,

Did you pray till the answer came?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Did you pray it through, till the answer came?

There’s a promise true for your faith to claim,

At the place of prayer, Jesus waits for you,

Did you meet Him there, did you pray it through?

english.title: Verse3
english.lyrics:
As the Master prayed in the garden lone,

Let your prayer be made to the Father’s throne,

If you seek His will, He will answer you,

Are you trusting still, have you prayed it through?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Christ is our cornerstone;

On him alone we build;

With his true saints above

The courts of Heav'n are filled:

On His great love

Our hopes we place

Of present grace

And joys above.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Oh, then, with hymns of praise

These hallowed courts shall ring!

Our voices we will raise,

The Three in One to sing;

And thus proclaim

In joyful song,

Both loud and long,

That glorious name.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Here, gracious God, we pray,

Forevermore draw nigh;

Accept each faithful pray'r,

And mark each humble sigh:

In copious stores,

On all who pray,

Each holy day,

Your blessings pour.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Here may we gain from Heav’n

The grace we now implore,

And may that grace, once giv’n,

Be with us evermore.

Until that day

When all the blest

In endless rest

Are called away.

english.title: Verse5
english.lyrics:
Praise to the God of Heav’n,

Praise to his holy Son,

And praise to him be giv’n

Who joins them both in One:

The Holy Dove,





























Who gives us grace

To find our place

With God above.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus is Lord of all

Jesus is Lord of all

Lord of my thoughts

And my service each day

Jesus is Lord of all

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus is Savior and Lord of my life

My hope my glory my all

Wonderful Master in joy and in strife

On Him you too may call

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Blessed Redeemer all glorious King

Worthy of rev'rence I pay

Tribute and praises I joyfully bring

To Him the Life the Way

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Will you surrender your all to Him now

Follow His will and obey

Crown Him as Sov'reign before His throne bow

Give Him your heart today

englishTitle: THERE IS LAND OF PURE DELIGHT

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There is a land of pure delight,

where saints immortal reign;

infinite day excludes the night,

and pleasures banish pain.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There everlasting spring abides,

and never-withering flowers;

death, like a narrow sea, divides

that heavenly land from ours.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Sweet fields beyond the swelling flood

stand dressed in living green;

so to the Jews old Canaan stood,

while Jordan rolled between.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
But timorous mortals start and shrink

to cross the narrow sea,

and linger shivering on the brink,

and fear to launch away.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
O could we make our doubts remove,

those gloomy doubts that rise,

and see the Canaan that we love

with unbeclouded eyes;

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics:
Could we but climb where Moses stood,

and view the landscape o'er,

not Jordan's stream, nor death's cold flood,

should fright us from the shore!

number: 1084. THERE IS LAND OF PURE DELIGHT

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
Firmly stand for God, in the world's mad strife,

Tho' the bleak winds roar, and the waves beat high;

'Tis the Rock alone giveth strength and life,

When the hosts of sin are nigh.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Let us stand on the Rock,

Firmly stand on the Rock,

On the Rock of Christ alone;

If the strife we endure,

We shall stand secure,

'Mid the throng who surround the throne.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Firmly stand for Right, with a motive pure,

With a true heart bold, and a faith e'er strong;

'Tis the Rock alone giveth triumph sure,

O'er the world's array of wrong.

english.title: Verse 3
Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Fight the good fight with all your might,

Christ is your strength and Christ your right.

Lay hold on life, and it shall be

your joy and crown eternally.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Cast care aside, lean on your guide;

his boundless mercy will provide.

Lean, and the trusting soul shall prove

Christ is its life and Christ its love.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Faint not, nor fear, his arms are near;

he changes not, and you are dear.

Only believe, and you will see

that Christ is Lord eternally.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I have found His grace is all complete;

He supplieth every need.

While I sit and learn at Jesus’ feet,

I am free, yes, free indeed.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
It is joy unspeakable and full of glory,

Full of glory, full of glory.

It is joy unspeakable and full of glory;

O the half has never yet been told!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I have found the pleasure I once craved;

It is joy and peace within.

What a wondrous blessing! I am saved

From the awful gulf of sin.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I have found that hope so bright and clear,

Living in the realm of grace.

O the Savior’s presence is so near;

I can see His smiling face.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I have found the joy no tongue can tell,

How its waves of glory roll!

It is like a great o’erflowing well,

Springing up within my soul.

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
I’ve a home prepared where the saints abide,

Just over in the gloryland;

And I long to be by my Savior’s side,

Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Just over in the gloryland,

I’ll join the happy angel band,

Just over in the gloryland;

Just over in the gloryland,

There with the mighty host I’ll stand,

Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I am on my way to those mansions fair,

Just over in the gloryland;

There to sing God’s praise, and His glory share,

Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
What a joyful thought that my Lord I’ll see,

Just over in the gloryland;

And with kindred saved, there forever be,

Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
With the bloodwashed throng I will shout and sing,

Just over in the gloryland;

Glad hosannas to Christ, the Lord and King,

Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I care not today what the morrow may bring,

If shadow or sunshine or rain,

The Lord I know ruleth o’er everything,

And all of my worries are vain.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Living by faith in Jesus above,

Trusting, confiding in His great love;

From all harm safe in His sheltering arm,

I’m living by faith and feel no alarm.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Though tempests may blow and the storm clouds arise,

Obscuring the brightness of life,

I’m never alarmed at the overcast skies—

The Master looks on at the strife.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I know that He safely will carry me through,

No matter what evils betide;

Why should I then care though the tempest may blow,

If Jesus walks close to my side.

english.title: Verse4
english.lyrics:
Our Lord will return for His loved ones some day,

Our troubles will then all be o’er;

The Master so gently will lead us away,

Beyond that blest heavenly shore.

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
With cheerful songs and hymns of praise,

Our grateful hearts to Him we raise,

Who Leads us on with gentle hand,

And crowns with love Our Christian Band.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Then gladly let us stand,

United heart and hand,

The lost to gather in

From sorrow, pain, and sin;

Be this our constant aim—

To spread abroad the name

Of Jesus our Redeemer,

And His wondrous love proclaim.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
And while we meet together here,

In bounds of love and friendship dear,

Oh, may our prayers like incense rise,

To Him whose grace each need supplies.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
O Thou who art the children’s Friend,

Our steps direct, our paths defend,

And by Thine own almighty hand

Protect and keep our Christian Band.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
All things bright and beautiful,

all creatures great and small,

all things wise and wonderful,

the Lord God made them all.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Each little flow'r that opens,

each little bird that sings,

He made their glowing colors,

He made their tiny wings.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
The purple-headed mountain,

the river running by,

the sunset and the morning

that brightens up the sky.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The cold wind in the winter,

the pleasant summer sun,

the ripe fruits in the garden:

He made them every one.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
He gave us eyes to see them,

and lips that we might tell

how great is God Almighty,

who has made all things well.

englishTitle: MY  HEAVENLY FATHER WATCHES OVER ME

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
I trust in God wherever I may be,

Upon the land or on the rolling sea;

For come what may, from day to day,

My heav'nly Father watches over me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I trust in God, I know he cares for me,

On mountain bleak or on the stormy sea;

Though billows roll, he keeps my soul,

My heav'nly Father watches over me.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
He makes the rose an object of his care,

He guides the eagle through the pathless air;

And surely he remembers me,

My heav'nly Father watches over me.

english.title: Verse3
english.lyrics:
I trust in God, for, in the lion's den,

On battlefield, or in the prison pen;

Through praise or blame, through flood or flame,

My heav'nly Father watches over me.

english.title: Verse4
english.lyrics:
The valley may be dark, the shadows deep,

But oh, the shepherd guards his lonely sheep;

And through the gloom, he'll lead me home,

My heav'nly Father watches over me.

number: 1095. MY  HEAVENLY FATHER WATCHES OVER ME

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
Soon this life will all be over

And our pilgrimage will end,

Soon we’ll take our heav’nly journey,

Be at home again with friends;

Heaven’s gates are standing open,

Waiting for our entrance there,

Some sweet day we’re going over,

All the beauties there to share.



Refrain:

Just a little while to stay here,

Just a little while to wait,

Just a little while to labor

In the path that’s always straight,

Just a little more of troubles,

In this low and sinful state,

Then we’ll enter Heaven’s portals,

Sweeping through the pearly gates.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Soon we’ll see the light of morning

Then the new day will begin,

Soon we’ll hear the Father calling,

“Come my children enter in;”

Then we’ll hear a choir of angels,

Singing out the vict’ry song,

All our troubles will be ended

And we’ll live with heaven’s throng.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Soon we’ll meet again our loved ones

And we’ll take them by the hand,

Soon we’ll press them to our bosom

Over in the promised land;

Then we’ll be at home forever,

Throughout all eternity,

What a blessed, blessed morning

That eternal morn will be!

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
His love is ever true;

I've found a friend who is all to me,

I love to tell how He lifted me,

And what His grace can do for you.



Refrain:

Saved by His pow'r, by His pow'r divine,

Saved to new life, to new life sublime!

Life now is sweet and my joy is complete,

For I'm saved, saved, saved.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
He saves me from ev'ry sin and harm,

Secures my soul each day;

I'm leaning strong on His mighty arm–

I know He'll guide me all the way.

english.title: Verse3
english.lyrics:
When poor and needy and all alone,

In love He said to me,

"Come unto Me and I'll lead you home

To live with Me eternally."

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Take time to be holy, speak oft with thy Lord;

Abide in Him always, and feed on His Word.

Make friends of God’s children, help those who are weak,

Forgetting in nothing His blessing to seek.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Take time to be holy, let Him be thy Guide;

And run not before Him, whatever betide.

In joy or in sorrow, still follow the Lord,

And, looking to Jesus, still trust in His Word.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Take time to be holy, be calm in thy soul,

Each thought and each motive beneath His control.

Thus led by His Spirit to fountains of love,

Thou soon shalt be fitted for service above.

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
I had lived a life of sin in this world were living in

I had done forbidden things I shouldn't do

I ask a beggar along the way, & u can tell me where to stay

Where I'd find real happiness and love that's true



Across the bridge, there's no more sorrow

Across the bridge, there's no more pain

The Sun will shine across the river

And you'll never be unhappy again

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
Follow footsteps of the King and you'll hear the voices ring

They'll be singing out the glory of the Lamb

The river of Jordan will be near, the sound of trumpets you will hear

You'll behold the special place ever known to man



Across the bridge, there's no more sorrow

Across the bridge, there's no more pain

The Sun will shine across the river

And you'll never be unhappy again

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
I have a song that Jesus gave me,

It was sent from heaven above;

There never was a sweeter melody,

'Tis a melody of love.

english.title: Chorus
Verse2
english.lyrics:
I love the Christ who died on Calv'ry,

For He washed my sins away;

He put within my heart a melody,

And I know it's there to stay.

english.title: Verse3
english.lyrics:
'Twill be my endless theme in glory,

With the angels I will sing;

'Twill be a song with glorious harmony,

When the courts of heaven ring.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Holy words long preserved

For our walk in this world

They resound with God's own heart

Oh, let the ancient words impart

Words of life, words of hope

Give us strength, help us cope

In this world, where e'er we roam

Ancient words will guide us home

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Ancient words ever true

Changing me and changing you

We have come with open hearts

Oh, let the ancient words impart

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Holy words of our faith

Handed down to this age

Came to us through sacrifice

Oh, heed the faithful words of Christ

Holy words long preserved

For our walk in this world

They resound with God's own heart

Oh, let the ancient words impart

englishTitle: I’LL SEE YOU IN THE RAPTURE

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
If we never meet again

On this earth, my precious friend

And if the blood of Jesus Christ

Has redeemed us from our sin

Then for us there'll be a meetin'

What a hallelujah greeting

I'll see you in the rapture some sweet day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I'll see you in the rapture

I'll see you in the rapture

I'll see you at that meeting in the air

There with our blessed Savior

We'll live and reign forever

I'll see you in the rapture some sweet day.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
O my loved ones, let me say

That there'll surely come a day

That the Lord will come again

And He'll take His bride away

So get ready now to greet Him

With hallelujahs, greet Him

I'll see you in the rapture some sweet day.
